GE07bhg4c02u:6: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca - taṃ tathety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:7: aśrubhiḥ pūrṇe ākule īkṣaṇe yasya taṃ tathā,
GE07bhg4c02u:8: ukta-prakāreṇa visam arjunaṃ prati madhusūdana idaṃ vākyam uvāca ||1||
GE07bhg4c02u:10_0: ahiṃsā paramo dharmo bhikṣāśanaṃ cety evaṃ-lakṣaṇayā buddhyā yuddha-vaimukhyam arjunasya
GE07bhg4c02u:10_1: śrutvā svaputrāṇāṃ rājyam apracalitam avadhārya svastha-hṛdayasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya
GE07bhg4c02u:10_2: harṣa-nimittāṃ tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity ākāṅkṣām apaninīṣuḥ saṃjayas taṃ pratyuktavān
GE07bhg4c02u:13: arjunasya karmatvaṃ kṛpāyāś ca kartṛtvaṃ vadatā tasyā āgantukatvaṃ vyudastam |
GE07bhg4c02u:14: ataeva viṣīdantaṃ sneha-viṣayī-bhūta-svajana-vicchedāśaṅkā-nimittaḥ śokāpara-paryāyaś citta-vyākulī-bhāvo viṣādas taṃ prāpnuvantam |
GE07bhg4c02u:15: atra viṣādasya karmatvenārjunasya kartṛtvena ca tasyāgantukatvaṃ sūcitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:16: ataeva kṛpā-viṣāda-vaśād aśrubhiḥ pūrṇe ākule darśanākṣame cekṣaṇe yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c02u:17: evam aśru-pāta-vyākulī-bhāvākhya-kārya-dvaya-janakatayā paripoṣaṃ gatābhyāṃ kṛpā-viṣādābhyām udvignaṃ tam arjunam idaṃ sopapattikaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ vākyam uvāca na tūpekṣitavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:19: svayaṃ duṣṭa-nigraha-kartārjunaṃ praty api tathaiva vakṣyatīti bhāvaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c02u:26: evam arjuna-vairāgyam upaśrutya sva-putra-rājyābhraṃśāśayā hṛṣyantaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭram ālakṣya sañjaya uvāca taṃ tatheti |
GE07bhg4c02u:27: madhusūdana iti tasya śokam api madhuvan nihaniṣyatīti bhāvaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c02u:31: kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:33: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva vākyam āha śrī-bhagavān uvāca kuta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:34: kuto hetos tvā tvāṃ viṣame saṅkaṭe idaṃ kuśalaṃ samupasthitam ayaṃ mohaḥ prāptaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:37: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva bhagavato vākyam avatārayati kutas tveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:43: etādṛśaṃ samagramaiśvaryādikaṃ nityam apratibandhena yatra vartate sa bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:45: utpattiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c02u:46: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti || [ViP 6.78]
GE07bhg4c02u:50: etādṛśo bhagavac-chabdārthaḥ śrī-vāsudeva eva paryavasita iti tathocyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:51_0: idaṃ svadharmāt parāṅmukhatvaṃ kṛpā-vyāmohāśru-pātādi-puraḥ-saraṃ kaśmalaṃ śiṣṭa-garhitatvena
GE07bhg4c02u:51_1: malinaṃ viṣame sa-bhaye sthāne tvā tvāṃ sarva-kṣatriya-pravaraṃ kuto hetoḥ samupasthitaṃ prāptam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:55: hetu-trayam api niṣedhati tribhir viśesaṇair uttarārdhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:57: sva-dharmair āśaya-śuddhi-dvārā moks icchadbhir apakva-kaṣāyair mumukṣubhiḥ kathaṃ sva-dharmas tyājya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:60: akīrtikaraṃ kīrty-abhāva-karam apakīrtikaraṃ vā na kīrtīcchayā sevyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:61: tathā ca mokṣa-kāmaiḥ svarga-kāmaiḥ kīrti-kāmaiś ca varjanīyam | tat kāma eva tvaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:62: sevasva ity aho anucitaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ taveti bhāvaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c02u:68: asvargyam akīrtikaram iti pāratrikaihika-sukha-pratikūlam ity arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c02u:69: baladevaḥ : tad vākyam anuvadati śrī-bhagavān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:74: he arjuna ! idaṃ sva-dharma-vaimukhyaṃ kaśmalaṃ śiṣṭa-nindyatvān malinaṃ kuto hetos tvāṃ kṣatriya-cūḍāmaṇiṃ samupasthitam abhūt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:76: na ca mokṣāya svargāya kīrtaye vaitad-yuddha-vairāgyam ity āha anāryeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:83: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:85: śrīdharaḥ : klaibyaṃ mā sma gama iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:86: tasmāt he pārtha ! klaibyaṃ kātaryaṃ mā sma gamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:88: yatas tvayi etan nopapadyate yogyaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:89: kṣudraṃ tucchaṃ hṛdaya-daurbalyaṃ kātaryaṃ yuddhāya uttiṣṭha, he parantapa śatru-tāpana ! ||3||
GE07bhg4c02u:91: nanu bandhu-senāvekṣaṇa-jātenādhairyeṇa dhanur api dhārayitum aśaknuvatā mayā kiṃ kartuṃ śakyam ity ata āha klaibyam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:92: klaibyaṃ klīb-bhāvam adhairyam ojas-teja-ādi-bhaṅga-rūpaṃ mā sma gamo mā gā |
GE07bhg4c02u:93: he pārtha pṛthā-tanaya! pṛthayā deva-prasāda-labdhe tat-tanaya-mātre vīryātiśayasya prasiddhatvāt pṛthā-tanayatvena tvaṃ klaibyāyogya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:95: tvayi arjune sākṣān-maheśvareṇāpi saha kṛtāhave prakhyāta-mahā-prabhāve nopapadyate na yujyata etat-klaibyam ity asādhāraṇyena tad-ayogyatva-nirdeśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:96: nanu na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ iti pūrvam eva mayoktam ity āśaṅkyāha kṣudram iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:97: hṛdaya-daurbalyaṃ manaso bhramaṇādi-rūpam adhairyaṃ kṣudratva-kāraṇatvāt kṣudraṃ sunirasanaṃ vā tyaktvā vivekenāpanīyottiṣṭha yuddhāya sajjo bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:98: he parantapa ! paraṃ śatruṃ tāpayatīti tathā saṃbodhyate hetu-garbham ||3||
GE07bhg4c02u:100: he pārtheti tvaṃ pṛthā-putraḥ sann api gacchasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:105: nanv idaṃ śauryābhāva-lakṣaṇaṃ klaibyaṃ mā śaṅkiṣṭhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:106: kintu bhīṣma-droṇādi-guruṣu dharma-dṛṣṭyā viveko 'yaṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṣu tu durbaleṣu mad-astrāghātam āsādya martum udyateṣu dayaiveyam iti tatrāha kṣudram iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:107: naite tava viveka-daye, kintu śoka-mohāv eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:110: he parantapa ! parān śatrūn tāpayan yudhyasva ||3||
GE07bhg4c02u:112: nanu bandhu-kṣayādhyavasāya-doṣāt prakampitena mayā kiṃ bhāvyam iti cet tatrāha klaibyam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:113: he pārtha ! devarāja-prasādāt pṛthāyām utpanna ! klaibyaṃ kātaryaṃ mā sma gamaḥ prāpnuhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:114: tvayi viśva-vijetari mat-sakhe 'rjune kṣatra-bandhāv ivaitad īdṛśaṃ klaibyaṃ nopayujyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:115_0: nanu na me śauryābhāva-rūpaṃ klaibyaṃ kintu bhīṣmādiṣu pūjyeṣu dharma-buddhyā viveko
GE07bhg4c02u:115_1: 'yaṃ duryodhanādiṣu bhrātṛṣu mac-chastra-prahāreṇa mariṣyatsu kṛpeyam iti cet tatrāha kṣudram iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:116: naite tava viveka-kṛpe, kintu kṣudraṃ laghiṣṭhaṃ hṛdaya-daurbalyam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:118: he parantapa ! śatru-tāpaneti śatru-hāsa-pātratāṃ mā gāḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c02u:122: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana |
GE07bhg4c02u:125: kintu yuddhasya anyāyyatvād adharmyatvāc cety āha arjuna uvāca katham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:126: bhīṣma-droṇau pūjārhau pūjāyām arho yogyau tau prati katham ahaṃ yotsyāmi,
GE07bhg4c02u:127: tatrāpi iṣubhiḥ yatra vācāpi yotsyāmīti vaktum anucitaṃ tatra bāṇaiḥ kathaṃ yotsyāmīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:130_0: nanu nāyaṃ svadharmasya tyāgaḥ śoka-mohādi-vaśāt kintu dharatvābhāvād adharmatvāc
GE07bhg4c02u:130_1: cāsya yuddhasya tyāgo mayā kriyata iti bhagavad-abhiprāyam apratipadyamānasyārjunasyābhiprāyam
GE07bhg4c02u:131: bhīṣmaṃ pitāmahaṃ droṇām cācāryaṃ saṅkhye raṇa iṣubhiḥ sāyakaiḥ pratiyotsyāmi prahariṣyāmi katham ?
GE07bhg4c02u:134: pūjārhābhyāṃ saha krīḍā-sthāne 'pi vācāpi harṣa-phalam api līlā-yuddham anucitaṃ kiṃ punar yuddha-bhūmau śaraiḥ prāṇa-tyāga-phalakaṃ praharaṇam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:136: ato na madhusūdanārisūdanety asyārthasya punar uktatvaṃ doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:137: yuddha-mātram api yatra nocitaṃ dūre tatra vadha iti pratiyotsyāmīty anena sūcitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:139: pūjārhayor eva vivaraṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:140: dvau brāhmaṇau bhojaya deva-dattaṃ yajña-dattaṃ cetivat sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:141: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - duryodhanādayo nāpuraskṛtya bhīṣma-droṇau yuddhāya sajjībhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:142: tatra tābhyāṃ saha yuddhaṃ na tāvad dharmaḥ pūjādivad avihitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:143: na cāyam aniṣiddhatvād adharmo 'pi na bhavatīti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:144: guruṃ huṅkṛtya tvaṃkṛtya ity ādinā śabda-mātreṇāpi guru-droho yadāniṣṭa-phalatva-pradarśanena niṣiddhas tadā kiṃ vācyaṃ tābhyāṃ saha saṅgrāmasyādharmatve niṣiddhatve ceti ||4||
GE07bhg4c02u:145: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya-pūjā-vyatikramaḥ iti dharma-śāstram |
GE07bhg4c02u:146: ato 'haṃ yuddhān nivarta ity āha katham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:148: nanv etau yudhyete tarhy anayoḥ pratiyoddhā bhavituṃ tvaṃ kiṃ na śaknoṣi ?
GE07bhg4c02u:149: satyaṃ na śaknomy evety āha pūjārhāv iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:150: anayoś caraṇeṣu bhaktyā kusumāny eva dātum arhāmi na tu krodhena tīkṣṇa-śarān iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:151: bho vayasya kṛṣṇa tvam api śatrūn eva yuddhe haṃsi,
GE07bhg4c02u:153: nāpi bandhūn yadūn ity āha he madhusūdaneti |
GE07bhg4c02u:155: tatrāha he arisūdana ! madhur nāma daityo yas tavārir iti bravīmīti ||4||
GE07bhg4c02u:156: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādiṣu pratiyoddhṛṣu satsu tvayā kathaṃ na yoddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:157: āhūto na nivarteta iti yuddha-vidhānāc ca kṣatriyasyeti cet tatrāha katham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:160: yad imau pūjārhau puṣpādibhir abhyarcyau, parihāsa-vāgbhir api yābhyāṃ yuddhaṃ na yuktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:162: pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya- pūjya-pūjā-vyatikramaḥ iti smṛteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:165: tad-bhāvaś ca tvam api śatrūn eva yuddhe nihaṃsi na tūgrasena-sāndīpany-ādīn pūjyān iti ||4||
GE07bhg4c02u:172: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi tān ahatvā tava deha-yātrāpi na syād iti cet, tatrāha gurūn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:173: gurūn droṇācāryādīn ahatvā para-loka-viruddhaṃ guru-vadham akṛtvā iha-loke bhaikṣyaṃ bhikṣānnam api bhoktuṃ śreya ucitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:174: vipakṣe tu na kevalaṃ paratra duḥkhaṃ, kintu ihaiva ca naraka-duḥkham anubhaveyam ity āha hatveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:175: gurūn hatvā ihaiva tu rudhireṇa pradigdhān prakarṣeṇa liptān artha-kāmātmakān bhogān ahaṃ bhuñjīya aśnīyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:176: yad vā artha-kāmān iti gurūṇāṃ viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:177: artha-tṛṣṇākulatvād ete tāvad yuddhān na nivarteran tasmād etad vadhaḥ prasajyetaivety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:179: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:180: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || iti [ṃBh 6.41.36] ||5||
GE07bhg4c02u:183: na ca teṣāṃ gurutvena svīkāraḥ sāmpratam ucitaḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:187: tasmād eṣāṃ yuddha-garveṇāvaliptānām anyāya-rājya-grahaṇena śiṣya-droheṇa ca kāryākārya-viveka-śūnyānām utpatha-niṣṭhānāṃ vadha eva śreyān ity āśaṅkyāha gurūn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:188: gurūn ahatvā para-lokas tāvad asty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:189_0: asmiṃs tu loke tair hṛta-rājyānāṃ no nṛpādīnāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhaikṣam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:189_1: praśasyataram ucitaṃ na tu tad-vadhena rājyam api śreya iti dharme 'pi yuddhe vṛtti-mātra-phalatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:190: nanv avaliptatvādinā teṣāṃ gurutvābhāva ukta ity āśaṅkyāha mahānubhāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:192: tathā ca kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yair vaśīkṛtās teṣāṃ puṇyātiśaya-śālināṃ nāvaliptatvādi-kṣudra-pāpma-saṃśleṣa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:194: himaṃ jāḍyam apahantīti himahā ādityo 'gnir vā tasyaivānubhāvaḥ sāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ tān |
GE07bhg4c02u:195: tathā cātitejasvitvāt teṣām avaliptatvādi-doṣo nāsty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:197: tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva-bhujo yathā || [BhP 10.33.30]
GE07bhg4c02u:198: nanu yadārtha-lubdhāḥ santo yuddhe pravṛttās tadaiṣāṃ vikrītātmanāṃ kutastyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ māhātmyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:200: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:201: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:203: artha-lubdhā api te mad-apekṣayā guravo bhavanty eveti punar guru-grahaṇenoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:204: tu-śabdo 'py arthe īdṛśān api gurūn hatvā bhogān eva bhuñjīya na tu mokṣaṃ labheya |
GE07bhg4c02u:205: bhujyanta iti bhogā viṣayāḥ karmaṇi ghañ |
GE07bhg4c02u:206: te ca bhogā ihaiva na para-loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:207: ihāpi ca rudhira-pradigdhā ivāpayaśo-vyāptatvenātyanta-jugupsitā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:208: yadehāpy evaṃ tadā para-loka-duḥkhaṃ kiyad varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:209: athavā gurūn hatvārtha-kāmātmakān bhogān eva bhuñjīya na tu dharma-mokṣāv ity artha-kāma-padasya bhoga-viśeṣaṇatayā vyākhyānāntaraṃ draṣṭavyam ||5||
GE07bhg4c02u:210: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv evaṃ te yadi svarājye 'smin nāsti jighṛkṣā,
GE07bhg4c02u:211: tarhi kayā vṛttyā jīviṣyasīty atrāha gurūn ahatveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:212: guru-vadham akṛtvā bhaikṣyaṃ kṣatriyair vigītam api bhikṣānnam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:213: aihika-duryaśo-lābhe 'pi pāratrikam amaṅgalaṃ tu naiva syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:214: na caiva guravo 'valiptāḥ kāryākāryam ajānantaś cādhārmika-duryodhanādy-anugatās tyājyā eva | yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c02u:218: kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yair vaśīkṛtās teṣāṃ bhīṣmādīnāṃ kutas tad-doṣa-sambhava iti bhāvaḥ | nanu -
GE07bhg4c02u:219: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:220: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:221: iti yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati bhīṣmeṇaivoktam ataḥ sāmpratam artha-kāmatvād eteṣāṃ mahānubhāvatvaṃ prāktanaṃ vigalitam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:223: tad apy etān hatavato mama duḥkham eva syād ity āha artha-kāmānartha-lubdhān apy etān kurūn hatvāhaṃ bhogān bhuñjīya kintv eteṣāṃ rudhireṇa pradigdhān praliptān eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:224: ayam arthaḥ - eteṣām artha-lubdhatve 'pi mad-gurutvam asty eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:225: ataevaitad-vadhe sati guru-drohiṇo mama khalu bhogo duṣkṛti-miśraḥ syād iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c02u:227: nanu svarājye spṛhā cet tava nāsti tarhi deha-yātrā vā kathaṃ setsyatīti cet tatrāha gurūn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:228: gurūn ahatvā guru-vadham akṛtvā sthitasya me bhaikṣyānnaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nindyam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ praśastataram |
GE07bhg4c02u:230_0: nanv ete bhīṣmādayo guravo 'pi yuddha-garvāvalepāt chadmanā yuṣmad-rājyāpahāraṃ yuṣmad-drohaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:230_1: ca kurvatāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ saṃsargeṇa kāryākārya-viveka-virahāc ca samprati tyājyā eva-
GE07bhg4c02u:234: mahān sarvotkṛṣṭo 'nubhāvo vedādhyayana-brahmacaryādi-hetukaḥ prabhāvo yeṣāṃ tān |
GE07bhg4c02u:235: kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yad-vaśyās teṣāṃ tad-doṣa-sambandho neti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:237: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:238: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:239: iti bhīṣmokter artha-lobhena vikrītātmanāṃ teṣāṃ kuto mahānubhāvatā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:240: tato yuddhe hantavyās te iti cet tatrāha hatvārtha-kāmān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:241: artha-kāmān api gurūn hatvāham ihaiva loke bhogān bhuñjīya, na tu para-loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:242: tāṃś ca rudhira-pradigdhān tad-rudhira-miśrān eva, na tu śuddhān bhuñjīya tad-dhiṃsayā tal-lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:243: tathā ca yuddha-garvāvalepādi-mattve 'pi teṣāṃ mad-gurutvam asty eveti punar guru-grahaṇena sūcyate ||5||
GE07bhg4c02u:246: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo
GE07bhg4c02u:247: yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:251: kiṃ ca yadyapy adharmam aṅgīkariṣyāmaḥ tathāpi kim asmākaṃ jayaḥ parājayo vā garīyān bhaved iti na jñāyata ity āha na ced ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:252: etad dvayor madhye no 'smākaṃ katarat kiṃ nāma garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyatīti na vidmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:254: yad vā etān vayaṃ jayema jeṣyāmaḥ yadi vā no 'smān ete jayeyuḥ jeṣyantīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:255: jayo 'pi kiṃ cāsmākaṃ katarat jaya-parājayayor madhye kiṃ khalu garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyati etan na vidmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:256: tad eva pakṣa-dvayaṃ darśayati etān vayaṃ jayema, no 'smān vā ete jayeyur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:257: kiṃ ca jayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya evety āha yān eveti ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:259: nanu bhikṣāśanasya kṣatriyaṃ prati niṣiddhatvād yuddhasya ca vihitatvāt svadharmatvena yuddham eva tatra śreyaskaram ity āśaṅkyāha na caitad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:260: etad api na jānīmo bhaikṣa-yuddhayor madhye kataran no 'smākaṃ garīyaḥ śreṣṭham |
GE07bhg4c02u:261: kiṃ bhaikṣaṃ hiṃsā-śūnyatvād uta yuddhaṃ svadharmatvād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:262: idaṃ ca na vidma ārabdhe 'pi yuddhe yad vā vayaṃ jayemātiśayīmahi yadi vā no 'smān jayeyur dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:264: kiṃ ca jāto 'pi jayo naḥ phalataḥ parājaya eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:265: yato yān bandhūn hatvā jīvitum api vayaṃ necchāmaḥ kiṃ punar viṣayānupabhoktum ?
GE07bhg4c02u:266: ta evāvasthitāḥ saṃmukhe dhārtarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭra-sambandhino bhīṣma-droṇādayaḥ sarve 'pi |
GE07bhg4c02u:267: tasmād bhaikṣād yuddhasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ na siddham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:268: tad evaṃ prāktanena granthena saṃsāra-doṣa-nirūpaṇād adhikāri-viśeṣaṇāny uktāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:269_0: tatra na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity atra raṇe hatasya parivrāṭ-samāna-yoga-kṣematvokteḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:269_1: anyac chreyo 'nyad utaiva preyaḥ [KaṭhU 2.1] ity ādi-śruti-siddhaṃ śreyo mokṣākhyam upanyastam |
GE07bhg4c02u:270: arthāc ca tad itarad aśreya iti nityānitya-vastu-viveko darśitaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:272: api trailokya-rājyasya [Gītā 1.35] hetor ity atra pāralaukika-phala-virāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:273: narake niyataṃ vāsa [Gītā 1.44] ity atra sthūla-dehātirikta ātmā,
GE07bhg4c02u:274: kiṃ no rājyena [Gītā 1.32] iti vyākhyāta-vartmanā śamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:276: yadyapy ete na paśyanti [Gītā 1.38] ity atra nirlobhatā |
GE07bhg4c02u:277: tan me kṣemataraṃ bhaved [Gītā 1.46] ity atra titikṣā |
GE07bhg4c02u:279: | asmiṃs tv adhyāye śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam api [Gītā 2.5] ity atra bhikṣā-caryopalakṣitaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ pratipāditaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:281: kiṃ ca guru-drohe pravṛttasyāpi mama jayaḥ parājayo vā bhaved ity api na jñāyata ity āha na caitad ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:282: tathāpi no 'smākaṃ katarat jaya-parājayayor madhye kiṃ khalu garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyati etan na vidmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:283: tad eva pakṣa-dvayaṃ darśayati -- etān vayaṃ jayema, no 'smān vā ete jayeyur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:284: kiṃ ca jayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya evety āha yān eveti ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:286: yuddhaṃ ca sva-dharmaṃ vijānann api vibhāṣase iti cet tatrāha na caitad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:288: bhaikṣya-yuddhayor madhye no 'smākaṃ katarad garīyaḥ praśastataram |
GE07bhg4c02u:289: hiṃsā-virahād bhaikṣaṃ garīyaḥ svadharmatvād yuddhaṃ veti, etac ca na vidmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:290: samārabdhe yuddhe vayaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān jayema te vā no 'smān jayeyur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:291: nanu mahā-vikramiṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhānāṃ ca bhavatām eva vijayo bhāvīti cet tatrāha yān eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:293: na jijīviṣāmo jīvitum api necchāmaḥ kiṃ punar bhogān bhoktum ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:294: tathā ca vijayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:295: tasmād yuddhasya bhaikṣād garīyas tvam aprasiddham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:296: evam etāvatā granthena tasmād evaṃvic chānta-dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhānvito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet iti śruti-prasiddham arjunasya jñānādhikāritvaṃ darśitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:297: tatra kiṃ no rājyena [Gītā 1.32] iti śama-damau |
GE07bhg4c02u:299: bhaikṣaṃ bhoktuṃ śreya iti dvandva-sahiṣṇutva-lakṣaṇā titikṣā |
GE07bhg4c02u:301: na khalu śamādi-śūnyasya jñāne 'sty adhikāraḥ paṅgāder iva karmaṇīti ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:306: yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me
GE07bhg4c02u:307: śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam ||7||
GE07bhg4c02u:308: śrīdharaḥ : upadeśa-grahaṇe svādhikāraṃ sūcayati kārpaṇyety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:309: arthāt kārpaṇya-doṣopahata-svabhāvaḥ etān hatvā kathaṃ jīviṣyāma iti kārpaṇyaṃ dosaś ca svakula-kṣaya-kṛtaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:310: tābhyām upahato 'bhibhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ śauryādi-lakṣaṇo yasya so 'haṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmi,
GE07bhg4c02u:311: tathā dharme saṃmūḍhaṃ ceto yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:312: yuddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣāṭanam api kṣatriyasya dharmo 'dharmo veti sandigdha-cittaḥ sann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:313: ato me yan niścitaṃ śreyaḥ yuktaṃ syāt tad brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:315: atas tvāṃ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ śādhi śikṣaya ||7||
GE07bhg4c02u:317: gurūpasadanam idānīṃ pratipādyate samadhigata-saṃsāra-doṣa-jātasyātitarāṃ nirviṇṇasya vidhivad gurum upasannasyaiva vidyā-grahaṇe 'dhikārāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:319: vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti [BAU 3.5.1] iti śruti-siddha-bhikṣā-carye 'rjunasyābhilāṣaṃ pradarśya vidhivad gurūpasattim api tat-saṅkaṭa-vyājenaiva darśayati kārpaṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:320: yaḥ svalpām api citta-kṣatiṃ na kṣamate sa kṛpaṇa iti loke prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:322: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:323_0: tasya bhāvaḥ kārpaṇyam anātmādhyāsavattvaṃ tan-nimitto 'smin janmany eta eva madīyās
GE07bhg4c02u:323_1: teṣu hateṣu kiṃ jīvitenety abhiniveśa-rūpo mamatā-lakṣaṇo doṣas tenopahatas tiraskṛtaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:323_2: svabhāvaḥ kṣātro yuddhodyoga-lakṣaṇo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c02u:324: dharme viṣaye nirṇāyaka-pramāṇaādarśanāt saṃmūḍhaṃ kim eteṣāṃ vadho dharmaḥ kim etat-paripālanaṃ dharmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:325: tathā kiṃ pṛthvī-paripālanaṃ dharmaḥ kiṃ vā yathāvasthito 'raṇya-nivāsa eva dharma ity ādi-saṃśayair vyāptaṃ ceto yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c02u:326: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīya ity atra vyākhyātam
GE07bhg4c02u:327: etat | evaṃvidhaḥ sann ahaṃ tvā tvām idānīṃ pṛcchāmi śreya ity anuṣaṅgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:328: ato yan niścitam aikāntikam ātyantikaṃ ca śreyaḥ parama-pumartha-bhūtaṃ phalaṃ syāt tan me mahyaṃ brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:330: yathā hy auṣadhe kṛte kadācid roga-nivṛttir na bhaved api jātāpi ca roga-nivṛttiḥ punar api rogotpattyā vināśyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:331: evaṃ kṛte 'pi yāge pratibandha-vaśāt svargo na bhaved api jāto 'pi svargo duḥkhākrānto naśyati ceti naikāntikatvam ātyantikatvaṃ vā tayoḥ | tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c02u:336: nanu tvaṃ mama sakhā na tu śiṣyo 'ta āha śiṣyas te 'ham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:337: tvad-anuśāsanayogyatvād ahaṃ tava śiṣya eva bhavāmi na sakhā nyūna-jñānatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:338: atas tvāṃ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ śādhi śikṣaya karuṇayā na tv aśiṣyatva-śaṅkayopekṣaṇīyo 'ham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:339: etena - tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham [ṃuṇḍU 1.2.11],
GE07bhg4c02u:342: adhīhi bhagavo brahmeti [TaittU 3.1] ity ādi-gurūpasatti-pratipādakaḥ śruty-artho darśitaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c02u:344: nanu tarhi sopapattikaṃ śāstrārthaṃ tvam eva bruvāṇaḥ kṣatriyo bhūtvā bhikṣāṭanaṃ niścinoṣi tarhy alaṃ mad-uktyeti tatrāha kārpaṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:345: svābhāvikasya śauryasya tyāga eva me kārpaṇyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:346: dharmasya sūkṣmā gatir ity ato dharma-vyavasthāyām apy ahaṃ mūḍha-buddhir evāsmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:347: atas tvam eva niścitya śreyo brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:348: nanu mad-vācas tvaṃ paṇḍata-mānitvena khaṇḍayasi cet, kathaṃ brūyām ? tatrāha śiṣyas te 'ham asmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:351: atha tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham [ṃuṇḍU 1.2.11],
GE07bhg4c02u:352: ācāryavān puruṣo veda [Chā 6.14.2] ity ādi śruti-siddhāṃ gurūpasattiṃ darśayati kārpaṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:353: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śravaṇād abrahmavittvaṃ kārpaṇyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:354: tena hetunā yo doṣo yān eva hatveti bandhu-vargam amatālakṣaṇas tenopahata-svabhāvo yuddha-spṛhā-lakṣaṇaḥ svadharmo yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:355: dharme saṃmūḍhaṃ kṣatriyasya me yuddhaṃ svadharmas tad vihāya bhikṣāṭanaṃ vety evaṃ sandihānaṃ ceto yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:356: īdṛśaḥ sann ahaṃ tvām idānīṃ pṛcchāmi - tasmān niścitaṃ ekāntikaṃ ātyantikaṃ yan me śreyaḥ syāt tat tvaṃ brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:359: nanu śaraṇāgatasyopadeśaḥ tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet ity ādi-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:360: sakhāyaṃ tvāṃ katham upadiśāmīti cet tatrāha śiṣyas te 'ham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:368: śrīdharaḥ : tvam eva vicārya yad yuktaṃ tat kurv iti cet, tatrāha na hi prapaśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:369: indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇam atiśoṣaṇa-karaṃ madīyaṃ śokaṃ yat karma apanudyāt apanayet tad ahaṃ na prapaśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:370: yadyapi bhūmau niṣkaṇṭakaṃ samṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ prāpsyāmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:371: tathā surendratvam api yadi prāpsyāmi evam abhīṣṭaṃ tat tat sarvam avāpyāpi śokāpanodanopāyaṃ na prapaśyāmīty anvayaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c02u:373: nanu svayam eva tvaṃ śreyo vicāraya śruta-sampanno 'si kiṃ para-śiṣyatvenety ata āha nahīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:374_0: yac-chreyaḥ prāptaṃ sat-kartṛ mama śokam apanudyād apanuden nivārayet tan na paśyāmi
GE07bhg4c02u:374_1: hi yasmāt tasmān māṃ śādhīti so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñ chokasya pāraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:375: śokānapanode ko doṣa ity āśaṅkya tad-viśeṣaṇam āha indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:377: nanu yuddhe prayatamānasya tava śoka-nivṛttir bhaviṣyati jeṣyasi cet tadā rājya-prāptyā dvāv etau puruṣau loke ity ādi-dharma-śāstrād ity āśaṅkyāha avāpyety ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:378: śatru-varjitaṃ sasyādi-sampannaṃ ca rājyaṃ tathā surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhatva-paryantam aiśvaryam avāpya sthitasyāpi mama yac chokam apanudyāt tan na paśyāmīty anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:379: tad yatheha karma-jito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate [Chā 8.1.6] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:380_0: yat-kṛtakaṃ tad-anityam ity anumānāt pratyakṣeṇāpy aihikānāṃ vināśa-darśanāc ca naihika
GE07bhg4c02u:380_1: āmutriko vā bhogaḥ śoka-nivartakaḥ kintu sva-sattā-kāle 'pi bhoga-pāratantryādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:380_2: vināśa-kāle 'pi vicchedāc choka-janaka eveti na yuddhaṃ śoka-nivṛttaye 'nuṣṭheyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:383: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu mayi tava sakhya-bhāva eva, na tu gauravam |
GE07bhg4c02u:384: atas tvāṃ katham ahaṃ śiṣyaṃ karomi ?
GE07bhg4c02u:385: tasmād yatra tava gauravaṃ taṃ kam api dvaipāyanādikaṃ prapadyasva ity ata āha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:386: mama śokam apanudyāt dūrīkuryād evaṃ janaṃ na prakarṣeṇa paśyāmi trijagaty ekaṃ tvāṃ vinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:387: svasmād adhika-buddhimantaṃ bṛhaspatim api na jānāmīty ataḥ śokārta eva khalu kaṃ prapadyeya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:388: yad yataḥ śokād indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇaṃ mahā-nidāghāt kṣudra-sarasām iva utkarṣeṇa śoṣo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:389: nanu tarhi sāmprataṃ tvaṃ śokārta eva khalu yudhyasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:390: tataś caitān jitvā rājyaṃ prātavatas tava rājya-bhogābhiniveśenaiva śoko 'payāsyatīty āha avāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:391: bhūmau niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ svarge surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ vā prāpyāpi sthitasya mamendriyāṇām etad ucchoṣaṇam evety arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c02u:392: baladevaḥ : nanu tvaṃ śāstrajño 'si sva-hitaṃ vicāryānutiṣṭha,
GE07bhg4c02u:393: sakhyur me śiṣyaḥ kathaṃ bhaver iti cet tatrāha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:394: yat karma mama śokam apanudyād dūrīkuryāt tad ahaṃ na prapaśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:397: itthaṃ ca so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ māṃ bhavān śokasya pāraṃ tārayatu iti śruty-artho darśitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:398: nanu tvam adhunā śokākulaḥ prapadyase yuddhāt sukha-samṛddhi-lābhe viśoko bhaviṣyasīti cet tatrāha avāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:399_0: yadi yuddhe vijayī syāṃ tadā bhūmāv asapatnaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ prāpya yadi ca tatra
GE07bhg4c02u:399_1: hataḥ syāṃ tadā svarge surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ prāpya sthitasya me viśokatvaṃ na bhaved ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:400_0: tad yatheha karma-jito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate [ChāU
GE07bhg4c02u:400_1: 8.1.6] iti śruter naihikaṃ pāratrikaṃ vā yuddha-labdhaṃ sukhaṃ śokāpahaṃ tasmāt tādṛśam
GE07bhg4c02u:400_2: eva śreyastvaṃ brūhīti na yuddhaṃ śoka-haram ||8 ||
GE07bhg4c02u:405: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha ||9||
GE07bhg4c02u:407: evam uktvārjunaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ity ādi | spaṣṭārthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c02u:409: tad-anantaram arjunaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān iti dhṛtarāṣṭrākāṅkṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:410_0: guḍākeśo jitālasyaḥ parantapaḥ śatru-tāpano 'rjuno hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvendriya-pravartakatvenāntaryāmiṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:410_1: govindaṃ gāṃ veda-lakṣaṇāṃ vāṇīṃ vindatīti vyutpattyā sarva-vedopādānatvena sarvajñam
GE07bhg4c02u:410_2: ādāv evaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhya ity ādinā yuddha-svarūpāyogyatām uktvā tad-anantaraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:410_3: na yotsya iti yuddha-phalābhāvaṃ coktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva bāhyendriya-vyāpārasya yuddhārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:410_4: pūrvaṃ kṛtasya nivṛttyā nirvyāpāro jāta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:411: svabhāvato jitālasye sarva-śatru-tāpane ca tasminn āgantukam ālasyam atāpakatvaṃ ca nāspadam ādhāsyatīti dyotayituṃ ha-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:415: baladevaḥ : tato 'rjunaḥ kim akarod ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam uktvety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:416: guḍākeśo hṛṣīkeśaṃ prati evaṃ na hi prapaśyāmīty ādinā yuddhasya śokānivartakatvam uktvā parantapo 'pi govindaṃ sarva-vedajñaṃ prati na yotsye iti coktveti yojyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:418: sarva-veda-vittvād yuddhe sva-dharmatvaṃ grāhayiṣyatīti vyajya dhṛtarāṣṭra-hṛdi saṃjātā sva-putra-rājyāśā nirasyate ||9||
GE07bhg4c02u:421: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata |
GE07bhg4c02u:422: senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:423: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyām āha tam uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:424: prahasann iva prasanna-mukhaḥ sann ity arthaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:426: evaṃ yuddham upekṣitavaty apy arjune bhagavān nopekṣitavān iti dhṛtarāṣṭra-durāśā-nirāsāyā 'ha tam uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:427_0: senayor ubhayor madhye yuddhodyamenāgatya tad-virodhinaṃ viṣādaṃ mohaṃ prāpnuvantaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:427_1: tam arjunaṃ prahasann ivānucitācāraṇa-prakāśanena lajjāmbudhau majjayann iva hṛṣīkeśaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:427_2: sarvāntaryāmī bhagavān idaṃ vakṣyamāṇam aśocyān ity ādi vacaḥ parama-gambhīrārtham
GE07bhg4c02u:427_3: anucitācaraṇa-prakāśakam uktavān na t”pekṣitavān ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:429: lajjā ca duḥkhātmiketi dveṣa-viṣaya eva sa mukhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:430: arjunasya tu bhagavat-kṛpā-viṣayatvād anucitācaraṇa-prakāśanasya ca vivekotpatti-hetutvād eka-dalābhāvena gauṇa evāyaṃ prahāsa iti kathayitum iva-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:431: lajjām utpādayitum iva vivkam utpādayitum arjunasyānucitācaraṇaṃ bhagavatā prakāśyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:432: lajjotpattis tu nāntarīyakatayāstu māstu veti na vivakṣiteti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:433: yadi hi yuddhārambhāt prāg eva sthito yuddham upekṣeta tadā nānucitaṃ kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:434: mahatā saṃrambheṇa tu yuddha-bhūmāv āgatya tad-upekṣaṇam atīvānucitam iti kathayituṃ senayor ity ādi-viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:437_0: aho tvāpy etāvān khalv aviveka iti sakhya-bhāvena taṃ prahasan anaucitya-prakāśena
GE07bhg4c02u:437_1: lajjāmbudhau nimajjayan iveti tadānīṃ śiṣya-bhāvaṃ prāpte tasmin hāsyam anucitam
GE07bhg4c02u:437_2: ity adharoṣṭha-nikuñcanena hāsyam āvṛṇvaṃś cety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:438: hṛṣīkeśa iti pūrvaṃ premāivārjuna-vāṅ-niyamyo 'pi sāmpratam arjuna-hita-kāritvāt premṇaivārjuna-mano-niyantāpi bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:439: senayor ubhayor madhe ity arjunasya viṣādo bhagavatā prabodhaś ca ubhābhyāṃ senābhyāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭa eveti bhāvaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:441: vyaṅgam arthaṃ prakāśayann āha tam uvāceti taṃ viṣīdantam arjunaṃ prati hṛṣīkeśo bhagavān aśocyān ity ādikam atigambhīrārthaṃ vacanam uvāca |
GE07bhg4c02u:444: iveti tadaiva śiṣyatāṃ prāpte tasmin hāsānaucityādīṣad adharollāsaṃ kurvann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:445: arjunasya viṣādo bhagavatā tasyopadeśaś ca sarva-sākṣika iti bodhayituṃ senayor ubhayor ity etat ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:449: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase |
GE07bhg4c02u:452: dehātmanor avivekād asyaivaṃ śoko bhavatīti tad-viveka-darśanārthaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśocyān ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:453: śokasyāviṣayī-bhūtān eva bandhūn tvam anvaśocaḥ anuśocitavān asi dṛṣṭvemān svajanān kṛṣṇa ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:454: tatra kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam ity ādinā mayā bodhito 'pi punaś ca prajñāvatāṃ paṇḍitānāṃ vādān śabdān kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādīn kevalaṃ bhāṣase,
GE07bhg4c02u:456: yataḥ gatāsūn gata-prāṇān bandhūn agatāsūṃś ca jīvato 'pi,
GE07bhg4c02u:457: bandhu-hīnā ete kathaṃ jīviṣyantīti nānuśocanti paṇḍitā vivekinaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c02u:459: viśvanāthaḥ : bho arjuna ! tavāyaṃ bandha-vadha-hetukaḥ śoko bhrama-mūlaka eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:460: tathā kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādiko vivekaś cāprajñā-mūlaka evety āha aśocyān ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:461: aśocyān śokānārhān eva tvam anvaśoco 'nuśocitavān asi |
GE07bhg4c02u:462: tathā tvāṃ prabodhayantaṃ māṃ prati prajñā-vādān prajñāyāṃ satyām eva ye vādāḥ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādīni vākyāni tān bhāṣase,
GE07bhg4c02u:463: na tu tava kāpi prajñā vartate iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:464: yataḥ paṇḍitāḥ prajñāvanto gatāsūn gatā niḥsṛtā bhavanty asavo yebhyas tān sthūla-dehān na śocanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:466: agatāsūn aniḥsṛta-prāṇān sūkṣma-dehān api na śocanti, te hi mukteḥ pūrvaṃ naśvarā eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:467: ubhayeṣām api tathā tathā svabhāvasya duṣpariharatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:469: prāṇeṣu niḥsṛteṣv eva śocanti, sūkṣma-dehāṃs tu na, te prāyaḥ paricinvantyas atas tair alam |
GE07bhg4c02u:470: ete hi sarve bhīṣmādayaḥ sthūla-sūkṣma-deha-sahitā ātmāna eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:471_0: ātmanāṃ tu ityatvāt teṣu śoka-pravṛttir eva nāstīty atas tvayā yat pūrvam artha-śāstrāt
GE07bhg4c02u:471_1: dharma-śāstraṃ balavad ity uktaṃ tatra mayā tu dharma-śāstrād api jñāna-śāstraṃ balavad
GE07bhg4c02u:472: baladevaḥ : evaṃ arjune tūṣṇīṃ sthite tad-buddhim ākṣipan bhagavān āha aśocyān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:473: he arjuna ! aśocyān śocitum ayogyān eva dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tvaṃ anvaśocaḥ śocitavān asi |
GE07bhg4c02u:474: tathā māṃ prati prajñā-vādān prajñāvatām iva vacanāni dṛṣṭvemaṃ svajanam ity ādīni,
GE07bhg4c02u:475: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ity ādīni ca bhāṣase,
GE07bhg4c02u:476: na ca te prajñā-leśo 'py astīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:477: ye tu prajñāvantas te gatāsūn nirgata-prāṇān sthūla-dehān,
GE07bhg4c02u:481: nāntyaḥ sūkṣma-dehānāṃ mukteḥ prāg avaināśitvāt tadvatām ātmanāṃ tu ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-varjitānāṃ nityatvān na śocyāteti |
GE07bhg4c02u:485: tat kila tato 'pi balavatā jñāna-śāstreṇa pratyucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:486: tasmād aśocye śocya-bhramaḥ pāmara-sādhāraṇaḥ paṇḍitasya te na yogya iti bhāvaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c02u:489: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:490: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param ||12||
GE07bhg4c02u:491: śrīdharaḥ : aśocyatve hetum āha na tv evāham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:492: yathāhaṃ parameśvaro jātu kadācit līlā-vigrahasyāvirbhāva-tirobhāvato nāsam iti tu naiva |
GE07bhg4c02u:494: na ca tvaṃ nāsīḥ nābhūḥ, api tv āsīr eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:495: ime vā janādhipā nṛpā nāsann iti na, api tu āsann eva mad-aṃśatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:496: tathātaḥ param ita upary api na bhaviṣyāmo na sthāsyāma iti ca naiva,
GE07bhg4c02u:497: api tu sthāsyāma eveti janma-maraṇa-śūnyatvād aśocyā ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c02u:499: viśvanāthaḥ : athavā sakhe tvām aham evaṃ pṛcchāmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:500: kiṃ ca prītyāspadasya maraṇe dṛṣṭe sati śoko jāyate, tatreha prītyāspadam ātmā deho vā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:501_0: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ nṛpa svātmaiva vallabhaḥ [BhP 10.14.57] iti śukokter ātmaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:501_1: prīty-āspadam iti cet tarhi jīveśvara-bhedena dvividhasyaivātmano nityatvād eva maraṇābhāvād
GE07bhg4c02u:501_2: ātmā śokasya viṣayo nety āha na tv evāham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:502: ahaṃ paramātmā jātu kadācid api pūrvaṃ nāsam iti na, api tv āsam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:503: tathā tvam api jīvātmā āsīr eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:504: tatheme janādhipā rājānaś ca jīvātmāna āsann eveti prāg-abhāvābhāvo darśitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:505: tathā sarve vayam ahaṃ tvam ime janādhipāś cātaḥ paraṃ na bhaviṣyāmo na sthāsyāma iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:506: api tu sthāsyāma eveti dhvaṃsābhāvaś ca darśita iti paramātmano jīvātmanāṃ ca nityatvād ātmā na śoka-viṣaya iti sādhitam
GE07bhg4c02u:507: | atra śrutayaḥ - nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] ity ādyāḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c02u:509_0: evam asthāna-śocitvād apāṇḍityam arjunasyāpādya tattva-jijñāsuṃ niyojitāñjaliṃ taṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:509_1: prati sarveśvaro bhagavān nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti
GE07bhg4c02u:509_2: kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] iti śruti-siddhaṃ svasmāj jīvānāṃ ca pāramarthikaṃ bhedam āha na tv evāham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:510: he arjuna ! ahaṃ sarveśvaro bhagavān itaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:511: pūrvasminn ādau kāle jātu kadācin nāsam iti na, api tv āsam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:512: tathā tvam arjuno nāsīr iti na, kintv āsīr eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:513: ime janādhipā rājāno nāsann iti na, kintv āsann eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:514: tathetaḥ parasminn ante kāle sarve vayam ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ime ca na bhaviṣyāma iti na,
GE07bhg4c02u:516: sarveśvaravaj jīvānāṃ ca traikālika-sattā-yogitvāt tad-viṣayako na śoko yukta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:519: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya ity ādinā mokṣe 'pi tasyābhidāsyamānatvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:520: na cābhedajñasyāpi harer bādhitānuvṛtti-nyāyeneyam arjunādi-bheda-dṛṣṭir iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:522: maru-marīcikādāv udaka-buddhir bādhitāpy anuvartamānā mithyārtha-viṣayatva-niścayān nodakāharaṇādau pravartayed evam abheda-bodha-bādhitāpy anuvartamānārjunādi-bheda-dṛṣṭis
GE07bhg4c02u:523: tattva-niścayān nopadeśādau pravartayiṣyatīti yat kiñcid etat |
GE07bhg4c02u:524: nanu phalavaty ajñāte 'rthe śāstra-tātparya-vīkṣaṇāt tādṛśo 'bhedas tātparya-viṣayo vaiphalyāj jñātatvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:526: kintu adbhyo vā eṣa prātar udety apaḥ sāyaṃ praviśati ity ādi-śruty-arthavad anuvādya eva sa iti cen mandam etat |
GE07bhg4c02u:527: pṛthag ātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā juṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti [ŚvetU 1.6] ity ādinā bheda evāmṛtatva-phala-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:529: te ca dharmā vibhutvāṇutva-svāmitva-bhṛtyatvādayaḥ śāstraika-gamyā mitho viruddhā bodhyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:535: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā |
GE07bhg4c02u:536: tathā dehāntara-prāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati ||13||
GE07bhg4c02u:537: śrīdharaḥ : nanv īśvarasya tava janmādi-śūnyatvaṃ satyam eva, jīvānāṃ tu janma-maraṇe prasiddhe |
GE07bhg4c02u:539: dehino dehābhimānino jīvasya yathāsmin sthūla-dehe kaumārādy-avasthās tad-deha-nibandhanā eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:541: vasthāntarotpattāv api sa evāham iti pratyabhijñānāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:543: na tāvad ātmano nāśaḥ, jāta-mātrasya pūrva-saṃskāreṇa stanya-pānādau pravṛtti-darśanāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:544: ato dhīro dhīmān tatra tayor deha-nāśotpattyor na muhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:545: ātmaiva mṛto jātaś ceti na manyate ||13||
GE07bhg4c02u:547: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu cātma-sambandhena deho 'pi prīty-āspadaṃ syāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:550: atas teṣāṃ nāśe śokaḥ syād eveti ced ata āha dehina iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:551: dehino jīvasyāsmin dehe kaumāra kaumāraṃ kaumāra-prāptir bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:552: tataḥ kaumāra-nāśānantaraṃ jarā-prāptir yathā tathaiva dehāntara-prāptir iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:553: tatas cātma-sambandhināṃ kaumārādīnāṃ prīty-āspadānāṃ nāśe yathā śoko na kriyate tathā dehasyāpi ātma-sambandhinaḥ prītyāspadasya nāśe śoko na kartavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:554_0: yauvanasya nāśe jarā-prāptau śoko jāyate iti cet kaumārasya nāśe yauvana-prāptau
GE07bhg4c02u:554_1: harṣo 'pi jāyate ity ato bhīṣma-droṇādīnāṃ jīrṇa-deha-nāśe khalu navya-dehāntara-prāptau
GE07bhg4c02u:555: yad vā, ekasminn api dehe kaumārādīnāṃ yathā prāptis tathaivaikasyāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:558: nanu bhīṣmādi-dehāvacchinnānām ātmanāṃ nityatve 'pi tad-dehānāṃ tad-bhogāyatanānāṃ nāśe yuktaḥ śoka iti cet tatrāha dehino 'sminn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:560: tasya dehino jīvasyāsmin vartamāne dehe kramāt kaumāra-yauvana-jarās tisro 'vasthā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:561_1: yathā na śokas tathaiva tad-deha-vināśe sati dehāntara-prāptir yayāti-yauvana-prāpti-nyāyena harṣa-hetur eveti,
GE07bhg4c02u:562: na tad-deha-vināśa-hetukaḥ śokas tavocita iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:564: atra dehina ity eka-vacanaṃ jāty-abhiprāyeṇa bodhyaṃ pūrvatrātma-bahutvokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:565: atrāhuḥ - eka eva viśuddhātmā tasyāvidyayāparicchinnasya tasyāṃ pratibimbitasya vā nānātmatvam |
GE07bhg4c02u:566: śrutiś caivam āha ākāśam ekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthag bhavet,
GE07bhg4c02u:567: tathātmaiko hy anekastho jalādhāreṣv ivāṃśumān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:568: tad-vijñānena tasya vināśe tu tan-nānātva-nivṛttyā tad-aikyaṃ sidhyatīty eka-vacanenaitat pārtha-sārathir āheti |
GE07bhg4c02u:571: vāstave cchede vikāritvādy-āpattiḥ ṭaṅka-chinna-pāṣāṇavat syāt - nīrūpasya vibhoḥ pratibimbāsambhavāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:573: na ca pratīty-anyathānupapattir evākāśasya pratibimbe mānaṃ tad-varti-graha-nakṣatra-prabhā-maṇḍalaṃ tasyiavāmbhasi bhāsamānatvena pratīteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:574: ākāśam ekaṃ hi iti śrutis tu paramātma-viṣayā
GE07bhg4c02u:575: tasyākāśavat sūryavac ca bahu-vṛttikatvaṃ vadatīty aviruddham |
GE07bhg4c02u:577: sa hi tattvavin na vā ? ādye 'dvitīyam ātmānaṃ vijānatas tasyopadeśyāpari-sphūrtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:584: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tān ahaṃ na śocāmi,
GE07bhg4c02u:585: kintu tad-viyogādi-duḥkha-bhājaṃ mām eveti cet tatrāha mātrā-sparśā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:586: mīyante jāyante viṣayā ābhir iti mātrā indriya-vṛttayaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:591: yathā jalātapādi-saṃsargās tat-tat-kāla-kṛtāḥ svabhāvataḥ śītoṣṇādi prayacchanti evam iṣṭa-saṃyoga-viyogā api sukha-duḥkhāni prayacchanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:592: teṣāṃ cāsthiratvāt sahanaṃ tava dhīrasyocitaṃ na tu tan-nimitta-harṣa-viṣāda-pāravaśyam ity arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c02u:595: tad apy avivekino mama mana evānarthakāni vṛtahiva śoka-moha-vyāptaṃ duḥkhayatīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:596: tatra na kevalam ekaṃ mana evāpi tu manaso vṛttayo 'pi sarvās tv agādīndriya-rūpāḥ sva-viṣayān anubhāvyānarthakāriṇya ity āha mātrā indriya-grāhya-viṣayās teṣāṃ sparśā anubhavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:597: śītoṣṇety āgamāpāyina iti yad eva śītala-jalādikam uṣṇa-kāle sukhadam |
GE07bhg4c02u:598: tad eva śīta-kāle duḥkhadam ato 'niyatatvād āgamāpāyitvāc ca tān viṣayānubhavān titikṣasva sahasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:600: nahi māghe māsi jalasya duḥkhatva-buddhyaiva śāstre vihitaḥ snāna-rūpo dharmas tyajyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:602: evam eva ye putra-bhrātrādyotpatti-kāle dhanādy-upārjana-kāle ca sukhadās ta eva mṛtyu-kāle duḥkhadā āgamāpāyino
GE07bhg4c02u:604: na tu tad-anurodhena yuddha-rūpaḥ śāstra-vihitaḥ sva-dharmas tyājyo vihita-dharmānācaraṇaṃ khalu kāle mahānarthakṛd eveti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c02u:605: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādayo mṛtāḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīti tad-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śoko mābhūt |
GE07bhg4c02u:606: tad-viccheda-duḥkha-nimittas tu me mana-prabhṛtīni pradahantīti cet tatrāha mātreti |
GE07bhg4c02u:607: mātrās tv agādīndriya-vṛttayaḥ mīyante paricchidyante viṣayā abhir iti vyutpatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:608: sparśās tābhir viṣayāṇām anubhavānte khalu śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkhadā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:609: yad eva śītalam udakaṃ grīṣme sukhadaṃ tad eva hemante duḥkhadam ity ato 'niyatatvād āgamāpāyitvāc cānityān asthirāṃs tān titikṣasva sahasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:610: etad uktaṃ bhavati māgha-snānaṃ duḥkha-karam api dharmatayā vidhānād yathā kriyate tathā bhīṣmādibhiḥ saha yuddhaṃ duḥkha-karam api tathā vidhānāt kāryam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:611: tatratyo duḥkhānubhavas tv āgantuko dharma-siddhatvāt soḍhavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:613: tasya nānuvṛttiś ca jñāna-niṣṭhā paripākaṃ vinaiva dharma-tyāgas tv anartha-hetur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:614: kaunteya bhārateti padābhyām ubhaya-kula-śuddhasya te dharma-bhraṃśo nocita iti sūcyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c02u:617: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha |
GE07bhg4c02u:619: śrīdharaḥ : tat-pratikāra-prayatnād api tat-sahanam evocitaṃ mahā-phalatvād ity āha yaṃ hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:620: ete mātrā-sparśā yaṃ puruṣaṃ na vyathayanti nābhibhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:622: sa tair avikṣipyamāṇo dharma-jñāna-dvārā amṛtatvāya mokṣāya kalpate yogyo bhavati ||15||
GE07bhg4c02u:624: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ vicāreṇa tat-tat-sahanābhyāse sati te viṣayānubhavāḥ kāle kila nāpi duḥkhayanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:625: yadi ca na duḥkhayanti, tadātma-muktiḥ sva-pratyāsannaivety āha yam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:627: baladevaḥ : dharmārtha-duḥkha-sahanābhyāsasyottaratra sukha-hetutvaṃ darśayann āha yaṃ hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:628_0: ete mātrā-sparśāḥ priyāpriya-viṣayānubhāvā yaṃ dhīraṃ dhiyam īrayati dharmeṣv iti
GE07bhg4c02u:628_1: vyutpatter dharma-niṣṭhaṃ puruṣaṃ na vyathayanti sukha-duḥkha-mūrcchitaṃ na kurvanti
GE07bhg4c02u:629: na tu tādṛśo duḥkha-sukha-mūrcchita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:630: uktam arthaṃ sphuṭayan puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi sameti |
GE07bhg4c02u:631: dharmānuṣṭhānasya kaṣṭa-sādhyatvād duḥkham anuṣaṅga-labdhaṃ sukhaṃ ca yasya samaṃ bhavati tābhyāṃ mukha-mlānitollāsa-rahitam ity arthaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c02u:634: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:635: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattva-darśibhiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c02u:636: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tathāpi śītoṣṇādikam atiduḥsahaṃ kathaṃ soḍhavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:637: atyantaṃ tat-sahane ca kadācid deha-nāśaḥ syād ity āśaṅkya tattva-vicārataḥ sarvaṃ soḍhuṃ śakyam ity āśayenāha nāsato vidyata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:638: asato 'nātma-dharmatvād avidyamānasya śītoṣṇāder ātmani bhāvaḥ sattā na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:639: tathā sataḥ sat-svabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvo nāśo na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:640: evam ubhayoḥ sad-asator anto nirṇayo dṛṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:644: viśvanāthaḥ : etac ca viveka-daśān adhirūḍhān prati uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:645: vastutas tu asaṅgo hy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ iti śruter jīvātmanaś ca sthūla-sūkṣma-dehābhyāṃ tad-dharmaiḥ śoka-mohādibhiś ca sambandho nāsty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:646: tat-sambandhasya avidyā kalpitatvād ity āha neti |
GE07bhg4c02u:647: asato 'nātma-dharmatvād ātmani jīve avartamānasya śoka-mohādes tad-āśrayasya dehasya ca bhāvaḥ sattā nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:648: tathā sataḥ satya-rūpasya jīvātmano 'bhāvo nāśo nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:649: tasmād ubhayor etayor asat-sator anto nirṇayo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:650: tena bhīṣmādiṣu tvad-ādiṣu ca jīvātmasu satyatvād anaśvareṣu deha-daihika-viveka-śoka-mohādayo naiva santi kathaṃ bhīṣmādayo naṅkṣanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:651: kathaṃ vā tāṃs tvaṃ śocasīti bhāvaḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c02u:652: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ bhagavatā pārthasyāsthānāśocitvena tat-pāṇḍityam ākṣiptam |
GE07bhg4c02u:653: śoka-haraṃ ca svopāsanam eva tac copāsopāsaka-bheda-ghaṭitam ity upāsyāj jīvāṃśinaḥ svasmād upāsakānāṃ jīvāṃśānāṃ tāttvikaṃ dvaitam upadiṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c02u:654_0: atha yad ātma-tattvena tu brahma-tattvaṃ dīpopameneha yuktaḥ prapaśyet [ŚvetU 2.15]
GE07bhg4c02u:654_2: sarvān pratyaviśeṣeṇopadeśyaṃ tac ca dehātmanor vaidharmya-dhiyam antarā na syād
GE07bhg4c02u:655: asataḥ pariṇāmino dehāder bhāvo 'pariṇāmitvaṃ na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:656: sato ' pariṇāmina ātmanas tv abhāvaḥ pariṇāmitvaṃ na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:659: anto nirṇayas tattva-darśibhis tad-ubhaya-svabhāva-vedibhiḥ puruṣair dṛṣṭo 'nubhūtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:660: atrāsac-chabdena vinaśvaraṃ dehādi jaḍaṃ sac-chabdena tv avinaśvaram ātma-caitanyam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:661: evam eva śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe 'pi nirṇītaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur [ViP 2.12.38] ity upakramya yad asti yan nāsti ca vipra-varya [?] ity asti |
GE07bhg4c02u:662: nāsti-śabda-vācyayoś cetana-jaḍayos tathātvaṃ vastv asti kiṃ kutradcid ity ādibhir nirūpitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:664: asti-śabdavātyaṃ tu caitanyam iti svayam eva vivṛtam |
GE07bhg4c02u:665: yat tu sat-kārya-vāda-sthāpanāyai tat-padyam ity āhus tan-niravadhānaṃ dehātma-svabhāvānabhijñāna-mohitaṃ prati tan-moha-vinivṛttaye tat-svabhāvābhijñāpanasya prakṛtatvāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c02u:668: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam |
GE07bhg4c02u:669: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati ||17||
GE07bhg4c02u:671: atra sat-svabhāvam avināśi vastu sāmānyenoktaṃ tataṃ tat-sākṣitvena vyāptaṃ taṃ tu ātma-svarūpam avināśi vināśa-śūnyaṃ viddhi jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:674: viśvanāthaḥ : nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati avināśīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:675: taṃ jīvātma-svarūpaṃ yena sarvam idaṃ śarīraṃ tataṃ vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c02u:676: nanu śarīra-mātra-vyāpi-caitanyatve jīvātmano madhyama-parimāṇatvena anityatva-prasaktiḥ ? maivam |
GE07bhg4c02u:677: sūkṣmāṇām apy ahaṃ jīvaḥ iti bhagavad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:678: eṣoṇur ātmā cetasā veditavyo yasmin prāṇaḥ pañcadhā saṃviveśa iti,
GE07bhg4c02u:681: ārāgra-mātro hy aparo 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ iti śrutibhyaś ca tasya paramāṇu-parimāṇatvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:682: tad api sampūrṇa-deha-vyāpi-śaktimattvaṃ jatu-jaṭitasya mahā-maṇer mahauṣadhi-khaṇḍasya vā śirasy urasi vā dhṛtasya sampūrṇa-deha-puṣṭi-karaṇa-śaktimattvam iva nāsamañjasam |
GE07bhg4c02u:684: tad uktaṃ prāṇam adhikṛtya dattātrayeṇa yena saṃsarate pumān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:685: ataevāsya sarva-gatatvam apy agrima-śloke vakṣyamāṇaṃ nāsamañjasam |
GE07bhg4c02u:686: ataevāvyayasya nityasya nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:688: nanu deho jīvātmā paramātmety etad vastu-trikaṃ manuṣya-tiryag-ādiṣu sarvatra dṛśyate,
GE07bhg4c02u:689: tatrādyayor deha-jīvayos tattvaṃ nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ ity anenoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:690: tṛtīyasya paramātma-vastunaḥ kiṃ tattvam ity ata āha avināśi tv iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:692: paramātmano māyā-jīvābhyāṃ svarūpataḥ pārthakyād idaṃ jagat ||17||
GE07bhg4c02u:693: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ jīvātma-dehayoḥ svabhāvaṃ viśadayaty avināśīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:695: yena sarvam idaṃ śarīraṃ tataṃ dharma-bhūtena jñānena vyāptam asti |
GE07bhg4c02u:696: asyāvyayasya parmāṇutvena ca vināśānarhasya vināśaṃ na kaścit sthūlo 'rthaḥ kartum arhati prāṇasyeva dehaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:698: eṣo 'ṇur ātmā cetasā veditavyo yasmin prāṇaḥ pañcadhā saṃviveśa [ṃuṇḍU 3.1.9] ity ādiṣu tasya paramāṇutva-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:700: evam āha bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ - guṇād vālokavad [Vs. 2.3.26] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:701: ihāpi svayaṃ vakṣyati yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ [Gītā 13.33] ity ādinā ||17||
GE07bhg4c02u:707: anto vināśo vidyate yeṣāṃ te antavantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:709: ataevānāśino vināśa-rahitasya aprameyasyaparicchinnasyātmana ime sukha-duḥkhādi-dharmaka-dehā uktās tattva-darśibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:715_0: nanu sphuraṇa-rūpasya sataḥ katham avināśitvaṃ tasya deha-dharmatvād dehasya cānukṣaṇa-vināśād
GE07bhg4c02u:715_1: iti bhūta-caitanya-vādinas tān nirākurvann āsato vidyate bhāva ity etad vivṛṇoti antavanta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:716: antavanto vināśina ime 'parokṣā dehā upacitāpacita-rūpatvāc charīrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:717_1: sarve nityasyāvināśina eva śarīriṇa ādhyāsika-sambandhena śarīravataekasyātmanaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:717_2: sva-prakāśa-sphuraṇa-rūpasya sambandhino dṛśyatvena bhogyatvena coktāḥ śrutibhir
GE07bhg4c02u:718: tathā ca taittirīyake 'nnamayādyānandamayānantān pañca kośān kalpayitvā tad-adhiṣṭhānam akalpitaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā [TaittU 2.5] iti darśitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:721_1: amūrta-rāśiḥ sūkṣma-samaṣṭiḥ trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma [BAU 1.6.1] iti bṛhad-āraṇyakokta-try-annātmakaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:723: rūpātmakatvena tad-ubhayāśrayatayā kartṛtvam ādāya vijñāna-maya-kośa uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:726: te ca sarva ekasyaivātmanaḥ śarīrāṇīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:729: tasya prāṇa-mayasyaiṣa eva śarīre bhavaḥ śārīra ātmā yaḥ satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇo guhā-nihitatvenoktaḥ pūrvasyānna-mayasya |
GE07bhg4c02u:731: athaveme sarve dehās trailokya-varti-sarva-prāṇi-sambandhina ekasyaivātmana uktā iti yojanā | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:736: iti sarva-śarīra-sambandhinam ekam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ darśayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:737: nanu nityatvaṃ yāvat-kāla-sthāyitvaṃ tathā cāvidyādivat kālena saha nāśe 'pi tad-upapannam ity ata āha anāśina iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:738_0: deśataḥ kālato vastutaś caparicchinasyāvidyādeḥ kalpitatvenānityatve 'pi yāvat-kāla-sthāyi-svarūpam
GE07bhg4c02u:738_1: aupacārikaṃ nityatvaṃ vyavahriyate yāvad-vikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat [Vs 2.3.7] iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:739: ātmanas tu pariccheda-traya-śūnyasyākalpitasya vināśa-hetv-abhāvān mukhyam eva kūṭastha-nityatvaṃ na tu pariṇāmi-nityatvaṃ yāvat-kāla-sthāyitvaṃ cety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:740: nanv etādṛśe dehini kiṃcit pramāṇam avaśyaṃ vācyam anyathā niṣpramāṇasya tasyālīkatvāpatteḥ śāstrārambha-vaiyarthyāpatteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:741: tathā ca vastu-paricchedo duṣpariharaḥ śāstra-yonitvāt [Vs 1.1.3] iti nyāyāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:743: ekadhaivānudraṣṭavyam etad apramayaṃ dhruvam [BAU 4.7.2] apramayam aprameyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:744: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:748: iti ca śruteḥ sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpa evātmātas tasya sarva-bhāsakasya svabhānārthaṃ na svabhāsyāpekṣā,
GE07bhg4c02u:754: svataḥ sarvadābhāsamānatvāt sarva-kalpanādhiṣṭhānatvād dṛśyamātra-bhāsakatvāc ca na tasya tucchatvāpattiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:755: tathā caikam evādvitīyaṃ satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmety ādi-śāstram eva sva-prameyānurodhena svasyāpi kalpitatvam āpādayati anyathā sva-prāmāṇyānupapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:757: ātmanaḥ svaprakāśatvaṃ ca yuktito 'pi bhagavat-pūjyapādair upapāditam |
GE07bhg4c02u:758: tathā hi - yatra jijñāsoḥ saṃśaya-viparyaya-vyatireka-pramāṇānām anyatamam api nāsti tatra tad-virodhi jñānam iti sarvatra dṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c02u:760: ātmani cāhaṃ vā nāhaṃ veti na kasyacit saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:761: nāpi nāham iti viparyayo vyatirekaḥ pramā veti tat-svarūpa-pramā sarvadāstīti vācyaṃ tasya sarva-saṃśaya-viparyaya-dharmitvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:762: dharmyaśe sarvam abhrāntaṃ prakāre tu viparyayaḥ iti nyāyāt | ata evoktam -
GE07bhg4c02u:763: pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ ca pramābhāsas tathaiva ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:764: kurvanty eva pramāṃ yatra tad-asambhāvanā kutaḥ || [Bṛhad-vāmanaP 1.4.874]
GE07bhg4c02u:766: sva-prakāśe sad-rūpe dharmiṇi pramāṇāpramāṇayor viśeṣo nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:767: ātmano 'bhāsamānatve ca ghaṭa-jñānaṃ mayi jātaṃ na vety ādi-saṃśayaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:769: bāhya-padārthe k ptena virodhi-jñānenaiva saṃśayādi-pratibandha-saṃbhava āntara-padārthe svabhāva-bheda-kalpanāyā anaucityāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:772: yasya ca jñāna-mātre hetutvād ghaṭādi-bhāne 'py ātma-bhānaṃ samūhālambana-nyāyena tārkikāṇāṃ pravareṇāpi durnivāraṃ |
GE07bhg4c02u:777: na ca vyavasāya-bhānārthaṃ sa tasya dīpavat sva-vyavahāre sajātīyānapekṣatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:778: na hi ghaṭa-taj-jñānayor iva vyavasāyānuvyavasāyayor api viṣayatva-viṣayitva-vyavasthāpakaṃ vaijātyam asti vyakti-bhedātirikta-vaidharmyānabhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:779: viṣayatvāvacchedaka-rūpeṇaiva viṣayitvābhyupagame ghaṭa-taj-jñānayor api tad-bhāvāpattir aviśeṣāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:780_0: nanu yathā ghaṭa-vyavahārārthaṃ ghaṭa-jñānam abhyupeyate tathā ghaṭa-jñāna-vyavahārārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:780_1: ghaṭa-jñāna-viṣayaṃ jñānam abhyupeyaṃ vyavahārāsya vyavahartavya-jñāna-sādhyatvād iti cet |
GE07bhg4c02u:782: nahi vyavahartavya-bhinnatvam api jñāna-viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavahāra-hetutāvacchedakaṃ gauravāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:783: tathā ceśvara-jñānavadyogi-jñānavat prameyam iti jñānavac ca svenaiva sva-vyavahāropapattau na jñānāntara-kalpanāvakāśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:784: anuvyavasāyasyāpi ghaṭa-jñāna-vyavahāra-hetutvaṃ kiṃ ghaṭa-jñāna-jñānatvena kiṃ vā ghaṭa-jñānatvenaiveti vivecanīyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:786: tatra ghaṭa-vyavahāre ghaṭa-jñānatvenaiva hetutāyāḥ k ptatvāt tenaiva rūpeṇa ghata-jñāna-vyavahāre,
GE07bhg4c02u:789: tathā ca nānuvyavasāya-siddhir ekasyaiva vyavasāyasya vayvasātari vyavaseye vyavasāye ca vyavahāra-janakatvopapatter iti tripuṭī-pratyakṣa-vādinaḥ prābhākarāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:790: aupaniṣadāstu manyante sva-prakāśa-jñāna-rūpa evātmā na svaprakāśa-jñānāśrayaḥ kartṛ-karma-virodhena tad-bhānānupapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:795: sa cakṣur-ādi-dvārāntaḥ-karaṇa-pariṇāmena ghaṭādīn vyāpya tad-ākāro bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:796: tato ghaṭāvacchinna-caitanyaṃ pramātra-bhedāt svājñānaṃ nāśayad aparokṣaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:798: antaḥ-karaṇa-pariṇāmaś ca vṛttyākhyo 'tisvacchaḥ svāvacchinnenaiva caitanyena bhāsyata ity antaḥ-karaṇa-tad-vṛtti-ghaṭānām aparokṣatā |
GE07bhg4c02u:799: tad etad ākāra-trayam ahaṃ jānāmi ghaṭam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:802: antaḥkaraṇa-tad-vṛttīḥ prati tu vṛtty-anapekṣatvāt sākṣiteti vivekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:804_0: yasmād evaṃ prāg-ukta-nyāyena ntiyo vibhur asaṃsārī sarvadaika-rūpaś cātmā tasmāt
GE07bhg4c02u:804_1: tan-nāśa-śaṅkayā svadharme yuddhe prāk-pravṛttasya tava tasmād uparatir na yukteti
GE07bhg4c02u:804_2: yuddhābhyanujñayā bhagavān āha - tasmād yudhyasva bhārateti |
GE07bhg4c02u:805: arjunasya svadharme yuddhe pravṛttasya tata uparati-kāraṇaṃ śoka-mohau |
GE07bhg4c02u:806: tau ca vicāra-janitena vijñānena vādhitāv ity apavādāpavāda utsargasya sthitir iti nyāyena yudhyasvety anuvādo na vidhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:809: akākārayoḥ strī-pratyayayoḥ prayoge neti vaktavyam iti tad-apavādaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:810: tathā ca mumukṣor brahmaṇor jijñāsety atrāpavādāpavāde punar utsarga-sthiteḥ kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛtīty anenaiva ṣaṣṭhī |
GE07bhg4c02u:811: tathā ca karmaṇi ceti niṣedhā-prasārād brahma-jijñāseti karma-ṣaṣṭhī-samāsaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:813: kaścit tv etasmād eva vidher mokṣe jñāna-karmaṇoḥ samuccaya iti pralapati |
GE07bhg4c02u:814: tac ca yudhyasvety ato mokṣasya jñāna-karma-samuccaya-sādhyatvāpratīteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:816: viśvanāthaḥ : nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati antavanta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:818: tasmād yudhyasva iti śāstra-vihitasya svadharmasya tyāgo 'nucita iti bhāvaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c02u:820: aprameyasyātisūkṣmatvād vijñāna-vijñātṛ-svarūpatvāc ca pramātum aśakyasyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:821: tathā cedṛśa-svabhāvatvāj jīva-tad-dehau na śoka-sthānam iti jīvātmano deho dharmānuṣṭānuṣṭhāna-dvārā tasya bhogāya mokṣāya ca pareśena sṛjyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:822: sa ca sa ca dharmeṇa bhavet tasmād yudhyasva bhārata ||18||
GE07bhg4c02u:825: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam |
GE07bhg4c02u:826: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate ||19||
GE07bhg4c02u:827: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ bhīṣmādi-mṛtyu-nimittaḥ śoko nivāritaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:828: yac cātmano hantṛtva-nimittaṃ duḥkham uktam etān na hantum icchāmi ity ādinā,
GE07bhg4c02u:829: tad api tavad eva nirnimittam ity āha ya enam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:831: ātmano hanana-kriyāyāḥ karmatvaṃ kartṛtvam api nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:834: nanv evam aśocyān anvaśocacas tvam ity ādinā bhīṣmādi-bandhu-viccheda-nibandhane śoke 'panīte 'pi tad-vadha-kartṛtva-nibandhanasya pāpasya nāsti pratīkāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:835: nahi yatra śoko nāsti tatra pāpaṃ nāstīti niyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:837_0: ato 'haṃ kartā tvaṃ preraka iti dvayor api hiṃsā-nimitta-pātakāpatter ayuktam idaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:837_1: vacanaṃ tasmād yudhyasva bhāratety āśaṅkya kāṭhaka-paṭhitaya rcā pariharati bhagavān ya enam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:838: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam adṛśyatvādi-guṇakaṃ yo hantāraṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartāraṃ vetti aham asya hanteti vijānāti |
GE07bhg4c02u:839: yaś cānya enaṃ manyate hataṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ karma-bhūtaṃ deha-hananena hato 'ham iti vijānāti |
GE07bhg4c02u:840: tāv ubhau dehābhimānitvād enam avikāriṇam akāraka-svabhāvam ātmānaṃ na vijānīto na vivekena jānītaḥ śāstrāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:841: kasmāt yasmān nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate kartā karma ca na bahvatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:842: atra ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ hataṃ cety etāvati vaktavye padānām āvṛttir vākyālaṅkārārthā |
GE07bhg4c02u:843: athavā ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ tārkikādir ātmanaḥ kartṛtvābhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:844: tathā yaś cainaṃ manyate hataṃ cārvākādir ātmano vināśitvābhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:845: tāv ubhau na vijānīta iti yojyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:848: hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam [KaṭhU 1.2.19] iti pūrvārdhe śrautaḥ pāṭhaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c02u:849: viśvanāthaḥ : bho vayasya arjuna ! tvam ātmā |
GE07bhg4c02u:850: na hanteḥ kartā, nāpi hanteḥ karma ity āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:851: enaṃ jīvātmānaṃ hantāraṃ vetti bhīṣmādīn arjuno hantīti yo vettīty arthaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:852: hatam iti bhīṣmādibhir arjuno hanyate iti yo vetti,
GE07bhg4c02u:854: ato 'rjuno 'yaṃ guru-janaṃ hantīty ajñāni-loka-gītād duryaśaḥ kā te bhītir iti bhāvaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c02u:856: enam ukta-svabhāvam ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ yo hantāraṃ khaḍgādinā hiṃsakaṃ vetti yaś cainaṃ tena hataṃ hiṃsitaṃ manyate tāv ubhau tat-svarūpaṃ na vijānītaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:857: atisūkṣmasya caitanyasya tasya chedādy-asambhavān nāyam ātmā hanti na hanyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:858: hanteḥ kartā karma ca bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:859: hanter deha-viyogārthatvān na tenātmanāṃ nāśo mantavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:860: śrutiś caivam āha - hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam [KaṭhU 1.2.19] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:861: etena mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni ity ādi-vākyaṃ deha-viyoga-paraṃ vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:862: na cātrātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ prasiddham iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:867: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:870: śrīdharaḥ : na hanyata ity etad eva ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-śūnyatvena draḍhayati neti |
GE07bhg4c02u:875: na cāyaṃ bhūtvā utpadya bhavitā bhavati astitvaṃ bhajate,
GE07bhg4c02u:876: kintu prāg eva svataḥ sad-rūpa iti janmāntarāstitva-lakṣaṇa-dvitīya-vikāra-pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:878: yo hi na jāyate sa hi janmāntaram astitvaṃ bhajate,
GE07bhg4c02u:879: na tu yaḥ svayam evāsti sa bhūyo 'pi anyad astitvaṃ bhajate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:883: purāpi nava eva na tu pariṇāmataḥ rūpāntaraṃ prāpya navo bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:884: yad vā na bhavitety asyānuṣaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo 'dhikaṃ yathā bhaviteti tathā na bhavatīti vṛddhi-pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:885: ajo nitya iti cobhaya-vṛddhy-ādy-abhāve hetur iti na paunaruktyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:886: tad evaṃ jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyaty evaṃ yāskādibhir veda-vādibhir uktāḥ ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā nirastāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:887: yad artham ete vikārā nirastās taṃ prastutaṃ vināśābhāvam upasaṃharati na hanyate hanyamāne śarīra iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:888: madhusūdanaḥ : kasmād ayam ātmā hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā karma ca na bhavati ?
GE07bhg4c02u:890: jāyate 'sti vardhate vipariṇamate 'pakṣīyate vinaśyatīti ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā iti vārṣyāyaṇiḥ iti nairuktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:891: tatrādy-antayor niṣedhaḥ kriyate na jāyate mriyate veti |
GE07bhg4c02u:893: na jāyate na mriyate cety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:895: yasmād ayam ātmā kadācit kasminn api kāle na bhūtvābhūtvā prāg bhūyaḥ punar api bhavitā na |
GE07bhg4c02u:896: yo hy abhūtvā bhavati sa utpatti-lakṣaṇāṃ vikriyām anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:897: ayaṃ tu prāg api sattvādyato notpadyate 'to 'jaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:898: tathāyam ātmā bhūtvā prāk kadācid bhūyaḥ punar na bhavitā |
GE07bhg4c02u:900: yo hi prāg-bhūtvottara-kāle na bhavati sa mṛt-lakṣaṇāṃ vikriyām anubhavati | ayaṃ tūttara-kāle
GE07bhg4c02u:901: 'pi sattvādyato na miryate 'to nityo vināśāyogya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:902: atra na bhūtvety atra samāsābhāve 'pi nānupapattir nānuyojeṣv ativat |
GE07bhg4c02u:904: yat tu kātyāyanenoktaṃ samāsa-nityatābhiprāyeṇa vā-vacanānarthakyaṃ tu svabhāva-siddhatvāt iti tad-bhagavat-pāṇiini-vacana-virodhād anādeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:905: tad uktam ācārya-śavara-svāminā - asad-vādī hi kātyāyanaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:906: atra na jāyate mriyate veti pratijñā |
GE07bhg4c02u:907: kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūya iti tad-upapādanam |
GE07bhg4c02u:908: ajo nitya iti tad-upasaṃhāra iti vibhāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:909: ādyantayor vikārayor niṣedhena madhyavarti-vikārāṇāṃ tad-vyāpyānāṃ niṣedhe jāte 'pi gamanādi-vikārāṇām anuktānām apy upalakṣaṇāyāpakṣayaś ca vṛddhiś ca sva-śabdenaiva nirākriyete |
GE07bhg4c02u:910: tatra kūṭastha-nityatvād ātmano nirguṇatvāc ca na svarūpato guṇato vāpakṣayaḥ sambhavatīty uktaṃ śāśvata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:911: śaśvat sarvadā bhavati nāpakṣīyate nāpacīyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:912: yadi nāpakṣīyate tarhi vardhatām iti nety āha purāṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:913: purāpi nava eka-rūpo na tv adhunā nūtanāṃ kāñcid avasthām anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:914: yo hi nūtanāṃ kāñcid upacayāvasthām anubhavati sa vardhata ity ucyate loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:915: ayaṃ tu sarvadaika-rūpatvān nāpacīyate nopacīyate cety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:918: yasmād evaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnya ātmā tasmāc charīre hanyamāne tat-sambaddho 'pi kenāpy upāyena na hanyate na hantuṃ śakyata ity upasaṃhāraḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:920: jīvātmano nityatvaṃ spaṣṭatayā sādhayati na jāyate miryate iti janma-maraṇayor vartamānatva-niṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:921: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā iti tayor bhūtatva-bhaviṣyatva-niṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:922: ataeva aja iti kāla-traye 'pi ajasya janmābhāvān nāsya prāg-abhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:923: śāśvataḥ śaśvat sarva-kāla eva vartata iti nāsya kāla-traye 'pi dhvaṃsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:925: tarhi bahu-kāla-sthāyitvāj jarā-grasto 'yam iti cen na |
GE07bhg4c02u:926: purāṇaḥ purāpi navaḥ prācīno 'py ayaṃ navīna iveti ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:927: nanu śarīrasya maraṇād aupacārikaṃ tu maraṇam asyāstu ? tatrāha neti |
GE07bhg4c02u:930: atha jāyate asti vardhate viparaṇamate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti yāskādy-ukta-ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-rāhityena prāg-ukta-nityatvaṃ draḍhayati na jāyate iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:932: ayam ātmā jīvaḥ kadācid api kāle na jāyate na mriyate ceti janma-vināśayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:933: na cāyam ātmā bhūtvotpadya bhavitā bhaviṣyatīti janmāntarasyāstitvasya pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:934: na bhūya iti ayam ātmā bhūyo 'dhikaṃ yathā syāt tathā na bhavatīti buddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:935: kuto bhūyo na bhavatīty atra hetur ajo nitya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:936: utpatti-vināśa-yogī khalu vṛkṣādir utpadya vṛddhiṃ gacchan naṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:937: ātmanas tu tad-ubhayābhāvāt na vṛddhir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:939: śaśvat sarvadā bhavati nāpakṣīyate nāpakṣayaṃ bhajatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:941: purāpi navo na tu kiṃcin nūtanaṃ rūpāntaram adhunā na labdha ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:943: yasmād īdṛśas tasmāc charīre hanyamāne 'pi sa na hanyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:944: tathā cārjuno 'yaṃ guru-hantety avijñoktyā duṣkīrter abibhyatā tvayā śāstrīyaṃ dharma-yuddhaṃ vidheyam ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:947: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:948: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:949: śrīdharaḥ : ataeva hantṛtvābhāvo 'pi pūrvoktaḥ prasiddha ity āha vedāvināśinam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:953: yo veda sa puruṣaḥ kaṃ hanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:954: kathaṃ vā hanti ? evaṃ-bhūtasya vadhe sādhanābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:955: tathā svayaṃ prayojako bhūtvānyena kaṃ ghātayati ? kathaṃ vā ghātayati ? na kiñcid api |
GE07bhg4c02u:957: anena mayy api prayojakatvād doṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ mā kārṣīr ity uktaṃ bhavati ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:959: nāyaṃ hanti na hanyata iti pratijñāya na hanyata ity upapāditam idānīṃ na hantīty upapādayann upasaṃharati |
GE07bhg4c02u:960: na vinaṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tam avināśinam antya-vikāra-rahitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:961: tatra hetuḥ - avyayaṃ na vidyate vyayo 'vayavāpacayo guṇāpacayo vā yasya tam avyayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:962: avayavāpacayena guṇāpacayena vā vināśa-darśanāt tad-ubhaya-rahitasya na vināśaḥ sambhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:963: nanu janyatvena vināśitvam anumāsyāmahe nety āha - ajam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:966: prāg-avidyamānasya hi janma dṛṣṭaṃ na tu sarvatā sata ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:970: janma-vināśa-śūnyaṃ jāyamānasya vinaśyataś ca sarva-vyāpakatva-satyatvayor ayogāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:971_0: evaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyaṃ prakṛtam enaṃ dehinaṃ svam ātmānaṃ yo veda vijānāti śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:971_1: sākṣātkaroti ahaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyaḥ sarva-bhāsakaḥ sarva-dvaita-rahitaḥ paramānanda-bodha-rūpa
GE07bhg4c02u:971_2: iti sa evaṃ vidvān puruṣaḥ pūrṇa-rūpaḥ kaṃ hanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:973: na kam api hanti na katham api hantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:974: tathā kaṃ ghātayati kathaṃ ghātayati kam api na ghātayati katham api na ghātayatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:975: nahi sarva-vikāra-śūnyasyākartur hanana-kriyāyāṃ kartṛtvaṃ sambhavati | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:976: ātmānaṃ ced vijānīyād ayam asmīti pūruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:977: kim icchan kasya kāmāya śarīram anusaṃjvaret || [BAU 4.4.12]
GE07bhg4c02u:978: iti śuddham ātmānaṃ viduṣas tad-ajñāna-nibandhanādhyāsa-nivṛttau tan-mūla-rāga-dveṣādy-abhāvāt-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvādy-abhāvaṃ darśayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:980: vastu-gatyā ko 'pi nakaroti na kārayati ca kiṃcit sarva-vikriyā-śūnya-svabhāvatvāt paraṃ tu svapna ivāvidyayā kartṛtvādikam ātmany abhimanyate mūḍhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:981: tad uktam ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ [Gītā 2.19] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:982: śrutiś ca - dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva [BAU 4.3.7] ity ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:984: vidvāṃs tu samūlādhyāsa-bādhān nātmani kartṛtvādikam abhimanyate sthāṇu-svarūpaṃ vidvān iva coratvam |
GE07bhg4c02u:985: ato vikriyā-rahitatvād advitīyatvāc ca vidvān na karoti kārayati cety ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:986: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- vidvān na bibheti kutaścana [TaittU 2.9.1] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:987: arjuno hi svasmin kartṛtvaṃ bhagavati ca kārayitṛtvam adhyasya hiṃsā-nimittaṃ doṣam ubhayatrāpy āśaśaṅke |
GE07bhg4c02u:988: bhagavān api viditābhiprāyo hanti ghātayatīti tad-ubhayam ācikṣepa |
GE07bhg4c02u:990: āropya pratyavāya-śaṅkāṃ mā kārṣīr ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:991: avikriyatva-pradarśanenātmanaḥ kartṛtva-pratiṣedhāt sarva-karmākṣepe bhagavad-abhiprete hantir upalakṣaṇārthaḥ puraḥ-sphūrtikatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:993: tathā ca vakṣyati tasya kāryaṃ na vidyata [Gītā 3.17] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:994: ato 'tra hanana-mātrākṣepeṇa karmāntaraṃ bhagavatābhyanujñāyata iti mūḍha-jana-jalpitam apāstam |
GE07bhg4c02u:995: tasmād yudhyasvety atra hananasya bhagavatābhyanujñānād vāstava-kartṛtvādy-abhāvasya karma-mātre samatvād iti dik ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:997: ata evambhūta-jñāne sati tvaṃ yudhyamāno 'pi ahaṃ yuddhe prerayann api doṣa-bhājau naiva bhavāva ity āha vedeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:999: avināśinam iti, ajam iti, avyayam ity etair vināśa-janyā apekṣayā niṣiddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1000: sa puruṣo mal-lakṣaṇaḥ kaṃ ghātayati, kathaṃ vā ghātayati, sa puruṣas tval-lakṣaṇaḥ kaṃ hanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1002: baladevaḥ : evaṃ tattva-jñānavān yo dharma-buddhyā yuddhe pravartate yaś ca pravartayati,
GE07bhg4c02u:1003: tasya tasya ca ko 'pi na doṣa-gandha ity āha vedeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1004: enaṃ prakṛtam ātmānam avināśinam ajam avyayam apakṣaya-śūnyaṃ ca yo veda śāstra-yuktibhyāṃ jānāti,
GE07bhg4c02u:1005: sa puruṣo yuddhe pravṛtto 'pi kaṃ hanti kathaṃ vā hanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1006: tatra pravartayann api kaṃ ghātayati kathaṃ vā ghātayati ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1007: kim ākṣepe - na kam api na katham apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1015: śrīdharaḥ : nanv ātmano 'vināśe 'pi tadīya-śarīra-nāśaṃ paryālocya śocāmīiti cet ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1017: karmaṇi bandhanānāṃ nūtanānāṃ dehānām avaśyambhāvitvāt na taj-jīrṇa-deha-nāśe śokāvakāśa ity arthaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1019_0: nanv evam ātmano vināśitvābhāve 'pi dehānāṃ vināśitvād yuddhasya ca tan-nāśakatvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1019_1: kathaṃ bhīṣmādi-dehānām aneka-sukṛta-sādhanānāṃ mayā yuddhena vināśaḥ kārya ity āśaṅkāyā uttaram vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1020: jīrṇāni vihāya vastrāṇi navāni gṛhṇāti vikriyā-śūnya eva naro yathety etāvataiva virvāhe 'parāṇīit viśeṣaṇam utkarṣātiśaya-khyāpanārtham |
GE07bhg4c02u:1021: tena yathā nikṛṣṭāni vastrāṇi vihāyotkṛṣṭāni jano gṛhṇātīty aucityāyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1022_0: tathā jīrṇāni vayasā tapasā ca kṛśāni bhīṣmādi-śarīrāṇi vihāyānyāni devādi-śarīrāṇi
GE07bhg4c02u:1022_2: prāpnoti dehī prakṛṣṭa-dharmānuṣṭhātṛ-dehavān bhīṣmādir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1023: anyan navataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ kurute pitryaṃ vā gandharvaṃ vā daivaṃ vā prājāpatyaṃ vā brāhmaṃ vā ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1024_0: etad uktaṃ bhavati bhīṣmādayo hi yāvaj jīvaṃ dharmānuṣṭhāna-kleśenaiva jarjara-śarīrā
GE07bhg4c02u:1024_1: vartamāna-śarīra-pātam antareṇa tat-phala-bhogāyāsam arthā yadi dharma-yuddhena svarga-pratibandhakāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1024_2: jarjarāṇi śarīrāṇi pātayitvā divya-deha-sampādanena svarga-bhoga-yogyāḥ kriyante
GE07bhg4c02u:1025: duryodhanādīnām api svarga-bhoga-yogya-deha-sampādanān mahān upakāra eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1026: tathā cātyantam upakārake yuddhe 'pakārakatva-bhramaṃ mā kārṣīr iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1027: aparāṇi anyāni saṃyātīti pada-traya-vaśād bhagavad-abhiprāya evam abhyūhitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1028: anena dṛṣṭāntenāvikṛta-pratipādanam ātmanaḥ kriyata iti tu prācāṃ vyākhyānam atispaṣṭam ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1030: nanu madīya-yuddhād bhīṣma-saṃjñakaṃ śarīraṃ tu jīvātmā tyakṣyaty eva ity atas tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca tatra hetu bhavāva eva ity ata āha vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1031: navīnaṃ vastraṃ paridhāpayituṃ jīrṇa-vastrasya tyajane kaścit kiṃ doṣo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1032: tathā śarīrāṇīti bhīṣmo jīrṇa-śarīraṃ parityajya divyaṃ navyaṃ anyac charīraṃ prāpsyatīti kas tava vā mama vā doṣo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1034: nanu mā bhūd ātmanāṃ vināśo bhīṣmādi-saṃjñānāṃ tac-charīrāṇāṃ tat-sukha-sādhanānāṃ yuddhena vināśe tat-sukha-viccheda-hetuko doṣaḥ syād eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1035: anyathā prāyaścitta-śāstrāṇi nirviṣayāṇi syur iti cet tatrāha vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1036: sthūla-jīrṇa-vāsas-tyāgena navīna-vāso-dhāraṇam iva vṛddha-nṛ-deha-tyāgena yuva-deva-deha-dhāraṇaṃ teṣām ātmanām atisukhakaram eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1037: tad ubhayaṃ ca yuddhenaiva kṣipraṃ bhaved ity upakārakāt tasmān mā viraṃsīr iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1038: saṃyātīti samyag-garbha-vāsādi-yātanāṃ vinaiva śīghram eva prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1039: prāyaścitta-vākyāni tu yajña-yuddha-vadhād anyasmin vadhe neyāni ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1042: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1043: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c02u:1045: kathaṃ hantīti anena uktaṃ vadha-sādhanābhāvaṃ darśayann avināśitvam ātmanaḥ sphuṭīkaroti nainam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1046: āpo kledayanti mṛdu-karaṇena śithilaṃ na kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1050: na ca yuddhe tvayā prayuktebhyaḥ śastrāstrebhyaḥ kāpy ātmano vyathā sambhaved ity āha nainam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1056: nanu śastra-pātaiḥ śarīra-vināśe tad-antaḥ-sthasyātmano vināśaḥ syāt gṛha-dāhe tan-madhya-sthasyaiva jantor iti cet tatrāha nainam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1061: tathā ca tat-prayuktaiḥ śastrāstrair nātmanaḥ kācid vyatheti ||23||
GE07bhg4c02u:1066: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha acchedya ity ādinā sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:1076: śastrādīnāṃ tan-nāśakatvāsāmarthye tasya taj-janita-nāśānarhatve hetum āha acchedya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1080: yato 'śoṣyo 'yam ato nainaṃ śoṣayati māruta iti krameṇa yojanīyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1086: yāvad-vikāraṃ tu vibhāgaḥ iti nyāyāt parābhyupagata-paramāṇv-ādīnām anabhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1087: ayaṃ tu sarva-gato vibhur ato nitya eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1089: yadi cāyaṃ vikārī syāt tadā sarva-gato na syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1093: yadi cāyaṃ calaḥ kriyāvān syāt tadā vikārī syād ghaṭādivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1098: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt sanātano 'yaṃ sarvadaika-rūpo na kasyā api kriyāyāḥ karmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1102: sarvagatatvān na prāpyaḥ paricchinnasyaiva paya-ādeḥ prāpyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1106: tathā ca śrutayaḥ - ākāśavat sarva-gataś ca nityaḥ [ChāU 3.14.3],
GE07bhg4c02u:1107: vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ [ŚvetU 3.9],
GE07bhg4c02u:1109_0: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yo 'psu tiṣṭhann adbhyo 'ntaro yas tejasi tiṣṭhaṃs
GE07bhg4c02u:1109_1: tejaso 'ntaro yo vāyau tiṣṭan vāyor antaraḥ [BAU 3.7.3 ff] ity ādyā ca śrutiḥ sarvagatasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1110: yo hi śastrādau na tiṣṭhati taṃ śastrādayaś chindanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1111: ayaṃ tu śastrādīnāṃ sattā-sphūrti-pradatvena tat-prerakas tad-antaryāmī |
GE07bhg4c02u:1114: atra yena sūryas tapati tejaseddhaḥ [Taitt. Br. 3.12.97] ity ādi śrutayo 'nusandheyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1115: saptamādhyāye ca prakaṭīkariṣyati śrī-bhagavān iti dik ||24||
GE07bhg4c02u:1116: viśvanāthaḥ : tasmād ātmāyam evam ucyata ity āha acchedya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1117: atra prakaraṇe jīvātmano nityatvasya śabdato 'rthataś ca paunaruktyaṃ nirdhāraṇa-prayojakaṃ sandigdhadhīṣu jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1118: yathā kalāv asmin dharmo 'sti dharmo 'stīti tri-caturdhā-prayogād dharmo 'sty eveti niḥsaṃśayā pratītiḥ syād iti jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1121: atisūkṣmatvād avyaktas tad api deha-vyāpi-caitanyatvād acintyo 'tarkyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1123: baladevaḥ : chedādy-abhāvād eva tat-tan-nāmabhir ayam ākhyāyata ity āha acchedyo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1125: sarva-gataḥ sva-karma-hetukeṣu deva-mānavādiṣu paśu-pakṣy-ādiṣu ca sarveṣu śarīreṣu paryāyeṇa gataḥ prāpto 'pīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1128: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā [Bau 4.5.14] iti śruter ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1129: na cānucchittir eva dharmo yasyeti vyākhyeyaṃ tasyārthasyāvināśīty anenaiva lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1130: tasmād anucchittayo nityā dharmā yasya sa tathety evārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1131: sanātanaḥ śāśvataḥ paunarukta-doṣas tv agre parihariṣyate ||24||
GE07bhg4c02u:1139: avikāryaḥ karmendriyāṇām apy agocara ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1142: tad evam ātmano janma-vināśābhāvān na śokaḥ kārya ity uktam ||25||
GE07bhg4c02u:1144: chedyatvādi-grāhaka-pramāṇa-bhāvād api tad-abhāva ity āha - avyakto 'yam ity-ādy-ardhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:1145: yo hīndriya-gocaro bhavati sa pratyakṣatvād vyakta ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1147: ato na pratyakṣaṃ tatra cchedyatvādi-grāhakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1148: pratyakṣābhāve 'py anumānaṃ syād ity ata āha acintyo 'yaṃ cintyo 'numeyas tad-vilakṣaṇo 'yam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1149: kvacit pratyakṣo hi vahny-ādir gṛhīta-vyāptikasya dhūmāder darśanāt kvacid anumeyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1150: apratyakṣe tu vyāpti-grahaṇāsambhavān nānumeyatvam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1151_0: apratyakṣasyāpīndriyādeḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumāna-viṣayatvaṃ dṛṣṭam ata āha avikāryo
GE07bhg4c02u:1151_1: 'yaṃ yad vikriyāvac cakṣur-ādikaṃ tat-svakāryānyathānupapattyā kalpyamānam arthāpatteḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1152: ayaṃ tu na vikāryo na vikriyāvān ato nārthāpatteḥ sāmānyato-dṛṣṭasya vā viṣaya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1154: nanu vedenaiva tatra ccehdyatvādi grahīṣyata ity ata āha - ucyate vedena sopakaraṇenācchedyāvyaktādi-rūpa evāyam ucyate tātparyeṇa pratipādyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1155: ato na vedasya tat-pratipādikasyāpi cchedyatvādi-pratipādakatvam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1156: atra nainaṃ chindanti [Gītā 2.23] ity atra śastrādīnāṃ tan-nāśaka-sāmarthyābhāva uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1157: acchedyo 'yam ity ādau tasya cchedādi-karmatvāyogyatvam uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1158: avyakto 'yam ity atra tac-chedādi-grāhaka-mānābhāva ukta ity apaunaruktyaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1159: vedāvināśinam ity ādīnāṃ tu ślokānām arthataḥ śabdataś ca paunaruktyaṃ bhāṣya-kṛdbhiḥ parihṛtam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1160_0: durbodhatvād ātma-vastunaḥ punaḥ punaḥ prasaṅgam āpādya śabdāntareṇa tad eva vastu
GE07bhg4c02u:1160_1: nirūpayati bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kathaṃ nu nāma saṃsāriṇām buddhi-gocaratām āpannaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1160_2: tattvaṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttaye syāt iti [Śaṅkara-bhāṣya 2.24] iti vadadbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1161: evaṃ pūrvokta-yuktibhir ātmano nityatve nirvikāratve ca siddhe tava śoko nopapanna ity upasaṃharati tasmād ity ardhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:1162: etādṛśātma-svarūpa-vedanasya śoka-kāraṇa-nivartakatvāt tasmin sati śoko nocitaḥ kāraṇa-bhāve kāryābhāvasyāvaśyakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1163: tenātmānam aviditvā yad anvaśocas tad yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1164: ātmānaṃ viditvā tu nānuśocitum arhasīty abhiprāyaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c02u:1170: atra avināśi tu tad viddhi ity ādibhir ātma-tattvam upadiśan hariḥ śabdato 'rthataś ca yat punaḥ punar avocat tasya durbodhasya saubodhyārtham evety adoṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1172: ayaṃ dharmaṃ vettīty uktau tad vedanaṃ niścitaṃ yathā syāt tadvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1173: evam evāgre vakṣyati āścaryavat paśyati kaścit ity ādinā ||25||
GE07bhg4c02u:1176: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1177: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1179: idānīṃ dehena saha ātmano janma tad-vināśena ca vināśam aṅgīkṛtyāpi śoko na kārya ity āha atha cainam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1180: atha ca yadyapy enam ātmānam nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1182: evam ātmano nirvikāratvenāśocyatvam uktam idānīṃ vikāravattvam abhyupetyāpi śloka-dvayenāśocyatvaṃ pratipādayati bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:1184: deha evātmā sa ca sthiro 'py anukṣaṇa-pariṇāmī jāyate naśyati ceti pratyakṣa-siddham evaitad iti lokāyatikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1185: dehātirikto 'pi dehena sahaiva jāyate naśyati cety anye |
GE07bhg4c02u:1186: sargādya-kāla evākāśavaj jāyate deha-bhede 'py anuvartamāna evākalpa-sthāyī naśyati pralaya ity apare |
GE07bhg4c02u:1187: nitya evātmā jāyate mriyate ceti tārkikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1191: idaṃ cobhayaṃ dharmādharma-nimittatvāt tad-ādhārasya nityasyaiva mukhyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1195: tatrānityatva-pakṣe 'pi śocyatvam ātmano niṣedhati atha cainam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1198: yadi durbodhatvād ātma-vastuno 'sakṛc-chravaṇe 'py avadhāraṇā-sāmarthyān mad-ukta-pakṣānaṅgīkāreṇa pakṣāntaram abhyupaiṣi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1199: tatrāpy anityatva-pakṣam evāśritya yady enam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ jātaṃ nityaṃ mṛtaṃ vā manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1201_0: kṣaṇikatva-pakṣe nityaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ pakṣāntare āvaśyakatvān nityaṃ niyataṃ jāto 'yaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1201_1: mṛto 'yam iti laukika-pratyaya-vaśena yadi kalpayasi tathāpi he mahābāho ! puruṣa-dhaureyeti
GE07bhg4c02u:1202: tvayy etādṛśī kudṛṣṭir na sambhavatīti sānukampaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1203: evaṃ aha bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam [Gītā 1.45] ity ādi yathā śocasi evaṃ prakāram anuśokaṃ kartuṃ svayam api tvaṃ tādṛśa eva san nārhasi yogyo na bhavasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1205: saha janma-vināśa-pakṣe ca janmāntarābhāvena pāpa-bhayāsambhavāt pāpa-bhayenaiva khalu tvam anuśocasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1206: tac caitādṛśe darśane na sambhavati bandhu-vināśa-darśitvābhāvād ity adhikaṃ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1208: dṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimitta-śoka-sambhave 'py adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śokaḥ sarvathā nocita ity arthaḥ prathama-ślokasya ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1209: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ śāstrīya-tattva-dṛṣṭyā tvām ahaṃ prabodhayan |
GE07bhg4c02u:1211: nitya-jātaṃ dehe jāte saty enaṃ nityaṃ niyataṃ jātaṃ manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1212: tathā deha eva mṛte mṛtaṃ nityaṃ niyataṃ manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1213: mahā-bāho iti parākramavataḥ kṣatriyasya tava tad api yuddham avaśyakaṃ svadharmaḥ | yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c02u:1215: bhrātāpi bhrātaraṃ hanyād yena ghorataras tataḥ || iti bhāvaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1217: evaṃ svoktasya jīvātmano 'śocyatvam uktvā paroktasyāpi tasya tad ucyate para-mata-jñānāya |
GE07bhg4c02u:1218: tad-abhijñaḥ khalu śiṣyas tad-avakarais tan nirasya vijayī san sva-mate sthairyam āsīt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1219: tathā hi manuṣyatvādi-viśiṣṭe bhūmy-ādi-bhūta-catuṣṭaye tāmbūla-rāgavat mada-śaktivac ca caitanyam utpadyate |
