GE07bhg4c02u:1221: sa ca sthiro 'pi pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmād utpatti-vināśa-yogīti loka-pratyakṣa-siddham iti lokāyatikā manyante |
GE07bhg4c02u:1222: dehād bhinno vijñāna-svarūpo 'py ātmā pratikṣaṇa-vināśīti vaibhāṣikādayo bauddhā vadanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1223: tad etad ubhaya-mate 'py ātmanaḥ śocyatvaṃ pratiṣedhati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1227: tatra dehātma-pakṣe enaṃ deha-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c02u:1230: tathāpi tvam enaṃ aho bata mahat pāpaṃ ity ādi-vacanaiḥ śocituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1231: pariṇāma-svabhāvasya tasya tasya cātmano janma-vināśayor anivāryatvāj janmāntarābhāvena pāpa-bhayāsambhavāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1232: he mahābāho iti sopahāsaṃ sambodhanaṃ kṣatriya-varyasya vaidikasya ca te nedṛśaṃ kumataṃ dhāryam iti bhāvaḥ ||26|
GE07bhg4c02u:1235: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1236: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||27||
GE07bhg4c02u:1237: śrīdharaḥ : kuta iti ? ata āha jātasyety-ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1238: hi yasmāj jātasya svārambhaka-karma-kṣaye mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1239: mṛtasya ca tad-deha-kṛtena karmaṇā janmāpi dhruvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1240: tasmād evam aparihārye 'rthe avaśyambhāvini janma-maraṇa-lakṣaṇe 'rthe tvaṃ vidvān śocitum nārhasi yogyo na bhavasi ||27||
GE07bhg4c02u:1242: nanv ātmana ābhūta-saṃplava-sthāyitva-pakṣe ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-duḥkha-sambhavāt tad-bhayena śocāmīty ata āha dvitīya-ślokena jātasya hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1243_1: sthirasyātmano dhruva āvaśyako mṛtyus tac-charīrādi-vicchedas tad-ārambhaka-karma-kṣaya-nimittaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1244: tathā dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca prāg-deha-kṛta-karma-phalopabhogārthaṃ sānuśayasyaiva prastutatvān na jīvan-mukte vyabhicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1245: tasmād evam aparihārye parihartum aśakye 'smin janma-maraṇa-lakṣaṇe 'rthe viṣaye tvam evaṃ vidvān na śocitum arhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1246: tathā ca vakṣyati ṛte 'pi tvāṃ na bhaviṣyanti sarve [Gītā 11.32] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1247: yadi hi tvayā yuddhe 'nāhanyamānā ete jīveyur eva tadā yuddhāya śokas tavocitaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1249: svayam eva mriyanta iti tat-parihārāsamarthasya tava dṛṣṭ-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śoko nocita iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1250: evam adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimitte 'pi śoke tasmād aparihārye 'rthe ity evottaram |
GE07bhg4c02u:1251: yuddhākhyaṃ hi karma kṣatriyasya niyatam agnihotrādivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1252: tac ca yudha samprahāre ity asmād dhātor niṣpannaṃ śatru-prāṇa-viyogānukūla-śastra-prahāra-rūpaṃ vihitatvāgnīṣomīyādi-siṃhāvan na pratyavāya-janakam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1253: tathā ca gautamaḥ smarati na doṣo hiṃsāyām āhave 'nyatra vyaśvāsārathyanuyudha-kṛtāñjali-prakīrṇa-keśa-parāṅmukhopaviṣṭa-sthala-vṛkṣārūḍha-dūta-go-brāhmaṇa-vādibhyaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1255: etac ca sarvaṃ svadharmam api cāvekṣyety atra spaṣṭīkariṣyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1256: tathā ca yuddha-lakṣaṇe 'rthe 'gnihotrādivad vihitatvād aparihārye parihartum aśakye tad-akaraṇe pratyavāya-prasaṅgāt tvam adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-bhayena
GE07bhg4c02u:1258: yadi tu yuddhākhyaṃ karma kāmyam eva -
GE07bhg4c02u:1260: akūṭair āyudhair yānti te svargaṃ yogino yathā || [Yajñ. 13.324]
GE07bhg4c02u:1262: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1263: tadāpi prārabdhasya kāmyasyāpi avaśya-parisamāpanīyatvena nitya-tulyatvāt tvayā ca yuddhasya prārabdhatvād aparihāryatvaṃ tyulyam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1264: athavātma-nityatva-pakṣa eva śloka-dvayam arjunasya paramāstikasya veda-bāhya-matābhyupagamāsambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1265_0: akṣara-yojanā tu nityaś cāsau dehendriyādi-sambandha-vaśāj jātaś ceti nitya-jātas
GE07bhg4c02u:1265_1: tam enam ātmānaṃ nityam api santaṃ jātaṃ cen manyase tathā nityam api santaṃ mṛtaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1265_2: cen manyase tathāpi tvaṃ nānuśocitum arhasīti hetum āha jātasya hīty ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1269: viśvanāthaḥ : hi yasmāt tasya svārambhaka-karma-kṣaye mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1270: mṛtasya ca tad-deha-kṛtena karmaṇā janmāpi dhruvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1271: aparihārye 'rthe iti mṛtyur janma ca parihartum a]cakyam eva ity arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c02u:1274: pūrva-śarīrendriya-viyogas tu maraṇaṃ tad-ubhayaṃ ca dharmādharma-hetukatvāt tad-āśrayasya nityasyātmano mukhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1276: tasyānityasya kṛta-hānya-kṛtābhyāgama-prasaṅgena tad-āśrayatvānupapatter iti tārkikā manyante |
GE07bhg4c02u:1279: jātasya sva-karma-vaśāt prāpta-śarīrādi-yogasya nityasyāpy ātmanas tad-ārambhaka-karma-kṣaya-hetuko mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1280: mṛtasya tac-charīra-kṛta-karma-hetukaṃ janma ca dhruvaṃ syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1281: tasmād evam aparihārye parihartum aśakye janma-maraṇātmake 'rthe tvaṃ vidvān śocituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1282: tvayi yuddhān nivṛtte 'py ete svārambhake karmaṇi kṣīṇe sati mariṣyanty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1289: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca dehānāṃ svabhāvaṃ paryālocya tad-upādhike ātmano janma-maraṇe śoko na kārya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1292: tad eva ādir utpatteḥ pūrva-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyaktādīni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1295: tathā vyaktam abhivyaktaṃ madhyaṃ janma-maraṇāntarālaṃ sthiti-lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni vyakta-madhyāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1296: avyakte nidhanaṃ layo yeṣāṃ tānīmāny evaṃ-bhūtāny eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1299: pratibuddhasya svapna-dṛṣṭa-vastuṣv iva śoko na yujyata ity arthaḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c02u:1301: tad evaṃ sarva-prakāreṇātmano 'śocyatvam upapāditam athedānīm ātmano 'śocyatve 'pi bhūta-saṅghātātmakāni śarīrāṇy uddiśya śocāmīty arjunāśaṅkām apanudati bhagavān avyaktādīnīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1302: ādau janmanaḥ prāg-avyaktāni anupalabdhāni bhūtāni pṛthivyādi-bhūta-mayāni śarīrāṇi madhye janmānantaraṃ maraṇāt prāg-vyaktāni upalabdhāni santi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1304: yathā svapnendrajālādau pratibhāsa-mātra-jīvanāni śukti-rūpyādivan na tu jñānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ vā sthitāni dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭy-abhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1305: tathā ca - ādāv ante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā [ṃā. Kā. 2.6] iti nyāyena madhye 'pi na santy evaitāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1306: nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ [Gītā 2.16] iti prāg-ukteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1307: evaṃ sati tatra teṣu mithyā-bhūteṣv atyanta-tuccheṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevanā ko vā duḥkha-pralāpo na ko 'py ucita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1308: na hi svapne vividhān bandhūn upalabhya pratibuddhas tad-vicchedena śocati pṛthag-jano 'pi etad evoktaṃ purāṇe adarśanād āpatitaḥ punaś cādarśanaṃ gataḥ bhūta-saṅgha iti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1309: tathā ca śarīrāṇy apy uddiśya śoko nocita iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1311_0: avyaktam avyākṛtam avidyopahita-caitanyam ādiḥ prāg avasthā yeṣāṃ tāni tathā vyaktaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1311_1: nāma-rūpābhyām evāvidyakābhyāṃ prakaṭībhūtaṃ na tu svena paramārtha-sadātmanā madhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1311_2: sthity-avasthā yeṣāṃ tādṛśāni bhūtāni ākāśādīni avyakta-nidhanāny evāvyakte sva-kāraṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:1311_3: mṛd iva ghaṭādīnāṃ nidhanaṃ pralayo yeṣāṃ teṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevaneti pūrvavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1312: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad dhedaṃ tarhy avyākṛtam āsīt tan-nāma-rūpābhyām eva vyākriyata [BAU 1.4.7] ity ādir avyaktopādānatāṃ sarvasya prapañcasya darśayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1313: laya-sthānatvaṃ tu tasyārtha-siddhaṃ kāraṇa eva kārya-layasya darśanāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1315: tathā cājñāna-kalpitatvena tucchāny ākāśādi-bhūtāny apy uddiśya śoko nocitaś cet tat-kāryāṇy
GE07bhg4c02u:1316: uddiśya nocita iti kim u vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1317: athavā sarvadā teṣām avyakta-rūpeṇa vidyamānatvād vicchedābhāvena tan-nimittaḥ pralāpo nocita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1318: bhāratety anena sambodhayan śuddha-vaṃśodbhavatvena śāstrīyam arthaṃ pratipattum arho 'si kim iti na pratipadyasa iti sūcayati ||28||
GE07bhg4c02u:1319: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ na jāyate na mriyate ity-ādinā,
GE07bhg4c02u:1320: deha-pakṣe ca jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyuḥ ity anena śoka-viṣayaṃ nirākṛtya idānīm ubhaya-pakṣe 'pi nirākaroti avyakteti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1322: avyaktāni na vyaktaṃ vyaktir ādau janma-pūrva-kāle yeṣāṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1323: kintu tadānīm api liṅga-dehaḥ sthūla-dehaś ca svārambhaka-pṛthivy-ādi-sattvāt kāraṇātmanā vartamāno 'spaṣṭam āsīd evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1325: na vyakti nidhanād anantaraṃ yeṣāṃ tāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1326: mahā-pralaye 'pi karma-mātrādīnāṃ sattvāt sūkṣma-rūpeṇa bhūtāni santy eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1327: tasmāt sarva-bhūtāni ādy-antarayor avyaktāni madhye vyaktānīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1328: yad uktaṃ śrutibhiḥ - sthira-cara-jātayaḥ syur ajayottha-nimitta-yujaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1329: kā paridevanā kaḥ śoka-nimittaḥ vilāpaḥ ? tathā coktaṃ nāradena -
GE07bhg4c02u:1330: yan manyase dhruvaṃ lokam adhruvaṃ vā na cobhayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1331: sarvathā na hi śocyās te snehād anyatra mohajāt || [BhP 1.13.44] iti ||28||
GE07bhg4c02u:1333: atha dehātma-pakṣe ātmātirikta-deha-pakṣe ca deha-vināśa-hetuka-śoko na yuktas tad-ārambhakāṇāṃ bhūta-mātrāṇām avināśād ity āha avyaktādīnīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1334: avyaktaṃ nāma-rūpa-virahāt sūkṣmaṃ pradhānam ādi ādi-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyakta-nidhanāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1335: avyakte tādṛśi pradhāne nidhanaṃ nāma-rūpa-vimardana-lakṣaṇo nāśo yeṣāṃ tāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1336: mṛd-ādike sad-rūpe dravye kambu-grīvādy-avasthā-yoge ghaṭasyotpattis tad-virodhi-kapālādy-avasthā-yogas tu tasya vināśaḥ kathyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1338: evam evāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ - mahī ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭataḥ kapālikā cūrṇa-rajas tato 'ṇuḥ [ViP 2.12.42] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1341: tad-ārambhakāni bhūtāni tu sarvadā santīti teṣu vastutaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1342: satsu kā paridevanā kaḥ śoka-nimitta-vilāpa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1343: dehānya-nityātma-pakṣe tu vāsāṃsi ity ādikaṃ na vismartavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1344_0: yat tv ādy-antayor asattvān madhye 'pi bhūtāny asanty evātaḥ svāpnika-rathāśvādi-prakhyāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1344_1: mṛṣā-bhūtāny eva tena tad-viyoga-hetukaḥ śokaḥ pratibuddhasya na dṛṣṭa iti dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭim
GE07bhg4c02u:1345: tad evaṃ mata-dvaye 'pi deha-vināśa-hetukaḥ śoko nāstīti siddham ||28||
GE07bhg4c02u:1351: śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit ||29||
GE07bhg4c02u:1352: śrīdharaḥ : kutas tarhi vidvāṃso 'pi loke śocanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1353: ātmā-jñānād eva ity āśayenātmano durvijñeyatvam āha āścaryavad ityādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1354: kaścid enam ātmānaṃ śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ paśyann āścaryavat paśyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1355: sarva-gatasya nitya-jñānānada-svabhāvasyātmanaḥ alaukikatvād aindrajālikavad ghaṭamānaṃ paśyann iva vismayena paśyati asambhāvanābhibhūtatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1358: kaścit punaḥ viparīta-bhāvanābhibhūtaḥ śrutvāpi naiva veda |
GE07bhg4c02u:1359: ca-śabdād uktvāpi na dṛṣṭvāpi na samyag vedeti draṣṭavyam ||29||
GE07bhg4c02u:1360: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu vidvāṃso 'pi bahavaḥ śocanti tat kiṃ mām eva punaḥ punar evam upālabhase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1361_0: anyac ca vaktur eva hi taj jāḍyaṃ śrotā yatra na budhyate iti nyāyāt tvad-vacanārthāpartipattiś
GE07bhg4c02u:1361_1: ca tavāpy anyeṣām iva svāśaya-doṣād iti nokta-doṣa-dvayam ity abhipretyātmano durvijñeyatām
GE07bhg4c02u:1362_0: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam āścaryeṇādbhutena tulyatayā vartamānam āvidyaka-nānā-vidha-viruddha-dharmavattayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1362_1: satanm apy asantam iva sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpam api jaḍam ivānanda-ghanam api duḥkhitam
GE07bhg4c02u:1362_2: iva nirvikāram api savikāram iva nityam anityam iva prakāśamānam apy aprakāśamānam
GE07bhg4c02u:1362_3: iva brahmābhinnam api tad-bhinnam iva muktam api baddham ivādvitīyam api sa-dvitīyam
GE07bhg4c02u:1363: tathā kaścid enaṃ yat paśyati tad āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:1364: | ātma-darśanam apy āścaryavad eva yat svarūpato mithyā-bhūtam api satyasya vyañjakam āvidyakam apy avidyāyā vighātakam avidyām upaghnat tat-kāryatayā svātmānam apy upahantīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1365: tathā yaḥ kaścid enaṃ paśyati sa āścaryavad iti kartṛ-viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1366_0: yato 'sau nivṛttāvidyātat-kāryo 'pi prārabdha-karma-prābalyāt tadvān iva vyaharati
GE07bhg4c02u:1366_1: sarvadā samādhi-niṣṭho 'pi vyuttiṣṭhati vyutthito 'pi punaḥ samādhim anubhavatīti
GE07bhg4c02u:1367: tad etat trayam apy āścaryam ātmā taj jñānaṃ taj-jñātā ceti parama-durvijñeyam ātmānaṃ tvaṃ katham anāyāsena jānīyā ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1368: īvam upadeṣṭur abhāvād apy ātmā durvijñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1369: yo hy ātmānaṃ jānāti sa eva tam anyasmai dhruvaṃ brūyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1370: ajñasyopadeṣṭṛtvāsambhavāt, jānaṃs tu samāhita-cittaḥ prāyeṇa kathaṃ bravītu |
GE07bhg4c02u:1372: yathā kathaṃcij jñāto 'pi lābha-pūjā-khyāty-ādi-prayojanānapekṣatvāc ca bravīty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1373: kathaṃcit kāruṇya-mātreṇa bruvaṃs tu parameśvaravad atyanta-durlabha evety āha āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1377: na tu yaḥ paśyati tato 'nya iti vyāghātāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1378: atrāpi karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ kartari cāścaryavad iti yojyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1379: tatra karmaṇaḥ kartuś ca prāg āścaryavattvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ kriyāyās tu vyākhyāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1382: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1383_0: kenāpi śabdenāvācyasya śuddhasyātmano viśiṣṭa-śaktena padena jahad-ajahat-svārtha-lakṣaṇāyā
GE07bhg4c02u:1383_1: kalpita-sambandhena lakṣyatāvacchedakam antareṇaiva pratipādanaṃ tad api nirvikalpa-sākṣātkāra-rūpam
GE07bhg4c02u:1384: athavā vinā śaktiṃ vinā lakṣaṇāṃ vinā sambandhāntaraṃ suṣuptotthāpaka-vākya-vat tattvam asyādi-vākyena yadātmatattva-pratipādanaṃ tad āścaryavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1386: na ca vinā sambandhaṃ bodhanen 'tiprasaṅgaḥ lakṣaṇā-pakṣe 'pi tulyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1390: kaścid eva tātparya-viśeṣam avadhārayati na sarva iti cet |
GE07bhg4c02u:1391: hanta tarhi puruṣa-gata eva kaścid viśeṣo nirdoṣatva-rūpo niyāmakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1393_0: tathā ca yādṛśasya śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya tātparyānusandhāna-puraḥ-saraṃ lakṣaṇayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1393_1: vākyārtha-bodho bhavadbhir aṅgī kriyate tādṛśasyaiva kevalaḥ śabda-viśeṣo 'khaṇḍa-sākṣātkāraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1393_2: vināpi sambandhena janayatīti kim anupapannam | etasmin
GE07bhg4c02u:1394: pakṣe śabda-vṛtty-aviṣayatvād yato vāco nivartanta iti sutarām upapannam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1399: hitvā nidrāṃ prabudhyante suṣupter bodhitāḥ paraiḥ ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1400: jāgradvan na yataḥ śabdaṃ suṣupte vetti kaścana |
GE07bhg4c02u:1403: naśyaty avidyayā sārdhaṃ hatvā rogam ivauṣadham || [Bṛhat.Vā 1.4.860-863]
GE07bhg4c02u:1405_0: tad evaṃ vacana-viṣayasya vaktur vacana-kriyāyāś cātyāścarya-rūpatvād ātmano durvijñānatvam
GE07bhg4c02u:1405_1: uktvā śrotur durmilatvād api tad āha āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrtuvā 'py enaṃ vedeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1406_0: anyo draṣṭur vaktuśc a muktād vilakṣaṇo mumukṣur vaktāraṃ brahma-vidaṃ vidhivad upasṛtyainaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1407: śrutvā cainaṃ manana-nididhyāsana-paripākād vedāpi sākṣātkaroty api āścaryavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1408: tathā cāścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam iti vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1411: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye |
GE07bhg4c02u:1412: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ || [Gītā 7.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1416: āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ || [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1418: nanu yaḥ śravaṇa-mananādikaṃ karoti sa ātmānaṃ vedeti kim āścaryam ata āha - na caiva kaścid iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1420: kaścid enaṃ naiva veda śravaṇādikaṃ kurvann api |
GE07bhg4c02u:1421: tad akurvaṃs tu na vedeti kim u vaktavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1424: kutas taj-jñānam iti cet tad dhi bandha-parikṣayāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1425: asāv api ca bhūtau vā bhāvī vā vartate 'thavā || [Bṛh. Vā. Sa. 294] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1426: śravaṇādi kurvatām api pratibandha-parikṣayād eva jñānaṃ jāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1428: sa ca pratibandha-parikṣayaḥ kasyacid bhūta eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1435: jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ iti smṛteś ca durvijñeyo 'yam ātmeti nirgalito 'rthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1436: yadi tu śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścid ity eva vyākhyāyeta tadā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti śrutyaika-vākyatā na syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1437: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ [Gītā 7.3] iti bhagavad-vacana-virodhaś ceti vidvadbhir avinayaḥ kṣantavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1438_0: athavā na caiva kaścid ity asya sarvatra sambandhaḥ kaścid enaṃ na paśyati na vadati
GE07bhg4c02u:1438_1: na śṛṇoti śrutvāpi na vedeti pañca prakārā uktāḥ kaścit paśyaty eva na vadati kaścit
GE07bhg4c02u:1438_2: paśyati na vadati ca kaścit tad-vacanaṃ śṛṇoti ca tad-arthaṃ jānāti ca kaścic chrutvāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:1438_3: na jānāti na kaścit tu sarva-bahirbhūta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1439: avidvat-pakṣe tu asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanābhibhūtatvād āścarya-tulyatvaṃ darśana-vadana-śravaṇeṣv iti nigada-vyākhyātaḥ ślokaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1441: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu kim idam āścaryaṃ brūṣe |
GE07bhg4c02u:1443: yad eva prabodhyamānasyāpy aviveko nāpayātīti tatra satyam evem eva ity āha āścaryavad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1444: enam ātmānaṃ dehaṃ ca tad-ubhaya-rūpaṃ sarva-lokam ||29||
GE07bhg4c02u:1446: nanu sarvajñena tvayā bahūpadiśyamāno 'py ahaṃ śoka-nivārakam ātma-yāthātmyaṃ na budhye kim etad iti cet tatrāha āścaryavad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1447_2: aspṛṣṭam evam ādi bahu-viruddha-dharmatayāścaryavad adbhuta-sādṛśyena sthitam enaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1447_3: mad-upadiṣṭaṃ jīvaṃ kaścid eva svadharmānuṣṭhānena satya-tapo-japādinā ca vimṛṣṭa-hṛd-guru-prasāda-labdha-tādṛśa-jñānaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1448: āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇaṃ vā kartṛ-viśeṣaṇaṃ veti vyākhyātāraḥ kaścid enam yat paśyati tad āścaryavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1449: yaḥ kaścit paśyati so 'py āścaryavad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1452: samyag amṛṣṭa-hṛd ity arthaḥ | tathā ca duradhigamaṃ jīvātmayāthātmyam | śrutir apy evam āha -
GE07bhg4c02u:1459: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata |
GE07bhg4c02u:1460: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1461: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam avadhyatvam ātmanaḥ saṅkṣepenopadiśan aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīty ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1464_0: sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya dehe vadhyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī liṅga-dehopādhir ātmā vadhyo
GE07bhg4c02u:1464_1: na bhavatīti nityaṃ niyataṃ yasmāt tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthūlāni sūkṣmāṇi ca bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāny
GE07bhg4c02u:1466: liṅga-dehasyāśocyatvam ātmavad evāvadhyatvād iti na sthūla-dehasya liṅga-dehasyātmano vā śocyatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1467: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi niścitya brūhi kim ahaṃ kuryāṃ kiṃ vā na kuryām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1468: tatra śokaṃ mā kuru yuddhaṃ tu kurv ity āha dehīti dvābhyām ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1469: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ duradhigamaṃ jīva-yāthātmyaṃ samāsenopadiśann aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1470: sarvasya jīva-gaṇasya dehe hanyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī jīvo nityam avadhyo yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāni śocituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1471: ātmanāṃ nityatvād aśocyatvaṃ tad-dehānāṃ tv avaśya-vināśatvāt tattvam ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1474: sva-dharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1475: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1477: yac coktam arjunena vepathuś ca śarīre me ity ādi tad apy ayuktam ity āha svadharmam apīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1478: ātmano nāśābhāvād eva etesāṃ hanane 'pi vikampituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1479: kiṃ ca svadharmam apy avekṣya vikampitum nārhasi iti sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1480: yac coktaṃ - na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhava iti tatrāha dharmyād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1484_1: karuṇādi-doṣa-nibandhanam asādhāraṇaṃ bhramaṃ nirākartuṃ hiṃsādimattve 'pi yuddhasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1485_0: na kevalaṃ paramārtha-tattvam evāvekṣya kiṃ tu svadharmam api kṣatriya-dharmam api
GE07bhg4c02u:1485_1: yuddhāparāṅmukhatva-rūpam avekṣya śāstrataḥ paryālocya vikampituṃ vicalituṃ dharmād
GE07bhg4c02u:1486_0: tatraivaṃ sati yadyapy ete na paśyanti ity ādinā narake niyataṃ vāso bhavati ity
GE07bhg4c02u:1486_1: antena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:1486_2: ca guru-vadha-brahma-vadhādy-akaraṇaṃ yad abhihitaṃ tat sarvaṃ dharma-śāstra-paryālocanād evoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1488: hi yasmād dharmyād aparāṅmukhatva-dharmād anapetād yuddhād anyat kṣatriyasya śreyaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1489: yuddham eva hi pṛthivī-jaya-dvāreṇa prajā-rakṣaṇa-brāhmaṇa-śuśrūṣādi-kṣātra-dharma-nirvāhakam iti tad eva kṣatriyasya praśastataram ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1491: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan |
GE07bhg4c02u:1492: nirjitya para-sainyādi kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa pālayet || [Parāśara-smṛti 1.58] iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1494: samottamādhamai rājā tv āhūtaḥ pālayan prajāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1495: na nivarteta saṃgrāmāt kṣātraṃ dharmam anusmaran ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1497: śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājñāṃ śreyaskaraṃ param || [Manu 7.88-9] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1499: tena bhūmi-pālasyaivāyaṃ dharma iti na bhramitavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1500: udāhṛta-vacane 'pi kṣatriyo hīti kṣāttraṃ dharmam iti ca spaṣṭaṃ liṅgam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1501: tasmāt kṣatriyasya yuddhaṃ praśasto dharma iti sādhu bhagavato 'bhihitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1502: apaśavo 'nye go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvāḥ itivat praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā yuddhād anyac-chreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyata ity uktam iti na doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1503: etena yuddhāt praśastataraṃ kiṃcid anuṣṭhātuṃ tato nivṛttir uciteti nirastam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1504: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity etad api ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1505: viśvanāthaḥ : ātmano nāśābhāvād eva vadhād vikampituṃ bhetuṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1506: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasīti sambandhaḥ ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1508_0: evaṃ paramātma-jñānopayogitvād ādau jīvātma-jñānaṃ sarvān prati taulyenopadiśya sa-niṣṭhān
GE07bhg4c02u:1508_1: prati niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi hṛd-viśuddhi-sahakṛtām ātma-jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ niṣpādayantīti
GE07bhg4c02u:1508_2: vadiṣyan tasyāṃ pratītim utpādayituṃ sakāmatayānuṣṭhitānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kāmya-phala-pradatvam
GE07bhg4c02u:1509: yuddhaṃ khalu kṣatriyasya nityatam agnihotrādivad vihitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1510: tac ca śatru-prāṇa-vihaṃsana-rūpam agniṣṭomādi-paśu-hiṃsanavan na pratyavāya-nimittam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1512: hīnayor deha-lokayos tyāgena divyayos tayor lobhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1515: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ || [Manu 7.90]
GE07bhg4c02u:1516: yajñeṣu paśavo brahman hanyante satataṃ dvijaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1517: saṃskṛtāḥ kila mantraiś ca te 'pi svargam avāpnuvan || [?] ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1518: evaṃ nija-dharmam avekṣya vikampituṃ dharmāt pracalituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1519: yuktaṃ na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ādinā narake nityataṃ vāso bhavatīyt antyena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1520: tac cājñānād evety āha dharmyād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1523: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan |
GE07bhg4c02u:1524: nirjitya para-sainyādi kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa pālayet || [Parāśara-smṛti 1.58] iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1528: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam ||32||
GE07bhg4c02u:1529: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca mahati śreyasi svayam evopāgate sati kuto vikampasa iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1531: yadṛcchayā aprārthitam eva upapannaṃ prāptam īdṛśaṃ yuddham labhante |
GE07bhg4c02u:1533: yad vā ya evaṃvidhaṃ yuddhaṃ labhante ta eva sukhina ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1534: etena svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava iti yad uktaṃ tan nirastaṃ bhavati ||32||
GE07bhg4c02u:1536: nanu yuddhasya kartavyatve 'pi na bhīṣma-droṇādibhir gurubhiḥ saha tat kartum ucitam atigarhitatvād ity āśaṅkyāha yadṛcchayeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1539_1: yuddhaṃ ye kṣatriyāḥ pratiyogitvena labhante te sukhinaḥ sukha-bhāja eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1540: jaye satyenāyāsenaiva yaśaso rājyasya ca lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1541: parājaye cātiśīghram eva svargasya lābhād ity āha svarga-dvāram apāvṛtam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1542: apratibaddhaṃ svarga-sādhanaṃ yuddham avyavadhānenaiva svarga-janakaṃ jyotiṣṭhomādikaṃ tu ciratareṇa deha-pātasya pratibandhābhāvasya cāpekṣaṇād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1543: svarga-dvāram ity anena śyenādivat pratyavāya-śaṅkā parihṛtā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1546: tat-phalasya śatru-vadhasya na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni,
GE07bhg4c02u:1547: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddhasya pratyavāya-janakatvāt phale vidhy-abhāvāc ca na vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyāvatāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1548: yuddhasya hi phalaṃ svargaḥ sa ca na niṣiddhaḥ | tathā ca manuḥ --
GE07bhg4c02u:1550: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ || [Manu 7.90] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1551: yuddhaṃ tu agnīṣomīyādy-ālambha-vadha-vihitatvān na niṣedhena spraṣṭuṃ śakyate ṣoḍaśi-grahaṇādivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1552: grahaṇāgrahayos tulya-balatayā vikalpavat sāmānya-śāstrasya viśeṣa-śāstreṇa saṅkoca-sambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1553: tathā ca vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyād yuddhaṃ na pratyavāya-janakaṃ nāpi bhīṣma-droṇādi-guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimitto doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1555: guruṃ vā bāla-vṛddhau vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā bahu-śrutam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1558: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1559: nātatāyi-vadho doṣo hantur bhavati kaścana || [Manu 8.350-351] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1561: smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1562: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ || [Yājñavalkya 2.21]
GE07bhg4c02u:1564: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt iti hi dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvād dharma-śāstraṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1565: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet iti ca sva-jīvanārthatvād artha-śāstram |
GE07bhg4c02u:1566: atrocyate brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabheta itivad yuddha-vidhāyakam api dharma-śāstram eva sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1568_1: vidhānān mitra-labdhyādy-artha-śāstrānusāreṇa catuṣpād vyavahāre śatror api jaye
GE07bhg4c02u:1568_2: dharma-śāstrātikramo na kartavya ity etat paraṃ vacanam etad ity āha |
GE07bhg4c02u:1570: tad evaṃ yuddha-karaṇe sukhokteḥ svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ity arjunoktam apākṛtam ||32||
GE07bhg4c02u:1572: jetṛbhyaḥ sakāśād api nyāya-yuddhe mṛtānām adhikaṃ sukham ato bhīṣmādīn hatvā tān pratyuta svato 'pi adhika-sukhinaḥ kuru ity āha yadṛcchayeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1575: baladevaḥ : kiṃ cāyatnād āgate 'smin mahati śreyasi na yuktas te kampa ity āha yadṛcchayeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1577: yatnaṃ vinaiva copapannam īdṛśaṃ bhīṣmādibhir mahā-vīraiḥ saha yuddhaṃ sukhinaḥ sabhāgyāḥ kṣatriyā labhante |
GE07bhg4c02u:1578: vijaye satya-śrameṇa kīrti-rājyayor mṛtyau sati śīghram eva svargasya ca prāpter ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1579: etad vyañjayan viśinaṣṭi - svarga-dvāram upāvṛtam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1584: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1585: tataḥ sva-dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi ||33||
GE07bhg4c02u:1586: śrīdharaḥ : viparyaye doṣam āha atha ced iti ||33||
GE07bhg4c02u:1589: api trailokya-rājyasya ity uktatvāt tat kathaṃ mayā kartavyam ity āśaṅkyākaraṇe doṣam āha atha ced iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1591: imaṃ bhīṣma-droṇādi-vīra-puruṣa-pratiyogikaṃ dharmyaṃ hiṃsādi-doṣaṇāduṣṭaṃ satāṃ dharmād anapetām iti vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1593: na kūṭair āyudhair hanyād yudhyamāno raṇe ripūn |
GE07bhg4c02u:1595: na ca hanyāt sthalārūḍhaṃ na klībaṃ na kṛtāñjalim |
GE07bhg4c02u:1596: na mukta-keśaṃ nāsīnaṃ na tavāsmīti vādinam ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1597: na suptaṃ na visaṃnāhaṃ na nagnaṃ na nirāyudham |
GE07bhg4c02u:1600: na bhītaṃ na parāvṛttaṃ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran || [Manu 7.91-94] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1601: satāṃ dharmam ullaṅghya yudhyamāno hi pāpīyān syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1602_0: tvaṃ tu parair āhūto 'pi sad-dharmopetam api saṅgrāmaṃ yuddhaṃ na kariṣyasi dharmato
GE07bhg4c02u:1602_1: lokato vā bhītaḥ parāvṛtto bhaviṣyasi cet tato nirjitya para-sainyāni kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:1602_3: hitvānanuṣṭhāya kīrtiṃ ca mahādevādi-samāgama-nimittāṃ hitvā na nivarteta saṅgrāmāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1602_4: ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddha-saṅgrāma-nivṛttyā ca raṇa-janyaṃ pāpam eva kevalam avāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c02u:1602_5: na tu dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ cety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1603: athavā 'neka-janmārjitaṃ dharmaṃ tyaktvā rāja-kṛtaṃ pāpam evāvāpsyasīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1604_0: yasmāt tvāṃ parāvṛttam ete duṣṭā avaśyaṃ haniṣyanti ataḥ parāvṛtta-hataḥ saṃś ciropārjita-nija-sukṛta-parityāgena
GE07bhg4c02u:1604_1: paropārjita-duṣkṛta-mātra-bhāṅ mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ | tathā ca manuḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:1605: yas tu bhītaḥ parāvṛttaḥ saṅgrāme hanyate paraiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1606: bhartur yad duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ pratipadyate ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1607: yac cāsya sukṛtaṃ kiṃcid amutrārtham upārjitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1608: bhartā tat sarvam ādatte parāvṛtta-hatasya tu || [Manu 7.95-96] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1609: yājñavalkyo 'pi rājā sukṛtam ādatte hatānāṃ vipalāyinām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1610: tena yad uktam - pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ [Gītā 1.36],
GE07bhg4c02u:1611: etān na hantum icchāmi ghanto 'pi madhusūdana [Gītā 1.35] iti tan nirākṛtaṃ bhavati ||33||
GE07bhg4c02u:1612: viśvanāthaḥ : vipakṣe doṣam āha atheti caturbhiḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c02u:1613: baladevaḥ : vipakṣe doṣān darśayati athety ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1614_0: svasya tava dharmyaṃ yuddha-lakṣaṇaṃ kīrtiṃ ca rudra-santoṣaṇa-nivāta-kavacādi-vadha-labdhāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1614_1: hitvā pāpaṃ na nivarteta saṅgrāmād ity ādi smṛti-pratiṣiddhaṃ sva-dharma-tyāga-lakṣaṇaṃ prāpsyasi ||33 ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1619: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca akīrtim ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1624: evaṃ kīrti-dharmayor iṣṭayor aprāptir aniṣṭasya ca pāpasya prāptir yuddha-parityāge darśitā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1625: tatra pāpākhyam aniṣṭaṃ vyavadhānena duḥkha-phaladam āmutrikatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1626: śiṣṭa-garhā-lakṣaṇaṃ tv aniṣṭam āsanna-phaladam atyasahyam ity āha akīrtim iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1627: bhūtāni devarṣi-manuṣyādīni te tavāvyayāṃ dīrgha-kālam akīrtiṃ na dharmātmāyaṃ na śūro 'yam ity evaṃ-rūpāṃ kathayiṣyanty anyonyaṃ kathā-prasaṅge |
GE07bhg4c02u:1629: na kevalaṃ kīrti-dharmau hitvā pāpaṃ prāpsyasi api tu akīrtiṃ ca prāpsyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1630: na kevalaṃ tvam eva tāṃ prāpsyasi api tu bhūtāny api kathayiṣyantīti vā nipātayor arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1631: nanu yuddhe sva-maraṇa-sandehāt tat-parihārārtham akīrtir api soḍhavyā ātma-rakṣaṇasyātyantāpekṣitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1633: sāmnā dānena bhedena samastair atha vā pṛthak |
GE07bhg4c02u:1634: vijetuṃ prayatetārīn na yuddhena kadā cana ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1636: parājayaś ca saṃgrāme tasmād yuddhaṃ vivarjayet ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1638: tathā yudhyeta saṃpanno vijayeta ripūn yathā || [ManuS 7.198-200]
GE07bhg4c02u:1640_0: tathā ca maraṇa-bhītasya kim akīrti-duḥkham iti śaṅkām apanudati sambhāvitasya dharmātmā
GE07bhg4c02u:1640_1: śūra ity evam ādibhir ananya-labhyair guṇair bahumatasya janasyākīrtir maraṇād apy
GE07bhg4c02u:1642: evaṃ yasmād ato 'kīrter maraṇam eva varaṃ nyūnatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1645: udāhṛta-vacanaṃ tv artha-śāstratvāt na nivarteta saṅgrāmāt [Manu 7.88] ity ādi-dharma-śāstrād durbalam iti bhāvaḥ ||34||
GE07bhg4c02u:1647: baladevaḥ : na kevalaṃ svadharmasya kīrteś ca kṣati-mātram |
GE07bhg4c02u:1648: yuddhe samārabdhe 'rjunaḥ palāyata ity avyayāṃ śāśvatīm akīrtiṃ ca tava bhūtāni sarve lokāḥ kathayiṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1649: nanu maraṇād bhītena mayā akīrtiḥ soḍhavyeti cet tatrāha sambhāvitasyātipratiṣṭhitasya |
GE07bhg4c02u:1651: tathā ca tādṛśākīṛter maraṇam eva varam iti ||34||
GE07bhg4c02u:1652: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1653: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam ||35||
GE07bhg4c02u:1655: yeṣāṃ bahu-guṇatvena tvaṃ pūrvaṃ sammato 'bhūs ta eva bhayāt saṃgrāmān nivṛttaṃ tvāṃ manyeran |
GE07bhg4c02u:1656: tataś ca pūrvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā lāghavam laghutāṃ yāsyasi ||35||
GE07bhg4c02u:1659_0: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ bahu-mato 'smac-chatrur arjunas tu mahāśūra iti bahu-saṃmāna-viṣayo bhūtvā
GE07bhg4c02u:1659_1: samprati yuddhād uparame sati lāghavaṃ yāsyasi te duryodhanādayo mahārathās tvāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1659_2: bhayād eva raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyanta ity anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1660: kṣatriyāṇāṃ hi bhayaṃ vinā yuddhoparati-hetur bandhu-snehādiko nopapadyata iti matveti bhāvaḥ ||35||
GE07bhg4c02u:1662: nanu kula-kṣaya-doṣāt kāruṇyāc ca vinivṛttasya mama katham akīrtiḥ syād iti cet tatrāha bhayād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1663: mahārathā duryodhanādayas tvāṃ karṇādi-bhayān na tu bandhu-kāruṇyād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante |
GE07bhg4c02u:1664: na hi śūrasya śatru-bhayaṃ vinā bandhu-snehena yuddhād uparatir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1665: itaḥ pūrvaṃ yeṣāṃ tvaṃ bahumataḥ śūro vairīti bahu-guṇavattayā saṃmato 'bhūr idānīṃ yuddhe samupasthite kātaro 'yaṃ vinivṛtta ity evaṃ tat-kṛtaṃ lāghavaṃ duḥsahaṃ yāsyasi ||35||
GE07bhg4c02u:1669: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim ||36||
GE07bhg4c02u:1671: avācyān vādān vacanānarhān śabdān tava ahitāḥ tvac-chatravo vadiṣyanti ||36||
GE07bhg4c02u:1673: nanu bhīṣmādayo mahārathā na bahu manyantāṃ duryodhanādayas tu śatravo bahu maṃsyante māṃ yuddha-nivṛttyā tad-upakāritvād ity ata āha avācyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1674_0: tavāsādhāraṇaṃ yat sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ tan nindantas tava śatravo duryodhanādayo
GE07bhg4c02u:1674_1: 'vācyān vādān vacanān arhān ṣaṇḍha-tilādi-rūpān eva śabdān bahūn aneka-prakārān vadiṣyanti
GE07bhg4c02u:1674_2: na tu bahu maṃsyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1675: athavā tava sāmarthyaṃ stuti-yogyatvaṃ tava nindanto 'hitā avācya-vādān vadiṣyantīty anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1676_0: nanu bhīṣma-droṇādi-vadha-prayuktaṃ kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkham asahamāno yuddhān nivṛttaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1676_1: śatru-kṛta-sāmarthya-nindanādi-duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ śakṣyāmīty ata āha tatas tasmān nindā-prāpti-duḥkhāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1676_2: kiṃ tu duḥkhataraṃ tato 'dhikaṃ kim api duḥkhaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ ||36 ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1677: viśvanāthaḥ : avācya-vādān | klība ity ādi kaṭūktīḥ ||36||
GE07bhg4c02u:1679: ahitāḥ śatravo dhārtarāṣṭrās tava sāmarthyaṃ pūrva-siddhaṃ parākramaṃ nindantaḥ bahūn avācya-vādān śaṇḍhatilādi-śabdān vadiṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1680: tata evaṃvidhāvācya-vāda-śravaṇād atiśāyitaṃ kiṃ duḥkham asti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1681: itthaṃ caite ṣaḍbhir yuddha-vairāgyasyāsvargatvam akīrti-karatvaṃ coktaṃ darśitam ||36||
GE07bhg4c02u:1684: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm |
GE07bhg4c02u:1686: śrīdharaḥ : yad uktaṃ na caitad vidmaḥ [Gītā 2.6] iti tatrāha hato vety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1689_0: nanu tarhi yuddhe gurv-ādi-vadha-vaśān madhyastha-kṛtā nindā tato nivṛttau tu śatru-kṛtā
GE07bhg4c02u:1689_1: nindety ubhayataḥ pāśā rajjur ity āśaṅkya jaye parājaye ca lābha-dhrauvyād yuddhārtham
GE07bhg4c02u:1689_2: evotthānam āvaśyakam ity āha hato veti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1691: yasmād ubhayathāpi te lābhas tasmāj jeṣyāmi śatrūn mariṣyāmi veti kṛta-niścayaḥ san yuddhāyottiṣṭha |
GE07bhg4c02u:1693: etena na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyaḥ [Gītā 2.6] ity ādi parihṛtam ||37||
GE07bhg4c02u:1694: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu yuddhe mama jaya eva bhāvīty api nāsti niścayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1695: tataś ca kathaṃ yuddhe pravartitavyam ity ata āha hata iti ||37||
GE07bhg4c02u:1697: nanu yuddhe vijaya eva me syād iti niścayābhāvāt tato 'haṃ nivṛtto 'smīti cet tatrāha hato veti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1702: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi ||38||
GE07bhg4c02u:1703: śrīdharaḥ : yad apy uktaṃ pāpam evāśrayed asmān [Gītā 1.36] iti tatrāha sukha-duḥkhe ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1706: tayor api kāraṇa-bhūtāu jayājayāv api samau kṛtvā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1709: sukhādy-abhilāsaṃ hitvā svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamānaḥ pāpaṃ na prāpsyasīty arthaḥ ||38||
GE07bhg4c02u:1710: madhusūdanaḥ : nanv evaṃ svargam uddiśya yuddha-karaṇe tasya nityatva-vyāghātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1711: rājyam uddiśya yuddha-karaṇe tv artha-śāstratvād dharma-śāstrāpekṣayā daurbalyaṃ syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1712: tataś ca kāmyasyākaraṇe kutaḥ pāpaṃ dṛṣṭārthasya guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadhasya kuto dharmatvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1713: tathā cātha ced iti ślokārtho vyāhata iti cet tatrāha sukha-duḥkhe iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1715: sukhe tat-kāraṇe lābhe tat-kāraṇe lābhe tat-kāraṇe jaye ca rāgam akṛtvā,
GE07bhg4c02u:1716: evaṃ duḥkhe tad-dhetāv alābhe tad-dhetāv ajaye ca dveṣam akṛtvā tato yuddhāya yujyasva sannadhau bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:1717: evaṃ sukha-kāmanāṃ duḥkha-nivṛtti-kāmanāṃ vā vihāya svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamāno guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimittaṃ nitya-karmākaraṇa-nimittaṃ ca pāpaṃ na prāpsyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1718: yas tu phala-kāmanayā karoti sa guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ prāpnoti yo vā na karoti sa nitya-karmākaraṇa-nimittam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1719: ataḥ phala-kāmanām antareṇa kurvann ubhaya-vidham api pāpaṃ na prāpnotīti prāg eva vyākhyāto 'bhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1720: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti svānuṣaṅgika-phala-kathanam iti na doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1721: tathā ca āpastambaḥ smarati - tad yathāmre
GE07bhg4c02u:1722: phalārthe nimitte chāyā-gandhāvanūtpadyete evaṃ dharmaṃ caryamāṇam arthā anūtpadyante no ced anūtpadyante na dharma-hānir bhavati iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1723: ato yuddha-śāstrasyārtha-śāstratvābhāvāt pāpam evāśrayed asmān [Gītā 1.36] ity ādi nirākṛtaṃ bhavati ||38||
GE07bhg4c02u:1724: viśvanāthaḥ : tasmāt tava sarvathā yuddham eva dharmas tad api yad imaṃ pāpa-kāraṇam āśaṅkase,
GE07bhg4c02u:1725: tarhi mattaḥ pāpānutpatti-prakāraṃ śikṣitvā yudhyasvety āha sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1727: tad-dhetur jayājayāv api samau kṛtvā vivekena tulyau vibhāvety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1728: tataś caivaṃ-bhūta-sāmya-lakṣaṇe jñānavatas tava pāpaṃ naiva bhavet |
GE07bhg4c02u:1729: yad vakṣyate lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā [Gītā 5.10] iti ||38||
GE07bhg4c02u:1730: baladevaḥ : nanu atha cet tvam ity ādi-padyārtho vyāhṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1731: rājyādy-uddeśena kṛtasya yuddhasya guru-viprādi-vināśa-hetutvena pāpotpādakatvād iti cen mumukṣu-vartmanā yuddhamānasya tava tad-vināśa-hetukaṃ pāpaṃ na syād ity āha sukheti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1732: sāmya-karaṇam iha tatra tatra nirvikāratvaṃ bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1733: sukhe tad-dhetau jaye ca rāgam akṛtvā duḥkhe tad-dhetāv alābhe tad-dhetau parājaye ca dveṣam akṛtvā tatra tatra nirvikāra-cittaḥ san tato yuddhāya yujyasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1735: evaṃ mumukṣu-rītyā yoddhā tvaṃ pāpaṃ tad-vināśa-hetukaṃ nāvāpsyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1736: phalecchuḥ san yo yudhyate sa tat-pāpaṃ vindati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1737: vijñānārthī tu purātanam ananta-pāpam apanudatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1738: nanu phala-rāgaṃ vinā duṣkare yuddha-dānādau kathaṃ pravṛttir iti ced anantātmānanda-rāgaṃ tatra pravartakaṃ gṛhāṇa rājyādy-anurāgam iva bhṛgu-pāte ||38||
GE07bhg4c02u:1741: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c02u:1742: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi ||39||
GE07bhg4c02u:1743: śrīdharaḥ : upadiṣṭaṃ jñāna-yogam upasaṃharaṃs tat-sādhanaṃ karma-yogaṃ prastauti eṣety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1744: samyak khyāyate prakāśyate vastu-tattvam anayeti saṅkhyā samyak jñānam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1747: evam abhihitāyām api tava ced ātma-tattvam aparokṣaṃ na bhavati tarhy antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvārā ātma-tattvāparokṣārthaṃ karma-yoga tv imāṃ buddhiṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c02u:1748: yayā buddhyā yuktaḥ parameśvarārpita-karma-yogena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ san tat-prasāda-labdhāparokṣa-jñānena karmātmakaṃ bandhaṃ prakarṣeṇa hāsyasi tyakṣyasi ||39||
GE07bhg4c02u:1749: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu bhavatu svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamānasya pāpābhāvaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1750: tathāpi na māṃ prati yuddha-kartavyatopadeśas tavocitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1751: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ [Gītā 2.19] ity ādinā kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam [Gītā 2.21] ity antena viduṣaḥ sarva-karma-pratikṣepāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1752: na hy akartr-bhoktṛ-śuddha-svarūpo 'ham asmi yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tat-phalaṃ bhokṣya iti ca jñānaṃ sambhavati virodhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1754: ayaṃ cārjunābhiprāyo jyāyasī ced ity atra vyakto bhaviṣyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1755: tasmād ekam eva māṃ prati jñānasya karmaṇaś copadeśo nopapadyata iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c02u:1756: vidvad-avidvad-avasthā-bhedena jñāna-karmopadeśopapatter ity āha bhagavān eṣeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1757_0: eṣā na tv evāham ity ādy-eka-viṃśati-ślokais te tubhyam abhihitā sāṅkhye samyak khyāyate
GE07bhg4c02u:1757_1: sarvopādhi-śūnyatayā pratipādyate paramātma-tattvam anayeti saṅkhyopaniṣat tayaiva

GE07bhg4c02u:2154: tathā ca niṣkāma-karmabhiḥ śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya tavātma-jñānodaye para-brahmānanda-prāptiḥ syāt tathaiva ca sarvānanda-prāptau na kṣudrānanda-prāpti-nibandhana-vaiyagryāvakāśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2155: ataḥ paramānanda-prāpakāya tattva-jñānāya niṣkāma-karmāṇi kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2156: atra yathā tathā bhavatīti-pada-trayādhyāhāro yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayānuṣaṅgaś ca dārṣṭāntike draṣṭavyaḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c02u:2158: hanta kiṃ vaktavyaṃ niṣkāmasya nirguṇasya bhaktiyogasya māhātmyaṃ yasyaivārambhaṇa-mātre 'pi nāśa-pratyavāyau na staḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2167: yāvān artha iti kaścit kūpaḥ śauca-karmārthakaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2172: kaścit pānārthaka ity evaṃ sarvataḥ sarveṣudapāneṣu yāvān artho yāvanti prayojanānīty arthaḥ tasmin ekasminn eva śaucādi-karma-siddheḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2173: kiṃ ca, tat-tat-kūpeṣu pṛthak pṛthak paribhramaṇa-śrameṇa, sarovare tu taṃ vinaiva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2174: tathā kūpeṣu virasa-jalena sarovare tu surama-jalenaivety api viśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2175: evaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣu tat-tad-devatārādhanena yāvanto 'rthās tāvanta ekasya bhagavad-ārādhanena vijānato vijñasya brāhmaṇasyeti brahma vedaṃ bettīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2176: brahmaṇas tasya vijānato vedajñatve 'pi veda-tātparyaṃ bhaktiṃ viśeṣato jānataḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2180: daivīṃ māyāṃ tu śrī-kāmaḥ ity ādy-uktyā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2183: iti meghādy-amiśrasya saura-kiraṇasya tīvratvam iva bhaktiyogasya jñāna-karmādy-amiśratvaṃ tīvratvaṃ jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2184: atra bahubhyo bahu-kāma-siddhir iti sarvathā bahu-buddhitvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2185: ekasmād bhagavata eva sarva-kāma-siddhir ity aṃśenaika-buddhitvād eka-buddhitvam eva viṣaya-sādguṇyāj jñeyam ||46||
GE07bhg4c02u:2187: mami sarvān vedān adhīyānasya bahu-kāla-vyayād bahu-vikṣepa-sambhavāc ca kathaṃ tad-buddher abhudayas tatrāha yāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2189: vistīrṇe udapāne jalāśaye snānādy-arthino yāvān snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ tāvān eva sa tena tasmāt sampadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2190_0: evaṃ sarveṣu sopaniṣatsu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vedādhyāyino vijānata ātma-yāthātmya-jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2190_1: labdhu-kāmasya yāvān taj-jñāna-siddhi-lakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ syāt tāvān eva tena tebhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2191: tathā ca sva-śākhayaiva sopaniṣadācireṇaiva tat siddhau tad buddhir abhudiyād eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2192: iha dārṣṭāntike 'pi yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayam anuṣañjanīyam ||46||
GE07bhg4c02u:2195: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana |
GE07bhg4c02u:2196: mā karma-phala-hetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2198: tarhi sarvāṇi karma-phalāni parameśvarārādhanād eva bhaviṣyantīty abhisandhāya pravarteta |
GE07bhg4c02u:2199: kiṃ karmaṇā ity āśaṅkya tad vārayann āha karmaṇy eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2202: nanu karmaṇi kṛti tat-phalaṃ syād eva bhojane kṛte tṛptivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2205: karma-phalaṃ pravṛtti-hetur yasya sa tathābhūto mā bhūḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2206: kāmyamānasyaiva svargāder niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvād akāmitaṃ phalaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2207: ataeva phalaṃ bandhakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe 'pi tava saṅgo niṣṭhā māstu ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2209_0: nanu niṣkāma-karmabhir ātma-jñānaṃ sampādya parānanda-prāptiḥ kriyate ced ātma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c02u:2209_1: eva tarhi sampādyaṃ kiṃ bahvāyāsaiḥ karmabhir bahiraṅga-sādhana-bhūtair ity āśaṅkyāha karmaṇy eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2210: te tavāśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya tāttvika-jñānotpatty-ayogyasya karmaṇy evāntaḥkaraṇa-śodhake 'dhikāro mayedaṃ kartavyam iti bodho 'stu na jñāna-niṣṭhā-rūpaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicārādau |
GE07bhg4c02u:2211: karma ca kurvatas tava tat-phaleṣu svargādiṣu kadācana kasyāṃcid apy avasthāyāṃ karmānuṣṭhānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ tat-kāle vādhikāro mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti bodho māstu |
GE07bhg4c02u:2212: nanu mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti buddhy-abhāve 'pi karma sva-sāmārthyād eva phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti cen nety āha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2213: phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya heteur utpādako bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2214: tvaṃ tu niṣkāmaḥ san karma-phala-hetur mā bhūḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2215: na hi niṣkāmena bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ karma phalāya kalpata ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2216: phalābhāve kiṃ karmaṇety ata āha - mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2217: yadi phalaṃ neṣyate kiṃ karmaṇā duḥkha-rūpeṇety akaraṇe tava prītir mā bhūt ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2219_0: evam ekam evārjunaṃ sva-priya-sakhaṃ lakṣīkṛtya jñāna-bhakti-karma-yogān ācikhyāsur
GE07bhg4c02u:2219_1: bhagavān jñāna-bhakti-yogau procya tayor arjunasyānadhikāraḥ vimṛśya niṣkāma-karma-yogam āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2220: mā phaleṣv iti - phalākāṅkṣiṇo 'py atyanta-śuddha-cittā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2221: tvaṃ tu prāyaḥ śuddha-citta iti mayā jñātvaivocyasa iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2222: nanu karmaṇi kṛte phalam avaśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2223: tatrāha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya hetur utpādako bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2224: tvaṃ tu tādṛśo mā bhūr ity āśīr mayā dīyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2225: akarmaṇi sva-dharmākaraṇe vikarmaṇi pāpe vā saṅgas tava māstu,
GE07bhg4c02u:2226: kintu dveṣa evāstv iti punar apy āśīr dīyata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2227: atrāgrimādhyāye vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me ity arjunokti-darśanād atrādhyāye pūrvottara-vākyānām avatārikābhir nātīva saṅgatir vidhitsiteti jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2229: tathā tvam api mad-ājñāyāṃ tiṣṭheti kṛṣṇārjunayor mano 'nulāpo 'yam atra draṣṭavyaḥ ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2231: nanu karmabhir jñāna-siddhir iṣyate cet tarhi tasya śamādīny evāntaraṅgatvād anuṣṭheyāni santu kiṃ bahu prayāsais tair iti cet tatrāha - karmaṇy eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2233_0: te tava sva-dharme 'pi yuddhe 'dharma-buddher aśuddha-cittasya tāvat karmasv eva
GE07bhg4c02u:2233_1: yuddhādiṣv adhikāro 'stu mayaitāni bhoktavyānīti tat phaleṣu bandhakeṣu tavādhikāro
GE07bhg4c02u:2234: nanu phalecchā-virahe 'pi tāni sva-phaair yojayeyur iti cet tatrāha mā karmeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2235: karma-phalānāṃ hetur utpādakas tvaṃ mābhūḥ kāmanayā kṛtāni tāni sva-phalair yojayanti kāmitānām eva phalānāṃ niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvāmnātāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2236: ataeva bandhakāni phalāni āpatiṣyantīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe tava saṅgaḥ prītir māstu kintu vidveṣa evāstv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2237: niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi yaṣṭidhānyavad antar eva jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ niṣpādayiṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2238: śamādīni tu tat-pṛṣṭha-lagnāny eva syur iti bhāvaḥ ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2241: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya |
GE07bhg4c02u:2242: siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate ||48||
GE07bhg4c02u:2246: tathā saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2247: tat-phalasya jñānasyāpi siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2248: yata evaṃbhūtaṃ samatvam eva yoga ucyate sadbhiḥ citta-samādhāna-rūpatvāt ||48||
GE07bhg4c02u:2249: madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvoktam eva vivṛṇoti yoga-stha iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2250: he dhanañjaya tvaṃ yogasthaḥ san saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā karmāṇi kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2251: atra bahu-vacanāt karmaṇy evādhikāras ta ity atra jātāv eka-vacanam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2252: saṅga-tyāgopāyam āha siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā phala-siddhau harṣaṃ phalāsiddhau ca viṣādaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhana-buddhyā karmāṇi kurv iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2254: atra tu yoga-sthaḥ karmāṇi kurv ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2255: ataḥ katham etad boddhyṃ śakyam ity ata āha samatvaṃ yoga ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2256: yad etat siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatvam idam eva yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenocyate na tu karmeti na ko 'pi virodha ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2257: atra pūrvārdhasyottarārdhena vyākhyānaṃ kriyata ity apaunaruktyam iti bhāṣyakārīyaḥ panthāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2258: sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra jayājaya-sāmyena yuddha-mātra-kartavyatā prakṛtatvād uktā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2260: viśvanāthaḥ : niṣkāma-karmaṇaḥ prakāraṃ śikṣayati yoga-stha iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2261: tena jayājayayos tulya-buddhiḥ san saṅgrāmam eva sva-dharmaṃ kurv iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2265: tvaṃ saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā yogasthaḥ san karmāṇi kuru yuddhādīni |
GE07bhg4c02u:2271: tad-anuṣaṅga-phalānāṃ jayādīnāṃ siddhāv asiddhau ca samo bhūtvā rāga-dveṣa-rahitaḥ san kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2272: idam eva samatvaṃ mayā yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenoktaṃ citta-samādhi-rūpatvāt ||48||
GE07bhg4c02u:2275: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhi-yogād dhanaṃjaya |
GE07bhg4c02u:2277: śrīdharaḥ : kāmyaṃ tu karmātinikṛṣṭam ity āha dūreṇeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2278: buddhyā vyavasāyātmikayā kṛtaḥ karma-yogo buddhi-yogo buddhi-sādhana-bhūto vā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2279: tasmāt sakāśād anyat sādhana-bhūtaṃ kāmyaṃ karma dūreṇa avaraṃ atyantam apakṛṣṭaṃ hi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2280: yasmād evaṃ tasmād buddhau jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ karma-yogam anviccha anutiṣṭha |
GE07bhg4c02u:2281: yad vā buddhau śaraṇaṃ trātāram īśvaram āśrayety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2282: phalahetur astu sakāmā narāḥ kṛpaṇā dīnāḥ yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ ||49||
GE07bhg4c02u:2284: nanu kiṃ karmānuṣṭhānam eva puruṣārtho yena niṣphalam eva sadā kartavyam ity ucyate prayojanam anuddiśya na mando 'pi pravartate iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2285: tad varaṃ phala-kāmanayaiva karmānuṣṭhānam iti cen nety āha dūreṇeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2286: buddhi-yogād ātma-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān niṣkāma-karma-yogād dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram adhamaṃ karma phalābhisandhinā kriyamāṇaṃ janma-maraṇa-hetu-bhūtam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2287: athavā paramātma-buddhi-yogād dūreṇāvaraṃ sarvam api karma yasmād,
GE07bhg4c02u:2289: tasmād buddhau paramātma-buddhau sarvānartha-nivartikāyāṃ śaraṇaṃ pratibandhaka-pāpa-kṣayeṇa rakṣakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam anviccha kartum iccha |
GE07bhg4c02u:2290: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avaraṃ karma kurvanti te kṛpaṇāḥ sarvadā janma-maraṇādi-ghaṭī-yantra-bhramaṇena para-vaśā atyanta-dīnā
GE07bhg4c02u:2292: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2293: tathā ca tvam api kṛpaṇo mā bhūḥ kintu sarvānartha-nivartakātma-jñānotpādakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam evānutiṣṭhety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2294_0: yathā hi kṛpaṇā janā atiduḥkhena dhanam arjayanto yat kiṃcid dṛṣṭa-sukha-mātra-lobhena
GE07bhg4c02u:2294_1: dānādi-janitaṃ mahat sukham anubhavituṃ na śaknuvantīty ātmānam eva vañcayanti tathā
GE07bhg4c02u:2294_2: mahatā duḥkhena karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ kṣudra-phala-mātra-lobhena paramānandā-nubhavena
GE07bhg4c02u:2294_3: vañcitā ity aho daurbhāgyaṃ mauḍhyaṃ ca teṣām iti kṛpaṇa-padena dhvanitam ||49 ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2299: baladevaḥ : atha kāmya-karmaṇo nikṛṣṭatvam āha dūreṇeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2302: ātma-yāthātmya-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān niṣkāma-karma-yogāt dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram atyapakṛṣṭaṃ janma-maraṇādy-anartha-nimittaṃ kāmyaṃ karmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2303: hi yasmād evam atas tvaṃ buddhau tad-yāthātmya-jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam anviccha kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2304: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avara-karma-kāriṇas te kṛpaṇās tat-phala-janma-karmādi-pravāha-paravaśā dīnā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2305_0: tathā ca tvaṃ kṛpaṇo mābhūr iti iha kṛpaṇāḥ khalu kaṣṭopārjita-vittādṛṣṭa-sukha-lava-lubdhā
GE07bhg4c02u:2305_1: vittāni dātum asamarthā mahatā dāna-sukhena vañcitās tathā kaṣṭānuṣṭhita-karmāṇas
GE07bhg4c02u:2310: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam ||50||
GE07bhg4c02u:2311: śrīdharaḥ : buddhi-yoga-yuktas tu śreṣṭha ity āha buddhi-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2313: te ubhe ihaiva janmani parameśvara-prasādena tyajati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2314: tasmād yogāya tad-arthāya karma-yogāya yujyasva ghaṭasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2316: sva-dharmākhyeṣu karmasu vartamānasya yā siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatva-buddhir īśvarārpita-cetastayā tat kauśalaṃ kuśala-bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2317: tad dhi kauśalaṃ yad bandha-svabhāvāny api karmāṇi samatva-buddhyā svabhāvān nivartante |
GE07bhg4c02u:2319: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ buddhi-yogābhāve doṣam uktvā tad-bhāve guṇam āha buddhīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2320: iha karmasu buddhi-yuktaḥ samatva-buddhyā yukto jahāti parityajati ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte puṇya-pāpe sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇa |
GE07bhg4c02u:2321: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt samatva-buddhi-yogāya tvaṃ yujyasva ghaṭasvodyukto bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2322_0: yasmād īdṛśaḥ samatva-buddhi-yoga īśvarārpita-cetasaḥ karmasu pravartamānasya kauśalaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2322_1: kuśala-bhāvo yad-bandha-hetūnām api karmaṇāṃ tad-abhāvo mokṣa-paryavasāyitvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c02u:2323: samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ karmātmāpi san duṣṭa-karma-kṣayaṃ karotīti mahā-kuśalaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2324: tvaṃ tu na kuśalo yataś cetano 'pi san sajātīya-duṣṭa-kṣayaṃ na karoṣīti vyatireko 'tra dhvanitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2325: athavā iha samatva-buddhi-yukte karmaṇi kṛte sati sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa buddhi-yuktaḥ paramātma-sākṣātkāravān sañjahāty ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte |
GE07bhg4c02u:2327: yasmāt karmasu madhye samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ kauśalaṃ kuśalo duṣṭa-karma-nivāraṇa-catura ity arthaḥ ||50||
GE07bhg4c02u:2329: yataḥ karmasu sakāma-niṣkāmeṣu madhye yoga evodāsīnatvena karma-karaṇam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2331: baladevaḥ : uktasya buddhi-yogasya prabhāvam āha buddhīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2332: iha karmasu yo buddhi-yuktaḥ pradhāna-phala-tyāga-viṣayānuṣaṅga-phala-siddhy-asiddhi-samatva-viṣayayā ca buddhyā yuktas tāni karoti,
GE07bhg4c02u:2333: sa ubhe anādi-kāla-sañcite jñāna-pratibandhake sukṛta-duṣkṛte jahāti vināśayatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2336: kauśalam cāturyaṃ bandhakānām eva buddhi-samparkād viśodhita-viṣa-pārada-nyāyena mocakatvena pariṇāmāt ||50||
GE07bhg4c02u:2339: karmajaṃ buddhi-yuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2341: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇāṃ mokṣa-sādhanatva-prakāram āha karma-jam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2342_0: karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ karma kurvāṇo manīṣiṇo jñānino
GE07bhg4c02u:2342_1: bhūtvā janma-rūpeṇa bandhena vinirmuktāḥ santo 'nāmayaṃ sarvopadrava-rahitaṃ viṣṇoḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2344: nanu duṣkṛta-hānam apekṣitaṃ na tu sukṛta-hānaṃ puruṣārtha-bhraṃśāpatter ity āśaṅkya tuccha-phala-tyāgena parama-puruṣārtha-prāptiṃ phalam āha karma-jam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2345_0: samatva-buddhi-yuktā hi yasmāt karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2345_1: karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa manīṣiṇas tat tvam asi ity ādi-vākya-janyātma-manīṣāvanto bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2346_0: tādṛśāś ca santo janmātmakena bandhena vinirmuktā viśeṣeṇātyantikatva-lakṣaṇena niravaśeṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2346_1: muktāḥ padaṃ padanīyam ātma-tattvam ānanda-rūpaṃ brahmānāmayam avidyā-tat-kāryātmaka-roga-rahitābhayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2346_2: mokṣākhyaṃ puruṣārthaṃ gacchanty abhedena prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2347_0: yasmād evaṃ phala-kāmanāṃ tyaktvā samatva-buddhyā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhantas taiḥ kṛtāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhayas
GE07bhg4c02u:2347_2: mokṣākhyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ gacchanti tasmāt tvam api yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2347_3: brūhi tan me [Gītā 2.7] ity ukteḥ śreyo jijñāsur evaṃvidhaṃ karma-yogam anutiṣṭheti
GE07bhg4c02u:2350_0: buddhi-yuktās tādṛśa-buddhimantaḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhanto manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2351: tasmāt tvam api śreyo jijñāsur evaṃ vidhāni karmāṇi kurv iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2356: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2357: śrīdharaḥ : kadāhaṃ tat padaṃ prāpsyāmi ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:2362_0: evaṃ parameśvarārādhane kriyamāṇe yadā tat-prasādena tava buddhir dehābhimāna-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2362_1: moha-mayaṃ gahanaṃ durgaṃ viśeṣeṇātitariṣyati tadā śrotavyasya śrutasya cārthasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2363: tayor anupādeyatvena jijñāsām na kariṣyasīty arthaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2364: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ karmāṇy anutiṣṭhataḥ kadā me sattva-śuddhiḥ syād ity ata āha yadeti |

GE07bhg4c02u:2366_0: kintu yadā yasmin kāle te tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ vyatitariṣyati avivekātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2366_1: kāluṣam aham idaṃ mamedaṃ ity ādy-ajñāna-vilasitam atigahanam vyatikramiṣyati rajas-tamo-malam
GE07bhg4c02u:2367: tadā tasmin kāle śrotavyasya śrutasya ca karma-phalasya nirvedaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ gantāsi prāptāsi |

GE07bhg4c02u:2370: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ parameśvarārpita-niṣkāma-karmābhyāsāt tava yogo bhaviṣyatīty āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2371: tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ moha-rūpaṃ gahanaṃ viśeṣato 'tiśayena tariṣyati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2372: tadā śrotavyasya śrotavyeṣv artheṣu śrutasya śruteṣv apy artheṣu nirvedaṃ prāpsyasi asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanayor naṣṭatvāt kiṃ me śāstropadeśa-vākya-śravaṇena |
GE07bhg4c02u:2373: sāmprataṃ me sādhaneṣv eva pratikṣaṇam abhyāsaḥ sarvathocita iti maṃsyasa iti bhāvaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2375: nanu niṣkāmāṇi karmāṇi kurvato me kadātma-viṣayā manīṣābhyudiyād iti cet tatrāha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2376: yadā te buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ tuccha-phalābhilāṣa-hetum ajñāna-gahanaṃ vyatitariṣyati parityakṣyatīty arthaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2377: tadā pūrvaṃ śrutasyānantaraṃ śrotavyasya ca tasya tuccha-phalasya sambandhinaṃ nirvedaṃ gantāsi gamiṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2378: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedaṃ āyāt iti śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2379: nirvedena phalena tad-viṣayāṃ tāṃ pariceṣyati iti nāsty atra kāla-niyama ity arthaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2383: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasyi ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2386: itaḥ pūrvaṃ vikṣiptā satī tava buddhir yadā samādhau sthāsyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2387: samādhīyate cittam asminn iti samādhiḥ parameśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2390: abhyāsa-pāṭavena tatraiva sthirā ca satī yogaṃ yoga-phalaṃ tattva-jñānam avāpsyasi ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2392: antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhyaivaṃ jāta-nirvedasya kadā jñāna-prāptir ity apekṣāyām āha śrutīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2393: te tava buddhiḥ śrutibhir nānā-vidha-phala-śravaṇair avicārita-tātparyair vipratipannā 'neka-vidha-saṃśaya-viparyāsavattvena vikṣiptā prāk |
GE07bhg4c02u:2394_0: yadā yasmin kāle śuddhija-viveka-janitena doṣa-darśanena taṃ vikṣepaṃ parityajya
GE07bhg4c02u:2394_2: satī sthāsyati laya-vikṣepa-lakṣaṇau doṣau parityajya samāhitā bhaviṣyatīti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2395: athavā niścalāsambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanā-rahitācalā dīrgha-kālādara-nairantarya-satkāra-sevanair vijātīya-pratyayādūṣitā satī nirvāta-pradīpavad ātmani sthāsyatīti yojanā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2398: tadā punaḥ sādhyāntarābhāvāt kṛta-kṛtyaḥ sthita-prajño bhaviṣyasīty abhiprāyaḥ ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2400: tataś ca śrutiṣu nānā-laukika-vaidikārtha-śravaṇeṣu vipratipannā asammatā viraketit yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2401: tatra hetuḥ niścalā teṣu teṣv artheṣu calituṃ vimukhībhūtety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2403: tadā yogam aparokṣānubhava-prāptyā, jīvan-mukta ity arthaḥ ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2405: nanu karma-phala-nirviṇṇatayā karmānuṣṭhānena labdha-hṛd-viśuddher abhyuditātma-jñānasya me kadātma-sākṣāt-kṛtir iti cet tatrāha śrutīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2406_0: śrutyā karmaṇāṃ jñāna-garbhatāṃ prabodhayantyā tam etam ity ādikayā vipratipannā
GE07bhg4c02u:2406_1: viśeṣeṇa saṃsiddhā te buddhir acalā asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanābhyāṃ virahitā yadā
GE07bhg4c02u:2406_2: samādhau manasi nirvāta-dīpa-śikheva niścalā sthāsyati tadā yogam ātmānubhava-lakṣaṇam avāpsyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2407: ayam arthaḥ phalābhilāṣa-śūnyatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi sthita-prajñatā-rūpāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ sādhayanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2413: sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim ||54||
GE07bhg4c02u:2414: śrīdharaḥ : pūrva-ślokoktasyātma-tattva-jñasya lakṣaṇaṃ jijñāsur arjuna uvāca - sthita-prajñasyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2415: svābhāvike samādhau sthitasya, ataeva sthitā niścalā prajñā buddhir yasya tasya bhāṣā kā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2416: bhāṣyate 'nayā iti bhāṣā lakṣaṇam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2417: sa kena lakṣaṇena sthita-prajña ucyate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2418: tathā sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ kathaṃ bhāṣaṇam āsanaṃ vrajanaṃ ca kuryād ity arthaḥ ||54||
GE07bhg4c02u:2419: madhusūdanaḥ : evam labdhāvasaraḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇaṃ jñātum arjuna uvāca |
GE07bhg4c02u:2420: yāny eva hi jīvan-muktānāṃ lakṣaṇāni tāny eva mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣopāya-bhūtānīti manvānaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2421: sthitā niścalā ahaṃ-brahmāsmi iti prajñā yasya sa sthita-prajño 'vasthā-dvayavān samādhistho vyutthita-cittaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2422: ato viśinaṣṭi samādhi-sthasya sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ? karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī |
GE07bhg4c02u:2424: samādhi-sthaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kena lakṣaṇenānyair vyavahriyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2425: sa ca vyutthita-cittaḥ sthita-dhīḥ sthita-prajñaḥ svayaṃ kiṃ prabhāṣeta ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2428: tathā kim āsīteti vyutthita-citta-nigrahāya kathaṃ bahir indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ karoti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2429: tan-nigrāhābhāva-kāle kiṃ vrajeta kathaṃ viṣayān prāpnoti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2431: tad evaṃ catvāraḥ praśnāḥ samādhi-sthe sthita-prajña ekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2433: keśaveti sambodhayan sarvāntaryāmitayā tvam evaitādṛśaṃ rahasyaṃ vaktuṃ samartho 'sīti sūcayati ||54||
GE07bhg4c02u:2435: samādhāv acalā buddhir iti śrutvā tattvato yogino lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchati sthita-prajñasyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2437: kā bhāṣā ? bhāṣyate 'nayeti bhāṣā lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2441: kiṃ prabhāṣeteti sukha-duḥkhayor mānāpamānayoḥ stuti-nindayoḥ sneha-dveṣayor vā samupasthitayoḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2442: spaṣṭaṃ svagataṃ vā kiṃ vaded ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2447: baladevaḥ : evam ukto 'rjunaḥ pūrva-padyoktasya sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ jñātuṃ pṛcchati sthiteti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2448: sthita-prajñe 'tra catvāraḥ praśnāḥ - samādhisthe ekaḥ, vyutthite tu trayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2449: tathā hi - sthitā sthirā prajña dhīr yasya tasya samādhi-sthasya kā bhāṣā kiṃ lakṣaṇam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2452: tathā vyutthitaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kathaṃ bhāṣaṇādīni kuryāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2455: svayoḥ stuti-nindayoḥ sneha-dveṣayoś ca prāptayor mukhataḥ svagataṃ vā kiṃ brūyāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2456: kim āsīta bāhya-viṣayeṣu katham indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ kuryāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2458: kiṃ tan-nigrāhābhāve ca kathaṃ viṣayānavāpnuyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2463: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha mano-gatān |
GE07bhg4c02u:2465: śrīdharaḥ : atra ca yāni sādhakasya jñāna-sādhanāni tāny eva svābhāvikāni siddhasya lakṣaṇāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:2466: ataḥ siddhasya lakṣaṇāni kathayann evāntaraṅgāni jñāna-sādhanāny āha yāvad adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2468: manasi sthitān kāmān yadā prakarṣeṇa jahāti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2470: ātmany eva svasminn eva paramānanda-rūpe ātmanā svayam eva tuṣṭa ity ātmārāmaḥ san yadā kṣudra-viṣayābhilāṣāṃs tyajati tadā tena lakṣaṇena muniḥ sthita-prajña ucyate ||55||
GE07bhg4c02u:2472: eteṣāṃ catūrṇāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ bhagavān uvāca prajahātīti yāvad-adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2473_1: tantrāntare pañcadhā prapañcitān sarvān niravaśeṣān prakarṣeṇa kāraṇa-bādhena yadā
GE07bhg4c02u:2473_2: jahāti parityajati sarva-vṛtti-śūnya eva yadā bhavati sthita-prajñas tadocyate samādhistha iti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2474: kāmānām anātma-dharmatvena parityāga-yogyatām āha manogatān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2475: yadi hy ātma-dharmāḥ syus tadā na tyaktuṃ śakyeran vahny-auṣṇyavat svābhāvikatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2477: atas tat-parityāgena parityaktuaṃ śakyā evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2478_0: nanu sthita-prajñasya mukha-prasāda-liṅga-gamyaḥ santoṣa-viśeṣaḥ pratīyate sa kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2478_1: sarva-kāma-parityāge syād ity āha - ātmany eva paramānanda-rūpe na tv anātmani tuccha
GE07bhg4c02u:2478_2: ātmnaā svaprakāśa-cid-rūpeṇa bhāsamānena na tu vṛttyā tuṣṭaḥ paritṛptaḥ parama-puruṣārtha-lābhāt | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:2479: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2480: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute || [KaṭhU 2.3.14] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2481: tathā ca samādhi-sthaḥ sthita-prajña evaṃvidhair lakṣaṇa-vācibhiḥ śabdair bhāṣyata iti prathama-praśnasyottaram ||55||
GE07bhg4c02u:2482: viśvanāthaḥ : catūrṇāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaram āha prajahātīti yāvad adhyāya-samāptiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2483: sarvān iti kasminn apy arthe yasya kiṃcin mātro 'pi nābhilāṣa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2484: mano-gatān iti kāmānām ātma-dharmatvena parityāge yogyatā darśitā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2485: yadi te hy ātma-dharmāḥ syus tadā tāṃs tyaktum aśakyeran vahner auṣṇyavad iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2486: tatra hetuḥ - ātmani pratyāhṛte manasi prāpto ya ātmānanda-rūpas tena tuṣṭaḥ | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:2487: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2488: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute || [KaṭhU 2.3.14] iti ||55||
GE07bhg4c02u:2489: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa catūrṇāṃ uttaram āha yāvad adhyāya-pūrtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2491: he pārtha ! yadā mano-gatān manasi sthitān kāmān sarvān prajahāti saṃtyajati tadā sthita-prajña ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2493: ātma-dharmatve duḥśakyaḥ sa syād vahny-uṣṇatādīnām iveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2494: nanu śuṣka-kāṣṭhavat kathaṃ tiṣṭhatīti cet tatrāha ātmany eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2495: ātmani pratyāhṛte manasi bhāsamānena sva-prakāśānanda-rūpeṇātmanā svarūpeṇa tuṣṭaḥ paritṛptaḥ kṣudra-viṣayābhilāṣān saṃtyajyātmānandārāmaḥ samādhisthaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2497: dhṛtāv api manīṣāyāṃ śarīra-brahmaṇor api || iti medinī-kāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2504: duḥkheṣu prāpteṣv api anudvignam akṣubhitaṃ mano yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2506: tatra hetuḥ - vītā apagatā rāga-bhaya-krodhā yasmāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2510: idānīṃ vyutthitasya sthita-prajñasya bhāṣaṇopaveśana-gamanāni mūḍha-jana-vilakṣaṇāni vyākhyeyāni |
