GE07bhg4c02u:2512_2: prārabdha-pāpa-karma-prāpiteṣu nodvignaṃ duḥkha-parihārākṣamatayā vyākulaṃ na bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:2513_0: avivekino hi duḥkha-prāptau satyām aho pāpo 'haṃ dhiṅ māṃ durātmānam etādṛśa-duḥkha-bhāginaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2513_1: ko me duḥkham īdṛśaṃ nirākuryād ity anutāpātmako bhrānti-rūpas tāmasaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣa udvegākhyo jāyate
GE07bhg4c02u:2514: | yady ayaṃ pāpānuṣṭhāna-samaye syāt tadā tat-pravṛtti-pratibandhakatvena saphalaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2515_0: bhoga-kāle tu bhavan kāraṇe sati kāryasyocchettum aśakyatvān niṣprayojano duḥkha-kāraṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:2515_1: saty api kim iti mama duḥkhaṃ jāyate iti avivekaja-bhrama-rūpatvān na vivekinaḥ sthita-prajñasya sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2516: duḥkha-mātraṃ hi prārabdha-karmaṇā prāpyate na tu tad-uttara-kālīno bhramo 'pi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2517: nanu duḥkhāntara-kāraṇatvāt so 'pi prārabdha-karmāntareṇa prāpyatām iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c02u:2519: yathā-kathaṃcid deha-yātrā-mātra-nirvāhaka-prārabdha-karma-phalasya bhramābhāve 'pi bādhitānuvṛttyopapatter iti vistareṇāgre vakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2520: tathā sukheṣu sattva-pariṇāma-rūpa-prītyātmaka-citta-vṛtti-viśeṣeṣu trividheṣu prārabdha-puṇya-karma-prāpiteṣu vigata-spṛha āgāmi-taj-jātīya-sukha-spṛhā-rahitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2521: spṛhā hi nāma sukhānubhava-kāle taj-jātīya-sukhasya kāraṇaṃ dharmam ananuṣṭhāya vṛthaiva tad-ākāṅkṣā-rūpā tāmasī citta-vṛttir bhrāntir eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2523: na hi kāraṇābhāve kāryaṃ bhavitum arhati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2524_0: ato yathā sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ mā bhūd iti vṛthākāṅkṣā-rūpa udvego vivekino na sambhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:2524_1: tathaivāsati kāraṇe kāryaṃ bhūyād iti vṛthākāṅkṣā-rūpā tṛṣṇātmikā spṛhāpi nopapadyate
GE07bhg4c02u:2527: aho dhanyo 'haṃ yasya mamedṛśaṃ sukham upasthitaṃ ko vā mayā tulas tribhuvane kena vopāyena mamedṛśaṃ sukhaṃ na vicchidyetety evam ātmikotphullatā-rūpā tāmasī citta-vṛttiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2528: ataevoktaṃ bhāṣye - nāgnir ivendhanādy-ādhāne yaḥ sukhāny anuvivardhate sa vigata-spṛhaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2529: vakṣyati ca -- na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam [Gītā 5.20] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2533: rāga-viṣayasya nāśake samupasthite tan-nivāraṇāsāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasya dainyātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣo bhayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2534: evaṃ rāga-viṣaya-vināśake samupasthite tan-nivāraṇa-sāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasyābhijvalanātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ krodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2535: te sarve viparyaya-rūpatvād vigatā yasmāt sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2536: etādṛśo munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī sthita-prajña ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2537: evaṃ-lakṣaṇaḥ sthita-dhīḥ svānubhava-prakaṭanena śiṣya-śikṣārtham anudvega-nispṛhatvādi-vācaḥ prabhāṣeta ity anvaya uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2538: evaṃ cānyo 'pi mumukṣur duḥkhe nodvijet sukhe na prahṛṣyet,
GE07bhg4c02u:2541_0: kiṃ prabhāṣetety asya uttaram āha duḥkheṣu kṣut-pipāsa-jvara-śiro-rogādiṣv ādhyātmikeṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:2541_1: sarpa-vyāghrādy-utthiteṣv anudvigna-manāḥ prārabdhaṃ duḥkham idaṃ mayāvaśyaṃ bhoktavyam
GE07bhg4c02u:2541_2: iti svagataṃ kenacit pṛṣṭaḥ san spaṣṭaṃ ca bruvan |
GE07bhg4c02u:2545: sudhiyā paricito bhraṣṭa evocyata iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2546: evaṃ sukheṣv apy upasthiteṣu vigata-spṛha iti prārabdham idam avaśya-bhogyam iti svagataṃ spaṣṭaṃ ca bruvāṇasya tasya sukha-spṛhā-rāhitya-liṅgaṃ sudhiyā gamyam eveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2547: tat-tal-liṅgam eva spaṣṭīkṛtya darśayati vīto vigato rāgo 'nurāgaḥ sukheṣu bandhu-janeṣu yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2549: pārśvaṃ prāpitasya svaccheda-cikīrṣor vṛṣala-rājān na bhayam | nāpi tatra krodho 'bhūd iti ||56||
GE07bhg4c02u:2550: baladevaḥ : atha vyutthitaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kiṃ bhāṣetety asyottaram āha duḥkheṣv iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:2551_0: trividheṣv adhyātmikādiṣu duḥkheṣu samutthiteṣu satsv anudvigna-manāḥ prārabdha-phalāny
GE07bhg4c02u:2551_1: amūni mayāvaśyaṃ bhoktavyānīti kenacit pṛṣṭaḥ svagataṃ vā bruvan tebhyo nodvijata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2552_0: sukheṣu cottamāhāra-satkārādinā samupasthiteṣu vigata-spṛhas tṛṣṇā-śūnyaḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭāny
GE07bhg4c02u:2552_1: amūni mayāvaśya-bhoktavyānīti kenacit pṛṣṭaṃ svagataṃ vā bruvan tair upasthitaḥ prahṛṣṭa-mukho
GE07bhg4c02u:2554: vīta-bhayaḥ viṣayāpahartṛṣu prāpteṣu durlabhasya mamaitāni dharmyair bhavadbhir hriyanta iti dainya-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2555: vīta-krodhaḥ teṣv eva prabalasya mamaitāni tucchair bhavadbhiḥ katham apahartavyānīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2557: evaṃvidho munir ātma-manana-śīlaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2558: itthaṃ svānubhavaṃ parān prati svagataṃ vā vadan naudvego nispṛhatādi-vacaḥ prabhāṣate ity uttaram ||56||
GE07bhg4c02u:2561: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham |
GE07bhg4c02u:2562: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||57||
GE07bhg4c02u:2563: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ bhāṣeta ity asyottaram āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2564: yaḥ sarvatra putra-mitrādiṣv apy anabhisnehaḥ sneha-varjitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2565: ataeva bādhitānuvṛttyā tat tat śubham anukūlaṃ prāpya nābhinandati aśubhaṃ pratikūlaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi na nindati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2569: sarva-deheṣu jīvanādiṣv api yo munir anabhisnehaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2570: yasmin saty anyadīye hāni-vṛddhī svasminn āropyete sa tādṛśo 'nya-viṣayaḥ premāpara-paryāyas tāmaso vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ snehaḥ sarva-prakāreṇa tad-rahito 'nabhisnehaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2571: bhagavati paramātmani tu sarvathābhisnehavān bhaved eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2573: tat-tat-prārabdha-karma-pariprāpitaṃ śubhaṃ sukha-hetuṃ viṣayaṃ prāpya nābhinandati harṣa-viśeṣa-puraḥsaraṃ na praśaṃsati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2574: aśubhaṃ duḥkha-hetuṃ viṣayaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi antar-asūyā-pūrvakaṃ na nindati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2575: ajñasya hi sukha-hetur yaḥ sva-kalatrādiḥ sa śubho viṣayas tad-guṇa-kathanādi-pravartikā dhī-vṛttir bhrānti-rūpābhinandaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2576: sa ca tāmasaḥ, tad-guṇa-kathanādeḥ para-prarocanārthatvābhāvena vyarthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2577: evam asūyotpādanena duḥkha-hetuḥ parakīya-vidyā-prakarṣādir enaṃ pratyaśubho viṣayas tan-nindādi-pravartikā bhrānti-rūpā dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2580: tāv abhinanda-dveṣau bhrānti-rūpau tāmasau katham abhrānte śuddha-sattve sthita-prajñe sambhavatām |
GE07bhg4c02u:2582: harṣa-viṣāda-rahitasya muneḥ prajñā paramātma-tattva-viṣayā pratiṣṭhitā phala-paryavasāyinī sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2584: śubhaṃ prāpya na praśaṃset, aśubhaṃ prāpya na ninded ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2585: atra ca nindā-praśaṃsādi-rūpā vāco na prabhāṣeteti vyatireka uktaḥ ||57||
GE07bhg4c02u:2587: anabhisnehaḥ sopādhi-sneha-śūnyo dayālutvān nirupādhir īṣan-mātra-snehas tu tiṣṭhed eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2588: tat tat prasiddhaṃ sammāna-bhojanādibhyaḥ sva-paricaraṇaṃ śubhaṃ prāpyāśubham anādaraṇaṃ muṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya krameṇa nābhinandati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2589: na praśaṃsati tvaṃ dhārmikaḥ paramahaṃsa-sevī sukhī bhaveti na brūte |
GE07bhg4c02u:2590: na dveṣṭi tvaṃ pāpātmā narake pateti nābhiśapati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2591: tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā samādhiṃ prati sthitā susthira-prajñā ucyata ity arthaḥ ||57||
GE07bhg4c02u:2592: baladevaḥ : ya iti sarveṣu prāṇiṣu anabhisneha aupādhika-sneha-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2593: kāruṇikatvān nirupādhir īṣad-snehas tv asty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2594: tat tat prasiddhaṃ śubham uttama-bhojana-srak-candanārpaṇa-rūpaṃ prāpya nābhinandati tad-arpakaṃ prati dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ ciraṃ jīveti na vadati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2595: aśubham apamānaṃ yaṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya na dveṣṭi, pāpiṣṭhas tvaṃ miryasveti nābhiśapati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2596: tasya prajñeti sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2597: atra stuti-nindā-rūpaṃ vaco na bhāṣata iti vyatirekeṇa tal lakṣaṇam ||57||
GE07bhg4c02u:2603: yadā cāyaṃ yogī indriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sakāśād indriyāṇi saṃharate sarvata evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭha indriyāṇīnidryārthebhyaḥ sarva-viṣayebhyaḥ upasaṃharate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2606: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ kim āsīteti praśnasyottaraṃ vaktum ārabhate bhagavān ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2607: tatra prārabdha-karma-vaśād vyutthānena vikṣiptānīndriyāṇi punar upasaṃhṛtya samādhy-artham eva sthita-prajñasyopaveśanam iti darśayitum āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2608: ayaṃ vyutthitaḥ sarvaśaḥ sarvāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2614: adhunā tu punaḥ samādhy-avasthāyāṃ sakala-vṛtty-abhāva iti viśeṣaḥ ||58||
GE07bhg4c02u:2615: viśvanāthaḥ : kim āsītety asyottaram āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2617: svādhīnānām indriyāṇāṃ bāhya-viṣayeṣu calanaṃ niṣidhyāntareva niścalatayā sthāpanaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2619: kūrmo 'ṅgāni mukha-netrādīni yathā svāntar eva svecchayā sthāpayati ||58||
GE07bhg4c02u:2620: baladevaḥ : atha kim āsītety asyottaram āha yadety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir |
GE07bhg4c02u:2621: ayaṃ yogī yadā cendriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ svādhīnānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīny anāyāsena saṃharati samākarṣati tadā tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2623: mukha-kara-caraṇāni yathānāyasena kamaṭhaḥ saṃharati tadvat viṣayebhyaḥ samākṛṣṭendriyāṇām antaḥ-sthāpanaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam ||58||
GE07bhg4c02u:2627: rasa-varjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:2628: śrīdharaḥ : nanu nendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv apravṛttir sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2629: jaḍānām āturāṇām upavāsa-parāṇāṃ ca viṣayeṣv pravṛtter aviśeṣāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2632: nirāhārasya indriyāir viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvato dehino dehābhimānino 'jñasya rāgo 'bhilāṣas tad-varjaṃ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2634: yad vā nirāhārasya upavāsa-parasya viṣayāḥ prāyaśo nivartante kṣudhā-santaptasya śabda-sparśādy-apekṣābhāvāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:2635: kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasāpekṣā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2638: nanu mūḍhasyāpi rogādi-vaśād viṣayebhya indriyāṇām upasaṃharaṇaṃ bhavati tat kathaṃ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety uktam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2640_0: nirāhārasya indriyāir indriyāir viṣayān anāharato dehino dehābhimānavato mūḍhasyāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:2640_1: rogiṇaḥ kāṣṭha-tapasvino vā viṣayāḥ śabdādayo vinivartante kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasa-tṛṣṇā taṃ varjayitvā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2641: ajñasya viṣayā nivartante tad-viṣayo rāgas tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2642: asya tu sthita-prajñasya paraṃ puruṣārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad evāham asmīti sākṣātkṛtya sthitasya raso 'pi kṣudra-sukha-rāgo 'pi nivartate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2644: tathā ca yāvān artha ity ādau vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2645: evaṃ ca sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttiḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇam iti na mūḍhe vyabhicāra ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2647: tasmāt sa-rāga-viṣayocchedikāyāḥ samyag-darśanātmikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ sthairyaṃ mahatā yatnena sampādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:2649: mūḍhasyāpi upavāsato rogādi-vaśād vendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv acalanaṃ sambhavet tatrāha viṣayā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2651: abhilāṣas tu viṣayeṣu na nivartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2652: asya sthita-prajñasya tu paraṃ paramātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣayeṣv abhilāṣo nivartata iti na lakṣaṇa-vyabhicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2653: ātma-sākṣātkāra-samarthasya tu sādhakatvam eva, na tu siddhatvam iti bhāvaḥ ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:2655: nanu mūḍhasyāmaya-grastasya viṣayeṣv indriyāpravṛtti-dṛṣṭā tat katham etat sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāha viṣayā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2656: nirāhārasya roga-bhayād bhojanādīny akurvato mūḍhasyāpi dehino janasya viṣayās tad-anubhavā vinivartante |
GE07bhg4c02u:2657: kintu raso rāga-tṛṣṇā tad-varjaṃ viṣaya-tṛṣṇā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2658_0: asya sthita-prajñasya tu raso 'pi viṣaya-rāgo 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ paraṃ sva-prakāśānandam
GE07bhg4c02u:2658_1: ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvānubhūya nivartate vinaśyatīti sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttis tasya lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:2661: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2663: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamaṃ vinā sthita-prajñatā na sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2664: ataḥ sādhakāvasthāyāṃ tatra mahān prayatnaḥ kartavya ity āha yatato hy apīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:2670_0: tatra prajñā-sthairye bāhyendriya-nigraho mano-nigrahaś cāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad-ubhayābhāve
GE07bhg4c02u:2670_1: prajñā-nāśa-darśanād iti vaktuṃ bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve prathamaṃ doṣam āha yatata iti | he kaunteya !
GE07bhg4c02u:2671: yatato bhūyo bhūyo viṣaya-doṣa-darśanātmakaṃ yatnaṃ kurvato 'pi,
GE07bhg4c02u:2672: cakṣiṅo ṅitva-karaṇād anudātteto 'nāvaśyakam ātmanepadam iti jñāpanāt parasmaipadam aviruddham |
GE07bhg4c02u:2673: vipaścito 'tyanta-vivekino 'pi puruṣasya manaḥ kṣaṇa-mātraṃ nirvikāraṃ kṛtam apīndriyāṇi haranti vikāraṃ prāpayanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2674: nanu virodhinī viveke sati kuto vikāra-prāptis tatrāha pramāthīni pramathana-śīlāni atibalīyastvād vivekopamardana-kṣamāṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2675_0: ataḥ prasabhaṃ prasahya balātkāreṇa paśyaty eva vipaściti svāmini viveke ca rakṣake
GE07bhg4c02u:2675_1: sati sarva-pramāthītvād evendriyāṇi vivekaja-prajñāyāṃ praviṣṭaṃ manas tataḥ pracyāvya
GE07bhg4c02u:2677_0: prasiddho hy ayam artho loke yathā pramāthino dasyavaḥ prasabham eva dhaninaṃ dhana-rakṣakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2677_1: cābhibhūya tayoḥ paśyator eva dhanaṃ haranti tathendriyāṇy api viṣaya-sannidhāne
GE07bhg4c02u:2678: viśvanāthaḥ : sādhakāvasthāyāṃ tu yatna eva mahān,
GE07bhg4c02u:2679: na tv indriyāṇi parāvartayituṃ sarvathā śaktir ity āha yatata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2681: baladevaḥ : athāsyā jñāna-niṣṭhayā daurlabhyam āha yatato hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2682: vipaścito viṣayātma-svarūpa-vivekajñasya tata indriya-jaye prayatamānasyāpi puruṣasya indriyāṇi śrotrādīni kartṝṇi manaḥ parasabhaṃ balād iva haranti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2684: nanu virodhini viveka-jñāne sthite kathaṃ haranti tatrāha pramāthīnīti ati-baliṣṭhatvāt taj-jñānopamardana-kṣamāṇīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2685: tasmāt caurebhyo mahā-nidher ivendriyebhyo jñāna-niṣṭhāyāḥ saṃrakṣaṇaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam iti ||60||
GE07bhg4c02u:2688: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2689: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:2691: yukto yogī tāni indriyāṇi saṃyamya mat-paraḥ sann āsīta |
GE07bhg4c02u:2693: etena ca katham āsīteti praśnasya vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:2694: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ tarhi tatra kaḥ pratīkāra ity ata āha tānīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2695: tānīndriyāṇi sarvāṇi jñāna-karma-sādhana-bhūtāni saṃyamya vaśīkṛtya yuktaḥ samāhito nigṛhīta-manāḥ sann āsīta nirvāpāras tiṣṭhet |
GE07bhg4c02u:2696: pramāthināṃ kathaṃ sva-vaśīkaraṇam iti cet tatrāha mat-para iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2697: ahaṃ sarvātmā vāsudeva eva para utkṛṣṭa upādeyo yasya sa mat-para ekānta-mad-bhakta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2698: tathā coktam na vāsudeva-bhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2699_0: yathā hi loke balavantaṃ rājānam āśritya dasyavo nigṛhyante rājāśrito 'yam iti jñātvā
GE07bhg4c02u:2699_1: ca svayam eva tad-vaśyā bhavanti tathaiva bhagavantaṃ sarvāntaryāminam āśritya tat-prabhāveṇaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:2699_2: duṣṭānīndriyāṇi nigrāhyāṇi punaś ca bhagavad-āśrito 'yam iti matvā tāni tad-vaśyāny
GE07bhg4c02u:2704: tad etad vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti kim āsīteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:2706: mad-bhaktiṃ vinā naivendriya-jaya ity agrima-granthe 'pi sarvatra draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2710: athāta ānanda-dughaṃ padāmbujaṃ haṃsāḥ śrayeran || [BhP 11.29.1-2] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2711: vaśe hīti sthita-prajñasyendriyāṇi vaśībhūtāni bhavantīti sādhakād viśeṣa uktaḥ ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:2713: nanu nirjitendriyāṇām apy ātmānubhavo na pratītas tatra ko 'bhyupāya iti cet tatrāha tānīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2714: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya mat-paro man-niṣṭhaḥ san yuktaḥ kṛtāma-samādhir āsīta tiṣṭheta |
GE07bhg4c02u:2715: mad-bhakti-prabhāvena sarvendriya-vijaya-pūrvikā svātma-dṛṣṭiḥ sulabheti bhāvaḥ | evaṃ smaranti -
GE07bhg4c02u:2717: tathā citta-sthito viṣṇur yogināṃ sarva-kilbiṣam || [ViP 6.7.74] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2718: vaśe hīti spaṣṭam | itthaṃ ca vaśīkṛtendriyatayāvasthitiḥ kim āsītety asyottaram uktam ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:2726: bāhyendriya-saṃyamābhāve doṣam uktvā manaḥ-saṃyamābhāve doṣam āha dhyāyata iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:2727: guṇa-buddhyā viṣayān dhyāyataḥ puṃsaḥ teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2728: āsaktyā ca teṣu adhikaḥ kāmo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2729: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2737_0: nigṛhīta-bāhyendriyasyāpi śabdādīnviṣayān dhyāyato manasā punaḥ punaś cintayataḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2737_1: puṃsas teṣu viṣayeṣu saṅga āsaṅgo mamātyantaṃ sukha-hetava eta ity evaṃ śobhanādhyāsa-lakṣaṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2737_2: prīti-viśeṣa upajāyate saṅgāt sukha-hetutva-jñāna-lakṣaṇāt saṃjāyate kāmo mamaite
GE07bhg4c02u:2738: tasmāt kāmāt kutaścit pratihanyamānāt tat-pratighāta-viṣayaḥ krodho 'bhijvalanātmābhijāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2740: saṃmohāt smṛti-vibhramaḥ smṛteḥ śāstrācāryopadiṣṭārthānusandhānasya vibhramo vicalanaṃ vibhraṃśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2741: tasmāc ca smṛti-bhraṃśād buddher aikātmyākāra-mano-vṛtter nāśo viparīta-bhāvanopacaya-doṣeṇa pratibandhād anutpattir utpannāyāś ca phalāyogyatvena vilayaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2742: | buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati tasyāś ca phala-bhūtāyā buddher vilopāt praṇaśyati sarva-puruṣārthāyogyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2743: yo hi puruṣārthāyogyo jātaḥ sa mṛta eveti loke vyavahriyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2745: yasmād evaṃ manaso nigrahābhāve nigṛhīta-bāhyendriyasyāpi paramānartha-prāptis taramān mahatā prayatnena mano nigṛhṇīyād ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2746: ato yuktam uktaṃ tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīteti ||62-63||
GE07bhg4c02u:2748: sthita-prajñasya mano-vaśīkāra eva bāhyendriya-vaśīkāra-kāraṇaṃ sarvathā mano-vaśīkārābhāve tu yat syāt tat śṛṇv ity āha dhyāyata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2757: vijitendriyasyāpi mayy aniveśita-manasaḥ punar anartho durvāra ity āha dhyāyata iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:2758: viṣayān śabdādīn sukha-hetutva-buddhyā dhyāyataḥ punaḥ punaś cintayato yoginas teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2760: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodhaś citta-jvālas tat-pratighātako bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2764: buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati punar viṣaya-bhoga-nimagno bhavati saṃsaratīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2765: madanāśrayaṇād durbalaṃ manas tāni sva-viṣayair yojayantīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2772: nanv indriyāṇāṃ viṣaya-pravaṇa-svabhāvānāṃ niroddhum aśakyatvād ayaṃ doṣo duṣparihara iti sthita-prajñatvaṃ kathaṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2774: rāga-dveṣa-rahitaiḥ vigata-darpair indriyaiḥ viṣayāṃś carann upabhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ śāntiṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2776: ātmano manasaḥ vaśyair indriyaiḥ vidheyo vaśavartī ātmā mano yasyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2777: anenaiva kathaṃ vrajetety asya caturtha-praśnasya svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān gacchatīty uttaram uktaṃ bhavati ||64||
GE07bhg4c02u:2779: manasi nigṛhīte tu bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve 'pi na doṣa iti vadan kiṃ vrajetety asyottaram āhāṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2780: yo 'samāhita-cetāḥ sa bāhyendriyāṇi nigṛhyāpi rāga-dveṣa-duṣṭena manasā viṣayāṃś cintayan puruṣārthād bhraṣṭo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2782_0: vaśīkṛtāntaḥ-karaṇas tu ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnaiḥ svādhīnair iti vā rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2782_1: viyuktair virahitair indriyaiḥ śrotrādibhir viṣayān śabdādīn aniṣiddhāṃś carann upalabhamānaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2782_2: prasādaṃ prasannātāṃ cittasya svacchatāṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatām adhigacchati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2787: na doṣam āvahatīti na śuddhi-vyāghāta iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2788: etena viṣayāṇāṃ smaraṇam api ced anartha-kāraṇaṃ sutarāṃ tarhi bhogas tena jīvanārthaṃ viṣayān bhuñjānaḥ katham anarthaṃ na pratipadyeteti śaṅkā nirastā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2789: svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān prāpnotīti ca kiṃ vrajeteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati ||64||
GE07bhg4c02u:2791: mānasa-viṣaya-grahaṇābhāve sati sva-vaśyair indriyair viṣaya-grahaṇe 'pi na doṣa iti vadan sthita-prajño vrajeta kim ity asyottaram āha rāgeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2792: vidheyo vacane sthta ātmā mano yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2795: prasādam adhigacchatīty etādṛśasyādhikāriṇo viṣaya-grahaṇam api na doṣa iti kiṃ vaktavyam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2797: sthita-prajñasya viṣaya-tyāga-svīkārāv eva āsana-vrajane te ubhe api tasya bhadre iti bhāvaḥ ||64||
GE07bhg4c02u:2799: manasi nirjite śrotrādi-nirjayābhāvo 'pi na doṣa iti bruvan vrajeta kim ity asottaram āha rāgeti ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2800: vijita-bahir-indriyo 'pi mad-anarpita-manāḥ paramārthād vicyuta ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2801_0: yo vidheyātmā svādhīna-manā mad-arpita-manās tata eva nidagdha-rāgādi-mano-malaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2801_1: sa tv ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnair ata eva rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ viyuktair indriyaiḥ śrotrādyair
GE07bhg4c02u:2801_2: viṣayān niṣiddhān śabdādīṃś caran bhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ viṣayāsakty-ādi-malānāgamād
GE07bhg4c02u:2806: śrīdharaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity atrāha prasāda iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2808: tataś ca prasanna-cetaso buddhiḥ pratiṣṭhitā bhavatīty arthaḥ ||65||
GE07bhg4c02u:2809: madhusūdanaḥ : prasādam adhigacchatīty uktaṃ tatra prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity ucyate prasāda iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2810: cittasya prasāde svacchatva-rūpe sati sarva-duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ajñāna-vilasitānāṃ hānir vināśo 'sya yater upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2811: hi yasmāt prasanna-cetaso yater āśu śīghram eva buddhir brahmātmaikyākārā paryavatiṣṭhate pari samantād avatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati viparīta-bhāvanādi-pratibandhābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2812: tataś ca prasāde sati buddhi-paryavasthānaṃ tatas tad-virodhy-ajñāna-nivṛttiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2813: tatas tat-kārya-sakala-duḥkha-hānir iti krame 'pi prasāde yatrādhikyāya sarva-duḥkha-hāni-karatva-kathanam iti na virodhaḥ ||65||
GE07bhg4c02u:2815: buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate sarvato-bhāvena svābhīṣṭaṃprati sthirī-bhavatīti viṣaya-grahaṇābhāvād api samucita-viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ tasya sukham iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2817: tayā vinā tu na citta-prasāda iti prathama-skandha eva prapañcitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2820: prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity āha asya yogino manaḥ prasāde sati sarveṣāṃ prakṛti-saṃsarga-kṛtānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ hānir upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2821: prasanna-cetasaḥ svātma-yāthātmya-viṣayā buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati ||65||
GE07bhg4c02u:2824: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2825: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:2832: bhāvanayā hi buddher ātmani pratiṣṭhā bhavati, sā ca ayuktasya yato nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2833: na cābhāvayataḥ ātma-dhyānam akurvataḥ śāntiḥ ātmani cittoparamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2834: aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:2835: madhusūdanaḥ : imam evārthaṃ vyatireka-mukhena draḍhayati nāstīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2836: ayuktasyājita-cittasya buddhir ātma-viṣayā śravaṇa-mananākhya-vedānta-vicāra-janyā nāsti notpadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2839: na cābhāvayata ātmānaṃ śāntiḥ sakāryāvidyā-nivṛtti-rūpā vedānta-vākya-janyā brahmātmaikya-sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2840: aśāntasyātma-sākṣātkāra-śūnyasya kutaḥ sukhaṃ mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:2841: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam arthaṃ vyatireka-mukhena draḍhayati nāstīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2847: pūrvoktam arthaṃ vyatireka-mukhenāha ayuktasyāyogino mad-aniveśita-manaso buddhir ukta-lakṣaṇā nāsti na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2849: tādṛśam ātmānam abhāvayataḥ śāntir viṣaya-tṛṣṇā-nivṛttir nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2850: aśāntasya tat-tṛṣṇākulasya sukham sva-prakāśānandātmānubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ kutaḥ syāt ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:2854: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:2855: śrīdharaḥ : nāsti buddhir ayuktasya [Gītā 2.66] ity atra hetum āha indriyāṇām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2856: indriyāṇām avaśīkṛtānāṃ svairaṃ viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yadaivaikam indriyaṃ mano 'nuvidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2858: tadaivaikam indriyasya manasaḥ puruṣasya vā prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati viṣaya-vikṣiptāṃ karoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2859: kim uta vaktavyaṃ bahūni prajñāṃ harantīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2860: yathā pramattasya karṇadhārasya nāvaṃ vāyuḥ sarvataḥ paribhramayati tadvad iti ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:2861: madhusūdanaḥ : ayuktasya kuto nāsti buddhir ity ata āha indriyāṇām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2862: caratāṃ sva-viṣayeṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu pravartamānānām avaśīkṛtānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekam apīndriyam anulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate preryate pravartate iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2864: tat indriyam ekam api manasānusṛtam asya sādhakasya manaso vā prajñām ātma-viṣayāṃ śāstrīyāṃ harati apanayati manasas tad-viṣayāviṣṭatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2865: yadaikam apīndriyaṃ prajñāṃ harati tadā sarvāṇi harantīti kim u vaktavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2867: abhyasyeti vāyor naukā-haraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ na bhuvīti sūcayitum ambhasīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2868: evaṃ dārṣṭāntike 'py ambhaḥ-sthānīye manaś cāñcalye saty eva prajñā-haraṇa-sāmarthyam indriyasya na tu bhū-sthānīye manaḥ-sthairya iti sūcitam ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:2870: ayuktasya buddhir nāstīty upapādayati indriyāṇāṃ sva-sva-viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yan mama ekam indriyam anuvidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2871: puṃsāṃ sarvendriyānuvartiḥ kriyate, tad eva mano 'sya prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2874: viṣayeṣu caratām avijitānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekaṃ śrotraṃ vā cakṣur vānulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate pravartate,
GE07bhg4c02u:2875: tad ekam evendriyaṃ manasānugatam asya pravartakasya prajñāṃ viviktātma-viṣayāṃ haraty apanayati manasasas tad-viṣayākṛṣṭatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2877: pratikūlo vāyur yathāmbhasi nīyamānāṃ nāvaṃ tadvat ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:2882: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñatve sādhanatvaṃ coktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2883: sādhanatvopasaṃhāre tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā jñātavyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2884: mahābāho ! iti sambodhayan vairi-nigrahe samarthasya tavātrāpi sāmarthyaṃ bhaved iti sūcayati ||68||
GE07bhg4c02u:2885: madhusūdanaḥ : hi yasmād evaṃ tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2887: he mahābāho iti sambodhayan sarva-śatru-nivāraṇa-kṣamatvād indriya-śatru-nivāraṇe 'pi tvaṃ kṣamo 'sīti sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2890: indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñaṃ prati lakṣaṇatvasya mumukṣuṃ prati prajñā-sādhanatvasya copasaṃharaṇīyatvāt ||68||
GE07bhg4c02u:2892: he mahā-bāho ! iti yathā śatrūn nigṛhṇāsi, tathā mano 'pi nigṛhāṇeti bhāvaḥ ||68||
GE07bhg4c02u:2895: he mahābāho iti yathā ripūn nigṛhṇāsi tathendriyāṇi nigṛhāṇety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2896: ebhiḥ ślokair bhagavan-niviṣṭatayendriya-vijayaḥ sthita-prajñasya siddhasya svābhāvikaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2900: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī |
GE07bhg4c02u:2901: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ ||69||
GE07bhg4c02u:2903: nanu na kaścid api prasupta iva darśanādi-vyāpāra-śūnyaḥ sarvātmanā nigṛhītendriyo loke dṛśyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2904: ato 'saktāvitam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha yā niśeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2908: tasyāṃ ātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ saṃyamī nigṛhītendriyo jāgrati prabudhyante |
GE07bhg4c02u:2910: tasyāṃ darśanādi-vyāpāras tasya nāsti ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2911: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathā divāndhānām ulukādīnāṃ rātrāv eva darśanaṃ na tu divase |
GE07bhg4c02u:2916: tad evaṃ mumukṣuṇā prajñā-sthairyāya prayatna-pūrvakam indriya-saṃyamaḥ kartavya ity uktaṃ sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ siddha eva sarvendriya-saṃyama ity āha yā niśeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2917: yā vedānta-vākya-janita-sākṣātkāra-rūpāhaṃ brahmāsmīti prajñā sarva-bhūtānām ajñānāṃ niśeva niśā tān praty aprakāśa-rūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2918: tasyāṃ brahma-vidyā-lakṣaṇāyāṃ sarva-bhūta-niśāyāṃ jāgarti ajñāna-nidrāyāḥ prabuddhaḥ san sāvadhāno vartate saṃyamīndriya-saṃyamavān sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2919_0: yasyāṃ tu dvaita-darśana-lakṣaṇāyām avidyā-nidrāyāṃ prasuptāny eva bhūtāni jāgrati
GE07bhg4c02u:2919_1: svapnavad vyavaharanti sā niśā na prakāśata ātma-tattvaṃ paśyato 'parokṣatayā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya |
GE07bhg4c02u:2920: yāvad dhi na prabudhyate tāvad eva svapna-darśanaṃ bodhya-paryantatvād bhramasya tattva-jñāna-kāle
GE07bhg4c02u:2921: tu na bhrama-nimittaḥ kaścid vyavahāraḥ | tad uktaṃ vārtika-kāraiḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:2922: kāraka-vyavahāre hi śuddhaṃ vastu na vīkṣyante |
GE07bhg4c02u:2923: śuddhe vastuni siddhe ca kāraka-vyāpṛtis tathā ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2925: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānām ity avocat svayaṃ hariḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2926: tathā ca yasya viparīta-darśanaṃ tasya na vastu-darśanaṃ viparīta-darśanasya vastv-adarśana-janyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2927: yasya ca vastu-darśanaṃ tasya na viparīta-darśanaṃ viparīta-darśana-kāraṇasya vastv-adarśanasya vastu-darśanena bādhitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2928: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yatra vā anyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyet |
GE07bhg4c02u:2929: yatra svasya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2931: yathā kākasya rātry-andhasya dinam ulūkasya divāndhasya niśā rātrau paśyataś colūkasya yad dinaṃ rātrir eva sā kākasyeti mahad āścaryam etat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2932: atas tattva-darśibhiḥ katham āvidyaka-kriyā-kārakādi-vyavahāraḥ syād iti svataḥ siddha eva tasyendriya-saṃyama ity arthaḥ ||69||
GE07bhg4c02u:2933: viśvanāthaḥ : sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ-siddha eva sarvendriya-nigraha ity āha yeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2934: buddhir hi dvividhā bhavati ātma-pravaṇā viṣaya-pravaṇā ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:2935: tatra yā ātma-pravaṇā buddhiḥ sā sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2936: niśāyāṃ kiṃ kiṃ syād iti tasyāṃ svapanto janā yathā na jānanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:2937: tathaiva ātma-pravaṇa-buddhau prāpyamāṇaṃ vastu sarva-bhūtāni na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2942: tan-niṣṭhaṃ viṣaya-sukha-śoka-mohādikaṃ sākṣād anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2943: sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā tan-niṣṭhaṃ kim api nānubhavati ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2944: kintu paśyataḥ sāṃsārikānāṃ sukha-duḥkha-pradān viṣayān tatraudāsīnyenāvalokayataḥ svabhogyān
GE07bhg4c02u:2945: viṣayān api yathocitaṃ nirlepam ādadānasyety arthaḥ ||69||
GE07bhg4c02u:2946: baladevaḥ : sādhakāvasthasya sthita-prajñasyendriya-saṃyamaḥ prayatna-sādhya ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2947: siddhāvasthasya tu tasya tan-niyamaḥ svābhāvika ity āha yā niśeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2949: yātma-niṣṭhā buddhiḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā-rūpakeṇopamātra vyajyate rātri-tulyā tadvad aprakāśikā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2950: rātrāv ivātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau svapanto janās tal-labhyam ātmānaṃ sarve nānubhavantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2951: saṃyamī jitendriyas tu tasyāṃ jāgarti na tu svapiti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2953: yasyāṃ viṣya-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau bhūtānio jāgrati viṣaya-bhogān anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2965: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭy-abhāve katham asau tān bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha āpūryamāṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2966_0: nānā-nada-nadīnbhir āpūryamāṇam api acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādam eva samudraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2966_1: punar api anyā āpo yathā praviśanti tathā kāmā viṣayā yaṃ munim antar-dṛṣṭiṃ bhogair
GE07bhg4c02u:2966_2: avikriyamāṇam eva prārabdha-karmabhir ākṣiptāḥ santaḥ praviśanti sa śāntim kaivalyaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2969: etādṛśasya sthita-prajñasya sarva-vikṣepa-śāntir apy artha-siddheti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha āpūryamāṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2970: sarvābhir nadībhir āpūryamāṇaṃ santaṃ vṛṣṭy-ādi-prabhavā api sarvā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2972: acalānāṃ mainākādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhā yasminn iti vā gāmbhīryātiśaya uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2973_0: yadvad yena prakāreṇa nirvikāratvena tadvat tenaiva nirvikāratva-prakāreṇa yaṃ sthita-prajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2973_1: nirvikāram eva santaṃ kāmā ajñair lokaiḥ kāmyamānāḥ śabdādyāḥ sarve viṣayā avarjanīyatayā
GE07bhg4c02u:2973_2: prārabdha-karma-vaśāt praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ śaknuvanti sa mahā-samudra-sthānīyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2974: | na kāma-kāmī kāmān viṣayān kāmayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa kāma-kāmy ajñaḥ śāntiṃ samākhyātāṃ nāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2975: api tu sarvadā laukikālaukika-karma-vikṣepeṇa mahati kleśārṇave magno bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2976: etena jñānina eva phala-bhūto vidvat-saṃnyāsas tasyaiva ca sarva-vikṣepa-nivṛtti-rūpā jīvan-muktir daivāddhnīna-viṣaya-bhoge 'pi nirvikāratety-ādikam uktaṃ veditavyam ||70||
GE07bhg4c02u:2977: viśvanāthaḥ : viṣaya-grahaṇe kṣobha-rāhityam eva nirlepety āha āpūryamāṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2978: yathā varṣāsu itas tataḥ nādeyā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti kīdṛśam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2979: ā īṣad api āpūryamāṇam tāvatībhir apy adbhiḥ pūrayituṃ na śakyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2980: acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādaṃ tadvad eva kāmā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti bhogyatvenāyānti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2981: yathā apāṃ praveśe apraveśe vā samudro na kam api viśeṣam āpadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2982: evam eva yaḥ kāmānāṃ bhoge abhoge ca kṣobha-rahita eva syāt sa sthita-prajñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2984: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ bhāvaṃ sphuṭayann āha āpūryeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2985: svarūpeṇaivāpūryamāṇaṃ tathāpy acala-pratiṣṭham anullaṅghita-velaṃ samudraṃ yathāpo 'nyā varṣodbhavā nadyaḥ praviśanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:2986: na tu tatra kiñcid viśeṣaṃ śaknuvanti kartuṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2987: tadvat sarve kāmāḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ prabhavanti sa śāntim āpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2988: śabdādiṣu tad indriya-gocareṣv api sat svātmānandānubhava-tṛptair vikāra-leśam apy avindan sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2989: yaḥ kāma-kāmī viṣaya-lipsuḥ sa tūkta-lakṣaṇāṃ śāntiṃ nāpnoti ||70||
GE07bhg4c02u:2992: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2995: prāptān kāmān vihāya tyaktvopekṣya aprāpteṣu ca niḥspṛhaḥ yato nirahaṅkāro 'taeva tad-bhoga-sādhaneṣu nirmamaḥ sann antar-dṛṣṭir bhūtvā yaś carati prārabdha-vaśena bhogān bhuṅkte |
GE07bhg4c02u:2999_0: prāptān api sarvān bāhyān gṛha-kṣetrādīnāntarān manorājya-rūpān vāsanā-mātra-rūpāṃś
GE07bhg4c02u:2999_1: ca pathi gacchaṃs tṛṇa-sparśa-rūpān kāmāṃs trividhān vihāyopekṣya śarīra-jīvana-mātre 'pi nispṛhaḥ san |
GE07bhg4c02u:3000: yato nirahaṅkāra śarīrendriyādāv ayam aham ity abhimāna-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3002_1: mamedam ity abhimāna-varjitaḥ san yaḥ pumāṃś carati prārabdha-karma-vaśena bhogān
GE07bhg4c02u:3002_2: bhuṅkte yādṛcchikatayā yatra kvāpi gacchatīti vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3003: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāra-duḥkhoparama-lakṣaṇām avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttim adhigacchati jñāna-balena prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3006: viśvanāthaḥ : kaścit tu kāmeṣu aviśvasan naiva tān bhuṅkte ity āha |
GE07bhg4c02u:3007: vihāyeti nirahaṅkāro nirmama iti deha-daihikeṣu ahaṃtā-mamatā-śūnyaḥ ||71||
GE07bhg4c02u:3009_0: prāptān kāmān viṣayān sarvān vihāya śarīropajīvana-mātre 'pi nirmamo mamtā-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3009_1: nirahaṅkāro 'nātmani śarīre ātmābhimāna-śūnyaś carati tad-upajīvana-mātraṃ bhakṣayati
GE07bhg4c02u:3009_2: yatra kvāpi gacchati vā sa śāntiṃ labhate iti vrajeta kim ity asyottaram ||71 ||
GE07bhg4c02u:3012: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3014: śrīdharaḥ : uktāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3017: enāṃ parameśvarārādhanena viśuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān prāpya na vimuhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3019: yato 'nta-kāle mṛtyu-samaye 'py asyāṃ lakṣa-mātram api sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇam brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ layam ṛcchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3020: kiṃ punar vaktavyaṃ bālyam ārabhya sthitvā prāpnotīti ||72||
GE07bhg4c02u:3027: tad evaṃ caturṇāṃ praśnānām uttara-vyājena sarvāṇi sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇāni mumukṣu-kartavyatayā kathitāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:3028: samprati karma-yoga-phala-bhūtāṃ sāṅkhya-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3030: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṅkhye buddhir iti ca prāg uktā sthitir niṣṭhā sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-paramātma-jñāna-lakṣaṇā brāhmī brahma-viṣayā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3031: he pārtha ! enāṃ sthitiṃ prāpya yaḥ kaścid api pnar na vimuhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3032: na hi jñāna-bādhitasyājñānasya punaḥ sambhavo 'sti anāditvenotpatty-asambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:3033: asyāṃ sthitāv anta-kāle 'pi antye 'pi vaayasi sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛttiṃ brahma-rūpaṃ nirvāṇam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3035: kim u vaktavyaṃ yo bramacaryād eva saṃnyasya yāvaj-jīvam asyāṃ brāhmyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3036: sthitāv avatiṣṭhate sa brahma-nirvāṇam ṛcchatīty api-śabdārthaḥ ||72||
GE07bhg4c02u:3043: jñānaṃ karma ca vispaṣṭam aspaṣṭaṃ bhaktim uktavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:3050: kiṃ punar ākaumāraṃ brahma ṛcchati labhate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3051: nirvāṇam amṛta-rūpaṃ tat pradam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3052: nanu tasyāṃ sthitaḥ kathaṃ brahma prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3055: niṣkāma-karmabhir jñānī harim eva smaran bhavet |
GE07bhg4c02u:3060: [*ENDNOTE] This is a reference to chapter 11.25. See VCT to 18.28.
